41014036	Malemi ba'tu pirang-pirang tengkan, nasuju' massambajang nakua, "Oo Ambe', te'da to apa tanglawa'ding jaji, ke Kita'. Lendokanni tee kamaparrisan jio mai kale-Ku', ke wa'dingngi. Apa tangngia pakkaeloran-Ku' to la jaji, apa pakkaeloran-Ta' Kita'."
41014037	Mangkai joo, polemi Puang Isa lako to nanii tallu anak gurun-Na, natimba'i simammasan. Nakuamo lako Petrus, "Ee Simon, mamma'rokoka? Tangmukulle unamoraka merroja sangjang bang?"
41014038	Nakua toopa, "Majaga kamu', mimassambajang too, danggi' mituru'i ke disede kamu' mpugauk dosa. Sitonganna madoang to penawammi mpugauk katonganan, apa te'da mikullei, sanga malamma to sipa' tolino."
41014039	Male pole' omi Puang Isa massambajang, na ia to passambajang-Na susi una to jolona.
41014040	Mangkai joo, polemi lako to nanii tallu anak gurun-Na, natimba'i omi simammasan, sanga gaja rojai. Te'da naissen to apa la napau lako Puang Isa.
41014041	Ia tonna mangpentallunnamo pole, nakuanmi to anak gurun-Na, "Mamma' bang unapara kamu'ka mpessau bo'jo'mi? Ganna'mi! Nadete'mi wattung-Ku' tee Aku', Anak Mentolino, la dipangben lako kuasanna tomadosa.
41014042	Mi'cokmo kamu', tamale. Kitari! Ia to tolampangpejokkoanna', ratumi."
41014043	Ia tonna mangkada unapa Puang Isa, ratumi Yudas, to sala mesa'na anak gurun-Na, ssolan buda tau sitakin pa'dang sola mbawa tarasulu', to nasua kapala imang, guru agama na pekaamberan to-Yahudi.
41014044	Mangka jolomo joo tompangpejokkoanni mpaui lako tuu lako tau kumua, "Ia to tau kuudung, iamo taunna. Jokkomi, namijagai meloi mibawa."
41014045	Ratumi lako ntuu joo ngenan, ta'pa malemi Yudas lako Puang Isa namangkada nakua, "Oo Guru!" anna udungngi.
41014046	Na ia joo tobuda ratu sola Yudas, njokkomi Puang Isa anna pumpungngi.
41014047	Apa sala mesa'na to tau jio, ta'pa nnonok pa'dangna, napa'dangngii to kaunanna Imang Lompo, nata'tak to talinganna.
41014048	Nakuanni Puang Isa tuu lako tau, "Misangaraka parampo'na', ammiratu sitakin pa'dang sola mbawa tarasulu' la njokkona'?
41014049	Allo-alloki' sola ke mangngajahhina' jio Bola Puang Allataala na te'da mijokkona'. Apa nang la jajimi susi joo, dikua anna jaji to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala."
41014050	Sipalaianmi to anak gurun-Na Puang Isa ssalaii.
41014051	Den tokallolo, medodo bangri, undi nturu' Puang Isa. La najokko toda tau,
41014052	apa nalossokanni to dodona, namale kinjara' mangkale-kale.
41014053	Malemi tuu lako tau ssolanni to Puang Isa lako bolana Imang Lompo. Ia to kapala imang, guru agama na pekaamberan to-Yahudi sirempun ngasanni ntuu jio.
41014054	Naturu'i mambela-bela bangngi Petrus to Puang Isa, ratu lako rante bolana Imang Lompo. Ntuu jio nanii Petrus cumadokko sola pangjaga mendarang.
41014055	Ia to kapala imang sola padanna Pangbicara Agama mpengkulle-kullei nnampa' kasa'bian tangtongan, la nanii mpasalai to Puang Isa, anna wa'ding dipangpebunoan, apa te'da naampa' kumua mpugaukki kasalan.
41014056	Moi buda tau menjaji sa'bi tangtongan, apa ia to kasa'bianna, sisala ngasan bang.
41014057	Denmi ba'tu pira-pira tau ke'deh, mpau kasa'bian tangtongan nakua,
41014058	"Denmo kisa'dingngi tee tau nakua, 'La kuro'pokan tee Bola Puang Allataala pangkabua' tolino, na tallung allora kunii mpake'dehhi to laenna, to tangngia pangkabua' tolino.' "
41014059	Apa ia to kasa'bianna tuu lako tau, sisala ngasan bang una.
41014060	Ke'dehmi joo Imang Lompo, namangkada lako Puang Isa nakua, "Te'daraka mulampebalii to diparapasanko?"
41014061	Apa kamma' bangngi to Puang Isa. Te'da bang namebali. Pissenpa to Imang Lompo mekutana nakua, "Ikomoraka Raja Mangpasalama', Anak Allataala to disompa?"
41014062	Mebalimi nakua, "Ie', Aku'mo. La mikitana' tee Aku', Anak Mentolino, cumadokko jio sa'de kanan-Na Puang Allataala to makuasa, na la ratuna' jao mai langi' lan saleu'."
41014063	Gaja gallii joo Imang Lompo anna ca'ce-ca'cei to pakeanna namangkada nakua, "Te'damo nadiparallui to sa'bi.
41014064	Misa'ding kalenamo to kadan-Na, kumua ncapa'i Puang Allataala. Ia tee too, matumbara kamu' pahangmi?" Mesa' kada ngasanmi nakua, "Madosai to Puang Isa, sipato'mo Ia ke dibunoi."
41014065	Den ba'tu pira-pira tau ncikkudui to Puang Isa, nasapu'i to lindo-Na, nasijangguru'i, nakuanni, "Ee nabi! Tappuike', indara to njangguru'ko?" Ia to tomangjaga jio mentama toda ntampelengngi.
41014066	Jio bang unapa rante bola to Petrus, naratu ntuu jio mesa' baine kaunanna Imang Lompo.
41014067	Ia tonna kitami to Petrus mendarang, nakaje'jekmi nakuanni, "Tangngiko todaraka sibawanna joo Puang Isa to-Nazaret."
41014068	Apa messakkanni Petrus nakua, "Te'da kupahangngi. Te'da too kuissenni apara tuu musanga." Malemi Petrus lako babangan. [Ia joo wattu, kekkuami to manuk.]
41014069	Ia joo baine kaunan nakaje'jekki to Petrus, anna kuanni to tau ntuu jio, "Ia toda tee tau sala mesa'na anak gurun-Na joo tau."
41014070	Apa messakkan omi Petrus. Te'da namasai joo, ia tuu lako tau ke'deh ntuu jio ngkuan omo Petrus, "Te'damo nasalai, anak gurun-Nako, nasaba' to-Galileako."
41014071	Massapah tonganmi to Petrus nakua, "Tampak ropu ke la kuissenni joo tau misanga!"
41014072	Ia joo wattu kekkua penduanmi to manuk. Naingaranmi Petrus to apa mangka nakuanni Puang Isa kumua, "Te'dapa nakekkua penduan to manuk, mupentallunmo mpessakkannina'." Ta'pa kumarrakmi Petrus nna'de-a'de.
41015001	Melambi' unapa nasirempunmo to Pangbicara Agama, iamo to kapala imang, guru agama na pekaamberan to-Yahudi. Napangpepumpunganni to Puang Isa, namale ssolanni, anna pangngoloi lako Gubernur Pilatus.
41015002	Nakutanaimi Gubernur Pilatus nakua, "Tongannaraka, Ikomo Raja to-Yahudi?" Napebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Susi tuu tapaunna, Aku'mo."
41015003	Budapa to naparapasanni kapala imang to Puang Isa, apa te'da bang napebalii.
41015004	Nakutanai omi Gubernur Pilatus nakua, "Ciapari mucia' mebali? Pesa'dingngii pira budanna to apa naparapasanko tau."
41015005	Apa te'da bang napebalii Puang Isa. Iamo joo najangngah Gubernur Pilatus.
41015006	Ia ke pangramean Paskah, kabiasannamo Gubernur Pilatus lla'paran simesa' toditarungku situru' peta'danna tobuda.
41015007	Den tau disanga Barabas lan pangtarungkuan sola ba'tu pira-pira to tomangka nasolan nnewa tomangparenta na buda tau nabuno.
41015008	Mangngolomi to tobuda lako Gubernur Pilatus, meta'da nadila'paran mesa' to toditarungku susi kabiasanna.
41015009	Mekutanami Gubernur Pilatus nakua, "Mikadoangngiraka ke Ia tee Raja to-Yahudi kula'paran?"
41015010	Naissen Gubernur Pilatus, kumua iari napangngoloi kapala imang to Puang Isa lako kalena, sanga masere atiri.
41015011	Apa narasii kapala imang joo tobuda, kumua napeta'dai lako Gubernur Pilatus, nadila'paran to Barabas.
41015012	Nadadu' pole'pa Gubernur Pilatus ngkutanai tuu lako tobuda nakua, "Ia ke susii joo, na la kupatumbai joo tomisanga Raja to-Yahudi?"
41015013	Napissennimi mearrak nakua, "Pampangngi Ia."
41015014	Nadadu' pole'pa Gubernur Pilatus mekutana nakua, "Kasalan apara to mangka napugauk?" Apa naandongngi pole'i mearrak nakua, "Pampangngi Ia."
41015015	Jaji madoangngi Gubernur Pilatus la mpemasannangngii joo tobuda. Iamo joo nala'paranni to Barabas lako tobuda, napangperambianni to Puang Isa, namane' mpangbenni la dipampang.
41015016	Nabawami surudadu to Puang Isa lako to dinii rra'tah kara-kara, lan salassa' gubernur, namane' ntambai ngasanni to solana anna sirempun.
41015017	Napapakeii baju lando makudara', napasongko'i mahkota, to ringe keduri dikabua'.
41015018	Mangkai joo napekatabe'imi sola ngasan nakua, "Salama' Raja to-Yahudi."
41015019	Napa'tongngi tekken to ulun-Na, nacikkuduii, namengguntu' ssompai.
41015020	Ia tonna mangkamo tuu lako surudadu ncapa'-capa'i, nasulleimi joo baju makudara', napapakeii to bajun-Na unamo ia. Namane' ssolanni to Puang Isa lako salean la dipampang.
41015021	Jio tangnga lalan sitammumi mesa' tau mangnguju lako kota Yerusalem, naparukui surudadu mpassan kaju sitamben-Na Puang Isa. Ia joo tau disanga Simon, to-Kirene, iamo ambe'na Aleksander sola Rufus.
41015022	Nasolanmi to Puang Isa lako buntu-buntu disanga buntu Golgota, battuananna, "Buntu Ulu Tau."
41015023	Ia tonna ratumo de' ntuu joo buntu, napaiso'mi anggoro' dipasirau mur, apa cia'i nniso'i.
41015024	-
41015025	Napampangmi to Puang Isa tonna tatte' kasera makale', namane' lloterei to pakean-Na la nanii nnissenni kumua umbonnara to la naputawa.
41015026	Den pangnguki' dipajao de'na ulun-Na Puang Isa to mpaui to napusaba' nadipampang kumua, "Raja to-Yahudi."
41015027	Den toda dua parampo' nasolan Puang Isa dipampang, mesa' jio sa'de kanan-Na na mesa' jio sa'de kairin-Na. [
41015028	Susimi tee najaji to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Disangai togaja'."]
41015029	Ia to tau liu lalan ntuu jio, pada mangroge kollong ncapa'-capa' Puang Isa nakua, "Ee, Ikomo to la rro'pokan Bola Puang Allataala, na tallung allora la munii ngkabua' pole'i!
41015030	Pasalama'ko kalemu mumellao jao mai ntuu kaju sitamben."
41015031	Susi toda tuu lako kapala imang sola guru agama ncapa'-capa' Puang Isa, nakua sipangkada-kada, "Ee, tau laen napasalama', apa tangnakulle mpasalama' kalena!
41015032	Ia ke rajana tonganni to-Israel, mellaoi tee too jao mai joo kaju sitamben angkikitai, kimane' ngkatappa'ii kumua Iamo Raja Mangpasalama'." Ia to tau dipampang sola, ncapa'-capa' tooi.
41015033	Ia tonna tangngamo allo, memmapattang ngasanmi joo tondok tallung jang masainna.
41015034	Ia tonna tatte' tallumo karuen nnandongngimi gamaran-Na to Puang Isa metamba nakua, "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakhtani?" to battuananna, "Oo, Puang Allataala-Ku'! Oo, Puang Allataala-Ku', ciapari musalaina'?"
41015035	Ba'tu pira-pira tau ssa'dingngi joo petamba-Na, namangkada nakua, "Pesa'dingngii, ntambaii Nabi Elia."
41015036	Den mesa' tuu lako tau ta'pa male nnala baraba batu, nacummui tama anggoro' macukka, namane' mpalakoi cappa' sangtangke kaju anna pamimmii to Puang Isa, anna mangkada nakua, "Tajanni, antakitai ba'tu la ratu tonganrika Nabi Elia la lla'paranni jao mai joo kaju sitamben."
41015037	Nnandongngii gamaran-Na Puang Isa metamba, anna ka'tu sunga'-Na.
41015038	Ia joo wattu ia to kaen pesapa' lan Bola Puang Allataala, ca'cei tipangdua jao mai ratu do'.
41015039	Na ia to kamandang surudadu ke'deh jio sikandoppi' joo kaju sitamben mpemanassa tonganni matumba to kamatean-Na Puang Isa namangkada nakua, "Tonganna, Anak Allataala tee tau."
41015040	Den toda ba'tu pira-pira baine ntuu jio mambela-bela bang ngkitai. Susinna jioi to Salome, Maryam Magdalena, Maryam indona Yakub malolle' sola Yoses.
41015041	Ia tuu lako baine, iamo baine nturu'mo Puang Isa, anna balii tonna jio unapa tana Galilea. Na buda toopa baine laenna ntuu jio to nasolan Puang Isa de' kota Yerusalem.
41015042	-
41015043	Ia tonna la bongimo, ratumi Yusuf, to-Arimatea. Ia joo Yusuf mesa' Pangbicara Agama na todikasiri' too. Ia mesa' tontajan wattunna Puang Allataala la mangparenta susi Raja. Ia joo allo dinii mangpasadia, nasaba' la Allo Katorroanmi. Iamo joo, nambaranian kalena Yusuf male mangngolo lako Gubernur Pilatus, mpeta'dai kumua anna diben to batang rabukku-Na Puang Isa.
41015044	Jangngahhi Gubernur Pilatus ssa'dingngi kumua matemi to Puang Isa. Iamo joo napangpetambanni to pangbarani surudadu, nakutanai kumua ba'tu la masaimi mate-Na to Puang Isa.
41015045	Ia tonna sa'dingmi to curitanna joo pangbarani, naeloranmi to Yusuf nnalai joo batang rabukku-Na Puang Isa.
41015046	Naallii Yusuf to kaen pebalun lenan, namane' mpupellaoi joo batang rabuk jao mai kaju sitamben, anna balunni. Mangkai joo, napatamami liang to digaraga jio buntu batu, nalentenni to batu tonggo natungusanni joo liang.
41015047	Na ia to Maryam Magdalena na Maryam indona Yoses mmatai bangngi umbo nanii mpanii joo batang rabukku-Na Puang Isa.
41016001	Ia tonna mangkamo Allo Katorroan, malemi Maryam Magdalena, Maryam indona Yakub na Salome nnalli minynya'-minynya' busarungngu' la naminynyakan batang rabukku-Na Puang Isa.
41016002	Melambi'pa tonna mane' ollong allo joo allo Aha', malemi tuu lako baine lako liang.
41016003	-
41016004	Sipangkada-kadami jio tangnga lalan nakua, "Indamora to la llentenanki' dau joo batu petungu' liang?" Nasaba' gaja tonggo joo batu. Apa ia tonna ratumo lako, nakitami mangkamo dilentenni.
41016005	Ta'pa tarruhmi tama liang. Apa gaja sabakanni, sanga ngkitai tokallolo mangpakean baju malando mabuccang cumadokko jio sa'de kanan.
41016006	Mangkadami joo tokallolo nakua, "Danggi' mimalaja'! Kuissen kumua nnangah kamu' Puang Isa to-Nazaret, to mangka dipampang. Te'damo Ia ntee! Tuo pole'mi Ia. Kitami tee ngenan dinii mbujuhhi.
41016007	Ia tee too, malemo kamu' madoi' mpauanni to anak gurun-Na Puang Isa sola Petrus kumua, 'Malemi njoloi kamu' re' tana Galilea, na jiopa la minii ngkitai, susi to mangka napauan kamu'.' "
41016008	Messunmi lan mai joo liang, nata'pa sikinjarasan, nasaba' gaja sabakanni na silajatan tooi. Te'da bang tau napauan apa to mangka jaji, sanga malaja'i. [
41016009	Ia tonna tuo pole'mo Puang Isa, allo Aha' melambi', mpangpekitanmi kalena lako Maryam Magdalena. Ia joo Maryam, mangka nanii Puang Isa nnula'i pitu setang.
41016010	-
41016011	Malemi Maryam Magdalena mpauanni to tonturu' Puang Isa, to da'tan bangpa masussa nakumarrak kumua, "Ee, tuo pole'mi to Puang Isa, nakukitamo aku'." Apa ia tonna sa'dingngi joo kadanna Maryam Magdalena, kumua tuo pole'mi to Puang Isa, te'da nakatappa'ii.
41016012	Ia tonna mangka omo joo, laen omi carana Puang Isa mpangpekitan kalena lako dua tau to nturu'mi, tonna lan kalingkanna sola dua mangnguju lako mesa' kampong.
41016013	Jaji, ta'pa polemi sola dua, anna curitai joo kajajian lako solana, apa te'da nakatappa'ii joo curitanna.
41016014	Mangkatampakanna mpangpekitanmi kalena Puang Isa lako sangpulo mesa anak gurun-Na, tonna kumande. Nacaccai Puang Isa, nasaba' kamembattukan penawanna nacia' ngkatappa'i curitanna to tongkitami kumua tuo pole'mi Ia.
41016015	Anna kuanni nakua, "Malemo kamu' lako a'pa' sulapa'na lino, mpangpeissenanni to Kareba Kasalamatan jio mai Puang Allataala lako sininna rupa tau.
41016016	Ia to tongkatappa'ii na dijio', la salama', nasaba' te'damo nadireken to salana, apa ia to tote'da nakatappa'ii la nasessa Puang Allataala.
41016017	Ia to tau matappa' la ntarima kuasang-Ku' la mpugauk tanda mejangngaran, nnula'i setang, na mangkada mpake basa to te'da naissenni.
41016018	Ianna ntoe ulah bolong, ba'tu nniso' racun, te'da namatumba. Ianna kaka'i tuu lako tomasaki, la malagah."
41016019	Ia tonna mangkamo Puang Isa sipangkada sola anak gurun-Na, tiangka'mi de' suruga, na cumadokko jio sa'de kanan-Na Puang Allataala.
41016020	Malemi joo anak gurun-Na Puang Isa mpangpeissenanni to Kareba Kasalamatan lako sulapa'na lino. Na Puang tuli ntulungngi lan jamanna, mpugaukki to tanda mejangngaran, la menjaji butti kumua tongan ia to apa napau.]
42001001	Ee, Teofilus, to mala'bihku'. Budamo tau mpengkulle-kullei tonganni nnuki' rampa'i katuoan-Na Puang Isa to mangkamo jaji lan tangnga-tangngata'.
42001002	Ia to nauki' tau, susi bang unamo to napangpeissenan to tongkita kalenai apa to mangka jaji, mellao jio mai pamulanna. Iamo tuu lako tau mpangpangngajaran kadan-Na Puang Allataala tongkuuki'i tee.
42001003	Ia tongkupasilolongan ngasanni tuu lako mellao jio mai pamulanna, kusanga melo ke kuukiran pole'ki' to mangrundunanna.
42001004	Iamo kupugaukki susi joo, dikua antaissenni kumua, tongan to apa mangka tasa'ding.
42001005	Ia tonna Raja Herodes mangparenta jio tana Yudea, den imang jio disanga Zakariya, rapunna imang Abia. Ia to bainena disanga Elisabet, bati' imang toda ia.
42001006	Ia to sipa'na sola dua napumasannang Puang Allataala, na naturu'i ngasan to parenta-Na na atoran-Na Puang Allataala.
42001007	Te'da anakkana, nasaba' tamanangngi to Elisabet na matuami sola dua.
42001008	-
42001009	Den pissen wattu, tonna dete'mi wattunna rapunna imang Abia la mangjama, mentamami Bola Puang Allataala imang Zakariya, nasaba' nakannai undi la ntunu kamanynyang. Ia to kabiasan joo wattu, ia to carana mpattantu imang la mangjama, diundi.
42001010	Ia tonna ntunu kamanynyang, ia to tobuda massambajang jio salean.
42001011	Denmi malaeka'-Na Puang Allataala mpangpekitan kalena lako Zakariya. Ia joo malaeka' ke'deh jio sa'de kananna meja to dinii ntunu kamanynyang.
42001012	Ia tonna kitami, sabakanmi namalaja' too.
42001013	Apa mangkadai joo malaeka' nakua, "Ee, Zakariya, danggi' mumalaja'! Natarimamo Puang Allataala to passambajangmu. Ia to balimmu la njajianni mesa' pea muane, ammusangai Yahya.
42001014	La gaja sannangko, na buda tau la mpumasannangngi to kajajianna joo pea.
42001015	Ia joo pea, la mala'bih situru' pengkitan-Na Puang Allataala, na te'da nalamangngiso' anggoro' ba'tu nniso' to makarrahna. Mangpamula nakeba'tangan indona nakuasai tarruhhi Roh Allataala.
42001016	Buda to-Israel la napapole lako Puang Allataala, Puangna.
42001017	Na la menjaji pesuro matappa'-Na Puang Allataala, na dipakuasa susi Nabi Elia. La napasikalinoi to ambe' na anakkana. Na ia to totangkainawa naajahhi mangtangngah susi tomelo penawa. Susimo joo napasadiai to tau ntarima Puang."
42001018	Mangkadami Zakariya lako joo malaeka' nakua, "Umbo la kukua nnissenni kumua la jaji susi joo? Sanga matuamo', na ia to balingku' matua todamo."
42001019	Mebalimi joo malaeka' nakua, "Aku'mo tee Jibrail, pesuro matappa'-Na Puang Allataala, disua mpauanko tee kareba kamarioan.
42001020	Apa ia to kupauanko la jaji ke wattunnami. La mamangko sajajinna joo, sanga te'da mukatappa'i."
42001021	Ia to tobuda ntajan bangmo Zakariya jio salean. Takkajanna' tuu lako tau, sanga gaja sainmi lan Bola Puang Allataala.
42001022	Na ia tonna messunmo Zakariya, tangnaissenmi mangkada. Mangkada tomamang bangmira lako tau, sanga mamangmi. Ta'pa naissenmi tobuda kumua mangkami ngkita pengkita makalaen-laen lan Bola Puang Allataala.
42001023	Ia tonna puramo to wattu mangjama lan Bola Puang Allataala, polemi Zakariya lako bolana.
42001024	Te'da namasai mangkanna joo, keba'tangmi Elisabet balinna, anna torro bang membuni jio bolana limang bulan.
42001025	Mangkadami nakua, "Iamo tee pangtulung-Na Puang Allataala lako kaleku', nata'dei to siri'ku'."
42001026	Ia tonna annanmo bulanna keba'tang Elisabet, nasuami Puang Allataala to malaeka' Jibrail male lako kota Nazaret, mesa' kota jio tana Galilea,
42001027	lako mesa' anakdara disanga Maryam, to dipasitangka'mo Yusuf, bati'na Raja Daud.
42001028	Ia tonna ratumo lako, mangbere sallangmi nakua, "Salama', nabarakka'imoko Puang Allataala narande pala'ko."
42001029	Sabakanni Maryam ssa'dingngi joo kadanna, natangngah-tangngahhi lan penawanna kumua apa battuananna joo passalama'.
42001030	Mangkadami joo malaeka' nakua, "Maryam, danggi' mumalaja', nasaba' napumasannangko Puang Allataala.
42001031	La keba'tangko ammujajian mesa' pea muane, na la musangaii Isa.
42001032	La mala'bihhi joo pea nadisanga Anak Allataala jao majaona. La naangka'i Puang Allataala menjaji Raja susi Raja Daud, tojolona.
42001033	Na la mparenta bati'na Yakub. Na ia to kadatuan-Na te'da cappa'na."
42001034	Mangkadami Maryam nakua, "Umbo nakua la jaji tuu, na anakdara unapa'?"
42001035	Mebalimi joo malaeka' nakua, "Roh Allataala la rratuiko na kuasan-Na Puang Allataala la torro ssolanko. Iamo joo namala'bih joo pea la jaji nadisanga Anak Allataala.
42001036	Parallu muissen, Elisabet to rapummu, annanmi bulanna keba'tang, moiraka nakua ngasanmo to tau tamanangngi, sanga matuami.
42001037	Te'da to apa tanglajaji napugauk Puang Allataala!"
42001038	Mangkadami Maryam nakua, "Ia tee aku' kaunannana' Puang Allataala. Ake'mo najaji lako kaleku', susi tuu mupau." Mangkai joo ta'demi joo malaeka'.
42001039	Mangkai joo malemi Maryam lako mesa' kota jio padang membuntunna tana Yudea.
42001040	Ia tonna ratumo lako, mentamami bolana Zakariya, namangbere sallang lako Elisabet.
42001041	Ia tonna sa'dingmi Elisabet to passalama'na Maryam, nakuasaii Roh Allataala, nata'pa pundiu to tau lan ba'tangna,
42001042	anna gumalasi Elisabet nakua, "Ee, ikomo baine to kaminang dibarakka'i to sininna baine! Dibarakka'i tooi tuu tau la mujajian!
42001043	Indara' tee, anna ratura indo-Na Puangku' ssikitanna'?
42001044	Kusa'dingna passalama'mu, pundiumi to tau lan ba'tangku', sanga kamarioanna.
42001045	Masannangko iko, nasaba' mukatappa'i kumua la jaji to apa napauanko Puang Allataala."
42001046	Mangkadami Maryam nakua, "Kupakala'bih to Puang Allataala,
42001047	na mariona', nasaba' Puang Allataala mpasalama'na'.
42001048	Naingaranna' dikka' aku' tokai'da'-i'da'! Mammula tee too nakua sininna tau kumua masannangna'.
42001049	Nasaba' Puang Allataala to makuasa mpupenjaji tauna'. Dipakala'bih sangan-Na!
42001050	Napangpekitanmi to kamamasean-Na lako mangpapa'-papa' bati' to ngkasiri'i.
42001051	Napangpekitanmi to kuasan-Na, Napasisarambui to tomajao penawanna, na tangjaji to pangtangngaranna.
42001052	Napamajiong to raja, anna te'damo namangparenta, Napaendek tuka'i to tokai'da'-i'da'.
42001053	Nabenni to totangbarah na sabarahna, na ia to tosugih nasua pole mangpala' lo'bang.
42001054	Natulungmiki' to to-Israel, taun-Na, situru' basse-Na lako tojolota'.
42001055	Naingaran bang Puang to basse-Na, mpangpekitan tarruh kamamasean-Na lako Nabi Ibrahim na lako sininna bati'na."
42001056	Torromi Maryam jio bolana Elisabet agi-agi tallung bulan, namane' pole lako bolana.
42001057	Nadete'mi allo kakeanakanna Elisabet, njajianmi pea muane.
42001058	Ia tonna sa'ding ngasanmi bali bolana sola rapunna to kamamasean-Na Puang Allataala, mariomi sola Elisabet.
42001059	Ia tonna karuamo allona jajinna joo pea, ratumi to tau la ssunna'i, nalassangaii Zakariya, susi sanganna ambe'na.
42001060	Apa mangkadai to indona nakua, "Tangngia! La disanga ia Yahya."
42001061	Mangkadami tuu lako tau nakua, "Te'da rapummi mpusangai joo sanga."
42001062	Iamo joo nabenni tau tanda to ambe'na, ngkutanai apara la disanganni joo anakkana.
42001063	Mpeta'dami batu dinii mangnguki' nauki'i, "La disangai Yahya." Jangngah ngasanmi to tau.
42001064	Ta'pa mangkadami ambe'na mpakala'bih Puang Allataala.
42001065	Malaja' ngasanmi to bali bolana, na ia ngasan tau ncuritai joo kareba jio sininna membuntunna tana Yudea.
42001066	Padami tossa'dingngi, mangpikkiri'i nakua, "Ba'tu la umbo ia susinna joo pea keanu'?" Nasaba' pajan, kumua narande pala'i Puang Allataala.
42001067	Nakuasaii Roh Allataala joo ambe'na Nabi Yahya napaui to pepasan-Na Puang Allataala nakua,
42001068	"Tapakala'bihhi to Puang Allataala, Puangta' kita' to-Israel, sanga ratumi ntulungki' anna la'bakki'.
42001069	Nabenmiki' Tomangpasalama' to makuasa, bati'na Raja Daud, taun-Na.
42001070	Susi to pura napau Puang Allataala tonna anu', napatarruhhi nabin-Na to pura napilei kumua,
42001071	la napasalama'ki' jio mai ewalinta', na jio mai kuasanna to tongkaba'ciki'.
42001072	Nampangpekitanmo kamamasean-Na lako tojolota', naingaranmi to basse mala'bih-Na.
42001073	-
42001074	Massapahmo lako Nabi Ibrahim, ambe' tojolota', kumua la napasalama'ki' jio mai ewalinta', anna te'damo tamalaja' ssompai,
42001075	antapangben kaleta' lako Puang, napumasannangngi penawan-Na, padapi tanii tuo.
42001076	Ee anakku', la disangako nabin-Na Puang, to Puang Allataala makuasa. Disuako njoloan Puang, la mpasadianni lalan naola,
42001077	la mpangpeissenanni lako umma'-Na, kumua la dipasalama'mi, ke nadampanganmi Puang Allataala.
42001078	Mamase na manana' Puangta'. Ratumi la mpasalama'ki'. Susi to allo ollong ke makale'
42001079	la nnarrangngi sininna tau, to tuo lan kamalillinan na kamalajatan. Napatujuki' lako lalan to nanii kasikalinoan."
42001080	Samatonggo-tonggona na saendek-endekkena toomi sumanga'na tee anakkana Zakariya. Torromi jio padang pallawangan, sanadete'na wattunna mpangpekitan kalena lako to-Israel.
42002001	Ia joo wattu napangparentanmi Tomaraja Agustus anna sininna tau lan kaparentan Roma mpangpeukiran sanganna la dibilang.
42002002	Mane'na tee nadipugauk mbilang tau, na ia joo wattu Kirenius mangparenta jio propinsi Siria.
42002003	Ia joo wattu pole ngasan to tau lako kampongna la diuki' sanganna.
42002004	Susi toomi Yusuf male jio mai kota Nazaret jio tana Galilea, lako kota Betlehem jio tana Yudea, kota kajajianna Raja Daud, nasaba' Yusuf bati'na Raja Daud.
42002005	Malemi Yusuf la mpangpeukiran sanganna sola Maryam, sitangka'na, to mbawamo banda'.
42002006	Ia tonna jiomo kota Betlehem sola dua, nadete'mi wattu kakeanakanna Maryam.
42002007	Njajianmi pea muane, anak pamungahna, nakalemu'imi, napamamma'i jiong kandean olok-olok susi issong londe to nanii jarame, sanga te'damo ngenan nanii mangbongi.
42002008	Ia joo bongi, den ba'tu pira-pira tomangrewa torro bang jio tangnga padang salean kota, njagai bembala'na.
42002009	Ta'pa denmi malaeka'-Na Puang Allataala mpapajan kalena, naarrangngi arrang kamala'biran pole jio mai Puang Allataala nnarrangngi tuu lako tomangrewa, na liwa' simalajatan.
42002010	Apa mangkadai joo malaeka' nakua, "Danggi' mimalaja'! Ratuna' mpauan kamu' kareba to mpamasannang sininna tau.
42002011	Ia tee allo jajimi to Tomangpasalama'mi jio kotana Raja Daud. Iamo Almaseh, Puang.
42002012	Iamo tee buttinna, la nnampa' kamu' mesa' pea dikalemu'i na dipamamma' jiong kandean olok-olok."
42002013	Ta'pa buda omi malaeka' laen mellao jao mai suruga ssolanni, nampakala'bih Puang Allataala nakua,
42002014	"Pakala'bih Puang Allataala to makuasa jao suruga! Sikalino to tolino to napumasannang!"
42002015	Ia tonna polemo tuu lako malaeka' de' suruga, sipangkada-kadami tuu lako tomangrewa nakua, "Tamale lako kota Betlehem ngkitai joo apa jaji, to napauanki' Puang Allataala."
42002016	Naparri-parrimi male, anna ampa'i to Maryam sola Yusuf, na ia joo pea mamma' jiong kandean olok-olok.
42002017	Ia tonna kitami joo pea, nacuritami to apa mangka napauanni malaeka'.
42002018	Jangngah ngasan to tau ssa'ding curitanna.
42002019	Napallan penawa ngasanni Maryam joo curita, natangngah mandalan tonganni.
42002020	Pole ngasanmi tuu lako tomangrewa mpakala'bih Puang Allataala, nasaba' padami to apa nakita, nasa'ding, susi to apa mangka napauanni malaeka'.
42002021	Ia tonna karuamo allona jajinna joo pea, disunna'mi nadisangai Isa. Iamo to sanga napauanni malaeka' to indo-Na, tonna te'dapa nakeba'tanganni.
42002022	Nadete'mi wattunna Yusuf sola Maryam la mpugauk atoran kadipamaceroan, situru' atoranna Nabi Musa. Ia joo wattu malemi sola dua mbawai joo pea lako kota Yerusalem, napangngoloi lako Puang Allataala,
42002023	nasaba' den diuki' lan atoran-Na Puang Allataala kumua, "Sininna to pea muane pamungah, la dipangngolo lako Puang Allataala."
42002024	Male tooi sola dua la mpangkaroban sangpasang bu'ku ba'tu dua anak jangan-jangan, susi to dipattantu lan atoran-Na Puang Allataala.
42002025	Ia joo wattu, den tau disanga Simeon torro jio kota Yerusalem. Tomelo penawa joo tau na ngkasiri' Puang Allataala, ntajan bang wattunna Puang Allataala la mpasalama' to-Israel. Nakuasai bang Roh Allataala.
42002026	Mangkamo napauan Roh Allataala kumua, te'dapa nalamate, ke te'dapi nakitai to Raja Mangpasalama' to napau jolo Puang Allataala.
42002027	Ia tonna bawai Yusuf sola Maryam to Puang Isa lako Bola Puang Allataala, la mpugaukki to apa napangparentan atoran agama, nasolanni Roh Allataala to Simeon lako.
42002028	Naalami Simeon joo pea, napawara'i, anna pakala'bih Puang Allataala, nakua,
42002029	"Oo Puang! Tapupembuttimo kadan-Ta' tee too. Ake'mo kumate rampa'mo,
42002030	nasaba' kukitamo to Tomangpasalama' taparatu,
42002031	to tapasadian lako sininna bangsa.
42002032	Iamo mpakanassai to pakkaeloran-Ta' lako bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, na mpaden kamala'biran lako umma'-Ta' Israel."
42002033	Jangngahhi to tomatuan-Na ssa'dingngi to apa napau Simeon.
42002034	Nabarakka'imi Simeon sola tallu, namangkada lako Maryam indona joo pea nakua, "Napileimo Puang Allataala tee pea la ssabu'i sola la mpasalama' buda to-Israel. Iamo la menjaji tanda jio mai Puang Allataala to la naewa buda tau,
42002035	dikua anna kakitanan to apa lan penawanna tau. Na iko Maryam, la sikitako kamasussan, to la mpapolloh buammu susi pa'dang mataran."
42002036	Den omi nabi baine to gaja tuamo, disanga Hana, anakkana Fanuel, jio mai pangrapuanna Aser. Pitung taunni mangkanna botting,
42002037	namate muanena. Na ia tee wattu karuami pulona a'pa' taunna umuru'na. Te'da bang nasalai Bola Puang Allataala, massambajang na puasa ssompa tarruh Puang Allataala.
42002038	Ratu todai joo wattu, nampakala'bih Puang Allataala, anna mangcurita mpaui joo pea lako sininna tau to ntajan wattunna Puang Allataala lla'paran kota Yerusalem.
42002039	Ia tonna mangkamo Yusuf sola Maryam mpugauk ngasanni to atoran-Na Puang Allataala, polemi sola tallu re' kota Nazaret jio tana Galilea.
42002040	Ia joo pea samatonggo-tonggonami na memmawatang. Liwa' melo pangtangngaran-Na na napakamoja' tarruhhi Puang Allataala.
42002041	Taun oi, tuli male tomatuan-Na Puang Isa de' kota Yerusalem la mangrame-rame Allo Paskah.
42002042	Ia tonna sangpulo duamo taunna umuru'na to Puang Isa, malemi sola tomatuan-Na lako joo pangramean situru' kabiasanna.
42002043	Ia tonna mangkamo joo pangramean, polemi, apa torro bangpi Puang Isa jio kota Yerusalem na te'da naissenni tomatuan-Na.
42002044	Nasangai kumua malemi sola tau buda. Ia tonna sangngallomo lumingka, mane'ri naangah tomatuan-Na jio tangnga-tangngana rapunna sola sitanda-tandanna.
42002045	Apa te'da naampa'i. Iamo joo polemi de' kota Yerusalem nnangahhi.
42002046	Ia tonna tallung allomo, mane'ri naampa' cumadokko lan Bola Puang Allataala, mpesa'dingngi pangngajahna guru agama na sisulle to sikutana.
42002047	Jangngah ngasan to tau ssa'dingngi, sanga gaja macca na mandalan to pebalin-Na.
42002048	Moi to tomatuan-Na jangngah toda ngkitai. Nakuanmi indona nakua, "Ee mane, ammupasusirakan tee? Selang tonganmokan male nnangahko!"
42002049	Napebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Oo, miangahna' pale'? Te'daraka miissenni kumua ia tee Aku' la jiona' bola-Na Ambe'-Ku' torro?"
42002050	Apa te'da napahangngi tomatuan-Na joo pebalin-Na.
42002051	Mangkai joo polemi Puang Isa sola tomatuan-Na re' kota Nazaret, namengkaturu' bang. Napallan penawa ngasanni indona to ianna joo.
42002052	Samatonggo-tonggonami Puang Isa, samandalan-dalanna pahang-Na, na sanapakamoja'-moja'na too Puang Allataala na sininna tau.
42003001	Ia tonna sangpulo limamo taunna Tomaraja Tiberius mangparenta jio kaparentan Roma, na Pontius Pilatus menjaji gubernur jio tana Yudea, Raja Herodes mangparenta jio tana Galilea, Filipus sile'tona Raja Herodes mangparenta jio tana Iturea na tana Trakhonitis, na ia to Lisanias mangparenta jio tana Abilene.
42003002	Ia to menjaji Imang Lompo, Hanas na Kayafas. Ia joo wattu naparatui Puang Allataala to kadan-Na lako Nabi Yahya anakkana Zakariya jio padang pallawangan.
42003003	Jaji, malemi Nabi Yahya llelei tana to mengguririkkina Sa'dan Yordan mpangpeissenanni to Kareba Kasalamatan. Mangngajahhii nakua, "La mengkatoba' kamu' jio mai dosami, midijio', anna dampangan kamu' Puang Allataala."
42003004	Susi to diuki' lan sura'na Nabi Yesaya tonna anu' kumua, "Den tau metamba-tamba jio padang pallawangan nnajahhi tobuda kumua, 'Pasadianni lalan to Puang, ranteii to lalan la naola.
42003005	Ia to mellombokkona la dibumbun, na ia to membuntu-buntunna la dirantei. Ia to manglekko-lekkona la dipakaruruh, na ia to mengkalo'bong-lo'bongna la dibumbun.
42003006	La nakita ngasan tolino, kumua Puang Allataala mpasalama' tau.' "
42003007	Buda tau ratu lako Nabi Yahya mangpejio'. Nakuanni Nabi Yahya, "Ee, togaja' kamu', susi kamu' bati' ulah balu! Te'da mikullei mpalaian kalemi jio mai pangcalla-Na Puang Allataala to la ratu.
42003008	Iamo joo la mipangpekitan to panggaukan melomi mpamanassai kumua mengkatoba'mo kamu' jio mai dosami! Danggi' misangai, kumua te'damo miladicalla nasaba' bati'na kamu' Nabi Ibrahim. La mikatappa'i kumua, makuasa to Puang Allataala mpupenjaji bati'nai Nabi Ibrahim tee mai batu!
42003009	Sadiamo Puang Allataala la ncalla kamu', susi to garonto' kaju dipasadian wase jiong garonto'na la dita'banganni. Sininna garonto' kaju to te'da namembua melo la dita'bang nadica'bean tama api."
42003010	Mekutanami to tobuda lako Nabi Yahya nakua, "Ia ke susii joo, apamo la kipugauk?"
42003011	Mebalimi nakua, "Ia to tonnampui dua baju, la naben mesa' lako to te'da bajunna. Na ia to tonnampui kande la natawa-tawan tote'da kandena."
42003012	Ba'tu pira-pira passassung ratu toda lako Nabi Yahya la mangpejio'. Mekutanami nakua, "Ee, guru, apamo la kipugauk?"
42003013	Mebalimi nakua, "Danggi' peta'dai la'bi buda na ia to napattantumo tomangparenta."
42003014	Den too ba'tu pira-pira surudadu mekutana toda nakua, "Na ia tee kami', umbomo nakua, apara la kipugauk?" Mebalimi nakua, "Danggi' mipakario-rio tau, ba'tu miparukui mben kamu' doi'. Sukkuru'i bangmi to gajimmi!"
42003015	Ia joo wattu buda tau ntajanni to karatuan-Na Raja Mangpasalama' to nabasse jolomo Puang Allataala tonna anu'. Iamo joo ia to tobuda mangpikkiri' kumua, "Mbai na iamo Raja Mangpasalama' tee Nabi Yahya to masaimo ditajan."
42003016	Apa napauanni Nabi Yahya kumua, "Kujio' kamu' wai, nasaba' mengkatoba'mo kamu' jio mai dosami. Apa den tau la ratu ke mangkana' la njio' kamu' Roh Allataala na den too kamu' dijio' api pangcalla. La'bi makuasa Ia na aku'. Moi la mbukai ulang sapatun-Na, te'da too kusipato'.
42003017	Ia joo tau wa'ding dipangpasusii mesa' tau to sitoe ta'pian la nta'pii pangtambakkana. Ia to resa' malapuh, narempun melo lan pa'pak, apa ia to malangkona la nasumpun lan api dukku tarruh."
42003018	Susimi joo Nabi Yahya nnajahhi tobuda mpake mangrupa-rupa cara, tonna pangpeissenanni to Kareba Kasalamatan.
42003019	Apa nta'tan tooi Raja Herodes to mparenta tana Galilea, nasaba' malei mpubaine Herodias to bainena sile'tona, na budapa to panggaukan gaja' napugauk.
42003020	Iamo joo napangpetarungkuanni to Nabi Yahya. Susimi joo na rrangnganni pissen panggaukan gaja'na.
42003021	Ia tonna mangka ngasanmo tuu lako tau najio' Nabi Yahya, tonna te'dapa naditarungku, najio' toomi Nabi Yahya to Puang Isa. Ia tonna massambajangmo to Puang Isa, titimbakmi to langi',
42003022	namellao to Roh Allataala jao mai mangrupa jangan-jangan nta'paii. Namane' den gamaran-Na Puang Allataala disa'ding nakua, "Ikomo Anak-Ku' to kupakamoja', to mpamasannangna'."
42003023	Ia tonna agi-agi tallung pulomi taunna umuru'na Puang Isa, napamulami to jaman-Na. Ia to naissenna tau, Yusuf to pajajianna. Na ia to njajian Yusuf disanga Eli,
42003024	ia to njajian Eli disanga Matat. Ia to njajian Matat disanga Lewi. Ia to njajian Lewi disanga Malkhi. Ia to njajian Malkhi disanga Yanai. Ia to njajian Yanai disanga Yusuf.
42003025	Ia to njajian Yusuf disanga Matica. Ia to njajian Matica disanga Amos. Ia to njajian Amos disanga Nahum. Ia to njajian Nahum disanga Hesli. Ia to njajian Hesli disanga Nagai.
42003026	Ia to njajian Nagai disanga Maat. Ia to njajian Maat disanga Matica. Ia to njajian Matica disanga Simei. Ia to njajian Simei disanga Yosekh. Ia to njajian Yosekh disanga Yoda.
42003027	Ia to njajian Yoda disanga Yohanan. Ia to njajian Yohanan disanga Resa. Ia to njajian Resa disanga Zerubabel. Ia to njajian Zerubabel disanga Sealtiel. Ia to njajian Sealtiel disanga Neri.
42003028	Ia to njajian Neri disanga Malkhi. Ia to njajian Malkhi disanga Adi. Ia to njajian Adi disanga Kosam. Ia to njajian Kosam disanga Elmadam. Ia to njajian Elmadam disanga Er.
42003029	Ia to njajian Er disanga Yesua. Ia to njajian Yesua disanga Eliezer. Ia to njajian Eliezer disanga Yorim. Ia to njajian Yorim disanga Matat. Ia to njajian Matat disanga Lewi.
42003030	Ia to njajian Lewi disanga Simeon. Ia to njajian Simeon disanga Yehuda. Ia to njajian Yehuda disanga Yusuf. Ia to njajian Yusuf disanga Yonam. Ia to njajian Yonam disanga Elyakim.
42003031	Ia to njajian Elyakim disanga Melea. Ia to njajian Melea disanga Mina. Ia to njajian Mina disanga Matata. Ia to njajian Matata disanga Natan. Ia to njajian Natan disanga Daud.
42003032	Ia to njajian Daud disanga Isai. Ia to njajian Isai disanga Obed. Ia to njajian Obed disanga Boas. Ia to njajian Boas disanga Salmon. Ia to njajian Salmon disanga Nahason.
42003033	Ia to njajian Nahason disanga Aminadab. Ia to njajian Aminadab disanga Admin. Ia to njajian Admin disanga Arni. Ia to njajian Arni disanga Hezron. Ia to njajian Hezron disanga Peres. Ia to njajian Peres disanga Yehuda.
42003034	Ia to njajian Yehuda disanga Yakub. Ia to njajian Yakub disanga Ishak. Ia to njajian Ishak disanga Nabi Ibrahim. Ia to njajian Nabi Ibrahim disanga Terah. Ia to njajian Terah disanga Nahor.
42003035	Ia to njajian Nahor disanga Serug. Ia to njajian Serug disanga Rehu. Ia to njajian Rehu disanga Peleg. Ia to njajian Peleg disanga Eber. Ia to njajian Eber disanga Salmon.
42003036	Ia to njajian Salmon disanga Kenan. Ia to njajian Kenan disanga Arpakhsad. Ia to njajian Arpakhsad disanga Sem. Ia to njajian Sem disanga Nuh. Ia to njajian Nuh disanga Lamekh.
42003037	Ia to njajian Lamekh disanga Metusalah. Ia to njajian Metusalah disanga Henokh. Ia to njajian Henokh disanga Yared. Ia to njajian Yared disanga Mahalaleel. Ia to njajian Mahalaleel disanga Kenan.
42003038	Ia to njajian Kenan disanga Enos. Ia to njajian Enos disanga Set. Ia to njajian Set disanga Adam. Na ia to mpaden Adam Puang Allataala.
42004001	Ia tonna polemo Puang Isa jio mai Sa'dan Yordan nakuasaimi Roh Allataala, namale lako tangnga padang pallawangan, situru' pangpatujun-Na Roh Allataala.
42004002	Torromi jio patang pulo bonginna, napengkulle-kullei Ballisi' ssedei. Te'da bang nakumande to Puang Isa, arannai tangbarah.
42004003	Napengkulle-kullei Ballisi' ssedei mpugauk dosa nakua, "Suai tee batu menjaji kande, sanga Anak Allataalako."
42004004	Mebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, 'Tangngia kande manda to la naputuo tau.' "
42004005	Nasolan omi Ballisi' to Puang Isa de' ngenan majao, napakitanni sangkappidian mata to sininna kaparentan lan lino.
42004006	Mangkadami nakua, "Sininna joo kaparentan sola kamala'biranna la kuben ngasanko, nasaba' diben ngasanmo', nawa'ding kupangben lako to tokukabudai.
42004007	Sininna joo la mupuapa, ke musompana'."
42004008	Mebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, 'La ssompako Puangmu, Puang Allataala, na Ia manda to la mupu-Puang.' "
42004009	Nabawa pole' omi Ballisi' to Puang Isa de' kota Yerusalem, anna solanni de' bubungan Bola Puang Allataala nakuanni, "Polloranko kalemu, sanga Anak Allataalako.
42004010	Te'da muciapa, nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, 'La nasuai Puang Allataala to malaeka'-Na la njagaiko.
42004011	La natimangko, na moi aje-Mu te'da nalatitampah lako batu.' "
42004012	Mebalimi nakua, "Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, 'Danggi' muuji Puangmu, Puang Allataala.' "
42004013	Ia tonna mangkamo to Ballisi' mpengkulle-kullei ssede Puang Isa, malemi ssalaii na ntajan pole' o wattu melo.
42004014	Mangkai joo, nakuasaimi Roh Allataala to Puang Isa napole re' tana Galilea. Kaissenanmi to karebanna lan lili'na tana Galilea.
42004015	Mangngajahhimi lan bola passambajangan, napakala'bih ngasanni tau.
42004016	Malemi Puang Isa lako kota Nazaret to dinii mpelobohhii. Ia tonna Allo Katorroan, susi kabiasanna, malei tama bola passambajangan. Ke'dehmi la mbaca Sura' Allataala,
42004017	nadiben sura'na Nabi Yesaya. Naballahhi, naampa'i tee aya' nabacai kumua,
42004018	"Nakuasaina' Roh Allataala, nasaba' naangka'mo' la mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan lako tokaasi-asi. Nasuamo' mpangpeissenan kadila'paran lako toditarungku, mpapakita tobuta, lla'paran todipandasa.
42004019	Nasuamo' mpangpeissenanni kumua wattun-Namo Puang Allataala mbarakka'i umma'-Na."
42004020	Mangkai joo nalulun pole'mi joo sura' napapolei lako to tonnannai, nacumadokko la mangngajahhi. Mengkita ngasanni to tau lako Puang Isa lan bola passambajangan.
42004021	Napamulami mangngajahhi nakua, "Ia tee aya' misa'ding, jajimi tee too."
42004022	Liwa' makassing to kadan-Na. Iamo joo nasijangngaran to tossa'dingngi napujii, anna mangkada nakua, "Umbo nakua anna gaja allusu' to apa napau!" Apa mangkai joo nakua omo, "Tanganakkanaraka Ia Yusuf!"
42004023	Mangkadami Puang Isa nakua, "Tantu den kamu' la mikua lako Aku' mpake sambenan kada susi tee, 'Ee, tomangjampi! Pamalagahhi kalemu.' Battuananna: ia ke tonganko nabi, la mupugauk tooi ntee kampongmu to tanda mejangngaran kisa'ding mupugauk jio kota Kapernaum."
42004024	Mpatarruhhi kadan-Na nakua, "La miingaran tee kadang-Ku' kumua, te'dapa ia naden nabi dikasiri' jio kampongna!
42004025	La miingaran kumua, ia tonna linona Nabi Elia tonna anu', napebarrangan tallung taun sitangnga, anna karorian la'da' ngasan to tondok. Ia joo wattu buda baine to matemo muanena jio tana Israel.
42004026	Apa moi nasusi joo, ia to Nabi Elia te'da nasuai Puang Allataala male ntulung sala mesa'na mesa' joo baine to matemo muanena jio tana Israel, apa disuari ntulung mesa' baine to matemo muanena jio kota Sarfat jio tana Sidon.
42004027	Susi unai tonna linona Nabi Elisa tonna anu', buda tau masolak jio tana Israel, na te'da bang moi mesa' tau dipamalagah, apa Naaman manda joo to-Siria."
42004028	Ia tonna sa'dingngi joo kadan-Na Puang Isa, magalli ngasan to tau lan joo bola passambajangan.
42004029	Sike'deranmi, naula'ii to Puang Isa lako salean kota, nasolanni lako randan awa' jao buntu, to nanii kota Nazaret. Nasangai la nasumbananni do' awa'.
42004030	Apa naola tangngai to tobuda, anna tarruh male.
42004031	Mangkai joo, malemi Puang Isa lako kota Kapernaum jio tana Galilea. Na ia tonna Allo Katorroan nnajahhi tau jio bola passambajangan.
42004032	Gaja jangngah to tossa'ding pangngajah-Na, nasaba' matongko ke mangkadai.
42004033	Den tau ntuu jio bola passambajangan natamai setang, anna metamba-tamba nakua,
42004034	"Oo, Puang Isa, to-Nazaret, la mupatumbamorakan? Raturokoka la ssabu'ikan? Kuissen kumua indaroko. Ikomo pesua mattantun-Na Puang Allataala!"
42004035	Nagarra'i Puang Isa joo setang nakua, "Kamma'ko, messunko lan mai tee tau!" Napessambakanni setang joo tau jio olona tobuda, namane' messun, apa te'da napa'dikkii.
42004036	Jangngah ngasanmi to tobuda nasipangkada-kada nakua, "Takkajulu' to kadan-Na! Matongko na makuasa mparentai to setang messun namessun tongan."
42004037	Kaissenanmi to karebanna Puang Isa lan joo kota na mengguririkkina.
42004038	Mangkai joo, messunmi Puang Isa lan mai joo bola passambajangan, anna male lako bolana Simon. Makula' kalei to indo matuanna Simon. Iamo joo nameta'da tulung to tau lako Puang Isa.
42004039	Malemi lako sa'dena, nagarra'i joo kula' kale nakua, "Messunko." Ta'demi to kula'na, nata'pa mi'cok mpasadianni kande to toratu.
42004040	Ia tonna la kabuhmo allo, budami tau ratu mbawa sininna repokkona to mangrupa-rupa sakinna lako Puang Isa. Pada nakaka'i tuu lako tomasaki namalagah ngasan.
42004041	Nnula'i tooi setang lan mai buda tau. Ia tuu lako setang messun lan mai tau ntandai Puang Isa anna metamba nakua, "Anak Allataalako!" Apa nagarra'i Puang Isa joo setang, na te'da naeloranni mangkada, nasaba' naissen setang kumua Raja Mangpasalama' to Puang Isa.
42004042	Masawanna tonna ollongmo allo messunmi Puang Isa lan mai joo kota, namale lako pallawangan. Apa ia to tobuda male nnangahhi, na ia tonna ampa'mi, meta'dai lako danggi' namale ssalaii.
42004043	Apa mebalii Puang Isa nakua, "Ia to Kareba Kasalamatan kumua la ratumi Puang Allataala mangparenta susi Raja, la kupangpeissenan too jio kota laen, nasaba' iamo nasuanna' Puang Allataala mentama lino."
42004044	Iamo joo, namale Puang Isa llelei bola passambajangan mangngajahhi jio tana Yudea.
42005001	Den pissen nake'deh Puang Isa jio randan Tasik Genesaret. Sisi'pin-si'pin tongan to tobuda la mpesa'dingngi kadan-Na Puang Allataala.
42005002	Ngkitami dua lopi to Puang Isa torro jio randan tasik, na ia to pangjalana mellao ngasanmi mpemaceroi jalana.
42005003	Endekki to Puang Isa de' lopinna Simon, napeta'dai anna bisei ci'di' jio mai randan tasik. Mangkai joo cumadokkomi lan lopi nnajahhi tobuda.
42005004	Ia tonna mangkamo mangngajahhi, nakuamo lako Simon, "Bise lakoi mandalanna, ammupembuanganni jalamu la njokko bale."
42005005	Napebalii Simon nakua, "Oo Guru, sangbongi bangmokan bo'jo' tongan mangjala, na te'da bang bale kiampa'! Apa melomi kumangjala pole', nasaba' tasuana'."
42005006	Ia tonna buangmi to jalana jio mandalanna, nnalami bale gaja buda, na ia to jalana ci'di'mora naca'ce.
42005007	Iamo joo nako'bi'i to solana jio lopi laen naratu mbalii. Ratu ngasanmi to solana mbalii, napatamai dua lopi joo bale, na ci'di'mora nakaran.
42005008	Ia tonna kitami Simon Petrus joo apa jaji, mengguntu'mi jio olo-Na Puang Isa ssuju'i anna mangkada nakua, "Oo Puang, melo ke tasalaimo', nasaba' tomadosana' dikka' tee!"
42005009	Mangkadai Simon susi joo sanga jangngahhi namalaja' too sola solana ngkitai joo kabudanna bale naala.
42005010	Susi too to solana Simon, iamo to Yakub na Yahya anakkana Zebedeus. Nakuamo Puang Isa lako Simon, "Danggi' mumalaja'! Mammula tee too te'damo mumangjala bale. La kubenko jaman baru nnajahhi tau anna menjaji tonturu'na'."
42005011	Ia tonna rui'mi Simon sola solana joo lopinna lako randan tasik, nasalai ngasanni, namale nturu' Puang Isa.
42005012	Den pissen najio mesa' kota to Puang Isa. Den mesa' muane masolak na maloo' tonganmo. Ia tonna ngkitamo Puang Isa, suju'mi jio olo-Na, anna mengkamase-mase nakua, "Oo Puang, ia ke melohki', manassa kumua makuasaki' mpamalagahna'."
42005013	Nne'te'mi liman-Na Puang Isa, nakaka'i nakua, "Melohna', malagahmoko!" Ia joo wattu ta'pa melomi to kalena.
42005014	Napangnganggai Puang Isa ncuritai joo kajajian lako tau laen, nakuanni, "Maleko lako imang jao kota Yerusalem, mupeta'dai napattantui kumua malagah tonganmoko. Mumane' mpugauk tooi to karoba kamalagaranmu situru' atoranna Nabi Musa, namenjaji butti lako sininna tau."
42005015	Apa moi nasusi joo, ia to karebanna Puang Isa satitaleh-talehnamo, na gaja buda tau ratu mpesa'dingngi ke mangngajahhii. Natuli ratu too to tomasaki meta'da lako Puang Isa anna dipamalagah.
42005016	Mangkai joo male omi Puang Isa massambajang jio padang pallawangan.
42005017	Den pissen, tonna mangngajahhi Puang Isa, naden toda ba'tu pira-pira to-Farisi sola guru agama cumadokko jio. Denni to ratu jio mai kampong lili'na tana Galilea na tana Yudea na den too to ratu jio mai kota Yerusalem. Kuasan-Na Puang Allataala napake to Puang Isa, anna mpamalagah tomasaki.
42005018	Naden tau ratu mbulle mesa' tokupi' dipamamma' bang jiong ampahna. Nnangah lalan umbo nakua la mbawai tama bola lako Puang Isa.
42005019	Te'da nakullei, nasaba' liwa' budanna tau. Iamo joo, nannola jio pelalan endek de' dea bola, natimbakki to dea, namane' rroroanni sola ampahna do' olo-Na Puang Isa lan tangnga tobuda.
42005020	Ia tonna issenmi Puang Isa matumba kamatapparanna tuu lako tau, mangkadami lako joo tokupi', nakua, "Ee todipusile'to, didampanganmoko."
42005021	Pada mangkada lanni penawanna joo guru agama sola to-Farisi nakua, "Indara ia tee tau? Gaja barani Ia mpapada Puang Allataala kale-Na! Te'da tau wa'ding ndampangan tomadosa, saliwanna Puang Allataala."
42005022	Apa naissen Puang Isa apa to lan penawanna tuu lako guru agama sola to-Farisi. Iamo joo nakuanni, "Apara to mipikkiri'?
42005023	Umbonnara marawa, dikuaraka, 'Didampanganmoko', ba'tu dikuaraka, 'Ke'dehmoko mulumingka.'
42005024	Apa ia tee wattu la kupakitan kamu', kumua makuasana' Aku', Anak Mentolino, ndampangan tomadosa lan tee lino. Iamo joo kukua lako tee tokupi', 'Ke'dehmoko, angka'i tuu ampahmu, mupole.' "
42005025	Ta'pa ke'dehmi jio olona tobuda, naangka'i to ampahna napole mpakala'bih Puang Allataala.
42005026	Jangngah ngasan tuu lako tau anna mpakala'bih Puang Allataala. Silajatan ngasanni nakua, "Liwa' mejangngaran to apa takita tee allo!"
42005027	Mangkai joo messunmi Puang Isa, na ngkita mesa' passassung disanga Lewi cumadokko lan kantoro'na. Nakua Puang Isa lako, "Maleko mai, nturu'na', kupuanak guruko!"
42005028	Ta'pa ke'dehmi, napatorroi to jamanna, anna male nturu'i.
42005029	Ia tonna mangkamo joo, mangmaroah-roahmi Lewi jio bolana ntoratu Puang Isa. Buda passassung na tolaen nasolan kumande.
42005030	Tangmasannang to ba'tu pira-pira to-Farisi sola guru agama, to nturu' toda pangngajaranna to-Farisi, anna kutanaii to anak gurun-Na Puang Isa nakua, "Ciapari mikumande sola passassung na totangnturu' atoran agama?"
42005031	Mebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Ia to tomalagah te'da naparallu tomangjampi, apa to tomasakira mparallui tomangjampi.
42005032	Te'da kuratu la ntulung tossanga kalena tomelo, apa ratura' ntulung tomadosa, dikua namengkatoba' jio mai dosana."
42005033	Den tau nakua lako Puang Isa, "Ianna anak gurunna Nabi Yahya sola anak gurunna to-Farisi, tuli puasa na massambajang, apa ianna anak gurun-Ta' kumande bang ia namangngiso'."
42005034	Mebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Wa'dingraka misua to toratu puasa jio pangmaroasan tobotting, ke sola unapi tobotting muane? Tantu te'da!
42005035	Apa la den wattunna na la diala jio mai tangnga-tangngana joo tobotting muane, iamo to Aku'. Ia joo wattu, mane'ri puasa tuu lako tau, iamo tee anak gurung-Ku'."
42005036	Nacuritanpa Puang Isa tee pangpasusian nakua, "Te'da tau nca'cean baju baru napangtampiranni lako baju maluse. Nasaba' la mangca'ceanni joo baju baru na ia to kaen petampih baru te'da namelo dikita jio baju maluse.
42005037	Susi toomi joo, te'da tau mpatama anggoro' baru tama pangpanian malusemo to dikabua' jio mai balulang. Nasaba' ia namangkamburamo joo anggoro' baru, tiba'tui joo pangpanian malusemo, natibaku to anggoro'. Jaji la sajang duai joo anggoro' sola pangpanianna.
42005038	Ia to anggoro' baru, la dipatama todapi pangpanian baru.
42005039	Na te'damo tau madoang nniso' anggoro' baru ke biasami nniso' anggoro' masaimo, nasaba' nakua, 'la'bi melo ia to anggoro' masaimo.' "
42006001	Den pissen tonna Allo Katorroan nannola jio bara'bah gose' Puang Isa, na ngge'te gose' to anak gurun-Na. Naridii jiong pala'na natiboi.
42006002	Ba'tu pira-pira to-Farisi mpasalai nakua, "Ciapari na te'da mituru'i to atoran agamanta', ammipugaukki to dipemalian dipugauk ke Allo Katorroan?"
42006003	Mebalimi Puang Isa nakua, "Tantu mibacamo to apa napugauk Daud, tonna tangbarahmo sola surudadunna.
42006004	Mentamami bola to dinii ssompa Puang Allataala, naalai nakandei to roti dipangngolo lako Puang Allataala, naben tooi to surudadunna. Nasitonganna, ianna situru' atoran agamanta', imang manda ia to wa'ding ngkandei joo roti."
42006005	Nakua unapa Puang Isa, "Puangnana' Allo Katorroan tee Aku', Anak Mentolino. Jaji, makuasana' mpattantui apa to wa'ding dipugauk ke Allo Katorroan."
42006006	Ia tonna Allo Katorroan laen omo, malemi Puang Isa mangngajahhi jio bola passambajangan. Ntuu jio den mesa' tau to mate sangbali limanna.
42006007	Ba'tu pira-pira guru agama sola to-Farisi la nnangah bang kasalanna Puang Isa anna wa'ding mparapa'i. Jaji, napesa' tarruhhi kumua ba'tu la mpamalagahhi tau ke Allo Katorroanni.
42006008	Apa naissen Puang Isa to lan penawanna tuu lako tau. Iamo joo nakuanni joo tomate sangbali limanna, "Maleko mai, mujenjen lan tangnga." Ke'dehmi, najenjen.
42006009	Mekutanami Puang Isa lako joo tompesa'i nakua, "Ianna situru' atoran agama, apara to wa'ding tapugauk ke Allo Katorroan? Manggauk meloraka, ba'tu manggauk gaja'raka? Mpasalama'riki'ka padanta' rupa tau, ba'tu mbunoriki'ka padanta' rupa tau?"
42006010	Mengkitami Puang Isa lako sininna tau, namane' ngkuanni joo tomate sangbali limanna, "E'te'i tuu limammu!" Nae'te'mi to limanna, namelo pole'mo.
42006011	Gaja galli tuu lako guru agama sola to-Farisi anna sipangkadaii, apa to la napugauk lako Puang Isa.
42006012	Mangkai joo, malemi Puang Isa de' buntu la massambajang. Massambajangmi jao siupuh bongi lako Puang Allataala.
42006013	Ia tonna mariwangmo, nasuai ratu to tomenturu' lako kale-Na anna pileii sangpulo dua to nasangai rasulu', iamo to:
42006014	Simon (to nasanga too Petrus), na Andreas to sile'tona, Yakub na Yahya, Filipus na Bartolomeus,
42006015	Matius na Tomas, Yakub anakkana Alfeus na Simon (to disanga too tobarani),
42006016	Yudas anakkana Yakub na Yudas Iskariot to undinna mpangpejokkoan Puang Isa.
42006017	Ia tonna solohmo Puang Isa sola anak gurun-Na jao mai buntu, kendenmi jio padang malappa. Buda tau to menturu'mo lako kale-Na sirempun ntuu jio na buda too tau ratu jio mai lili'na tana Yudea, kota Yerusalem, na kota Tirus sola kota Sidon jio randan tasik.
42006018	Ia tuu lako tau ratu la mpesa'dingngi pangngajah-Na Puang Isa, na la dipamalagah jio mai mangrupa-rupa sakinna. Ia to tonatamai setang ratu too nadipamalagah.
42006019	Napengkulle-kullei ngasan tuu lako tau ngkaka' Puang Isa, nasaba' den kuasa messun lan mai kale-Na mpamalagah tau.
42006020	Nakitami Puang Isa to tomenturu' lako kale-Na namangkada nakua, "Masannang kamu' tokaasi-asi, nasaba' kamu'mo umma'-Na Puang Allataala.
42006021	Masannang kamu' to tangbarah tee too, nasaba' la dipebarahhi kamu'. Masannang kamu' to kumarrak tee too, nasaba' la metawa kamu'!
42006022	Masannang kamu', ke dikaba'ci kamu', ke diula'i kamu', ke dicacca kamu', sola ke disanga kamu' togaja', nasaba' mituru'na' Aku', Anak Mentolino.
42006023	Susi todamo joo napugauk tojolona joo tau lako tuu lako nabi tonna anu'. Ia ke susii joo, la masannang kamu' mimenari', nasaba' buda pahalami jao suruga.
42006024	Apa macilaka kamu' to sugih, nasaba' mangkamo miampa' to kamasannangan lan kasugiranmi.
42006025	Macilaka kamu' to barahmo tee too, nasaba' la tangbarah kamu'. Macilaka kamu' to metawamo tee too, nasaba' la masse penawammi mikumarrak.
42006026	Macilaka kamu', ke napakala'bih kamu' tau, nasaba' susi toomo napugauk tojolona tuu lako tau mpakala'bih nabi tangtongan tonna anu'."
42006027	Mangngajahhimi Puang Isa nakua, "Kupasan kamu', to mpesa'dingngi kadang-Ku'! Susi tee, pakamoja'i to ewalimmi, mimanggauk melo lako to ngkaba'ci kamu'.
42006028	Barakka'i to tontampakki kamu' ropu. Passambajanganni to tompakario-rio kamu'.
42006029	Ia ke den tau ssala'pa popomu sangbali, patananan pissenni to sangbalinna. Ianna den tau rrampa baju landomu, ma'namo naala tooi to bajummu.
42006030	Ia ke den tau mpeta'dai kamu' apa, benni to napeta'da. Na ia ke apammi dirampa, danggi'mo mipeta'da pole'i.
42006031	Pugaukki lako padammi rupa tau, to apa mikadoangngi la napugauk lako kalemi.
42006032	Ia ke mipakamoja'i to tompakamoja' kamu', apara kala'bianmi? Moi tomadosa mpakamoja' too to tompakamoja'i.
42006033	Ia ke mpugauk kamu' kameloan lako tompugauk melo lako kalemi, apara kala'bianmi? Moi tomadosa napugauk tooi susi joo.
42006034	Na ia ke mpangpeindanan kamu' doi', apa lako manda towa'ding mbajah pole'i, apara kala'bianmi? Moi tomadosa sipaindanan, sanga nakatappa'i kumua la natarima pole' pada to napangpeindanan.
42006035	Te'da na la susi joo! Sibalikanna, pakamoja'i to ewalimmi, na la manggauk melo kamu' lako kalena. La mangpaindan kamu', na danggi'mo mitajanni to polena. Ia ke susii joo, la buda to pahalami, na la menjaji kamu' anak Puang Allataala Jao Majaona. Nasaba' melo to penawan-Na Puang Allataala lako totangnnissen mangkurru sumanga' na tomanggauk gaja'.
42006036	Mamase kamu', susi Ambe'mi Puang Allataala mamase!"
42006037	Mangpangngingaranmi Puang Isa nakua, "Danggi' mipasala padammi rupa tau, anna danggi' napasala kamu' Puang Allataala. Danggi' mimangcacca, anna danggi' nacacca kamu' Puang Allataala. Dampanganni to tolaen, anna dampangan toda kamu' Puang Allataala.
42006038	Mangpabengan kamu' lako tolaen, anna ben toda kamu' Puang Allataala. La naben kamu' buda, susi ke mpake pesuka' melo, to dirodo, ditemme', na diboncoi too. Nasaba' ia to pesuka' misukatan tau, la napake too Puang Allataala ssuka' kamu'."
42006039	Nacuritan pole'pa Puang Isa tee pangpasusian nakua, "Ia ke pada tobuta sirenden, manassa la melolinni ia do' garuang.
42006040	Ia to mesa' passikola te'da nala'bi matande na gurunna. Apa ia ke tamma'mi melajah, la menjaji padami gurunna.
42006041	Ciapari mikitai to bulicak lan matanna padammi rupa tau, anna kaju sangbatang lan matammi te'da misa'dingngi?
42006042	Umbo la mikua mangkada lako padammi rupa tau, 'Ee mane! Ake'mo na aku' nnalai tuu bulicak lan mai matammu', anna kaju sangbatang lan matammi te'da mikitai? Ee, tomajekkong! Alaii jolo' to kaju sangbatang lan matammi! Ianna macoramo pengkitanmi, mane'ra kamu' kullei nnalaii to bulicak lan mai matanna padammi rupa tau."
42006043	Mangngajahhimi Puang Isa nakua, "Te'da ia to kaju melo buanna mpaden bua gaja'. Susi toomi to kaju gaja' buanna, te'da nampaden bua melo.
42006044	Buanna dinii ntandai to kaju. Pangngala duri te'da namembua ara, na duri kamban te'da namembua anggoro'.
42006045	Ia to tomelo penawanna, la melona ia to napau, nasaba' kameloan manda lan penawanna. Na ia to togaja', gaja'na bangra napau, nasaba' kagajatan manda lan penawanna. Nasaba' apa lan penawanna tau, iamo napau timu."
42006046	Mangngajahhimi Puang Isa nakua, "Ciapari mipekapuangngina', apa te'da mipugaukki to apa kupauan kamu'?
42006047	Indara to wa'ding dipasusianni to toratu lako Aku' napesa'dingngii tee kadang-Ku', anna pugaukki? Melo ke kupauan kamu'.
42006048	Ia joo tau dipasusi to tolangkabua' bola, napemandalanni ngkali padang, anna kabua' pondasi jao batu. Wattunna saba' to wai sa'dan ratu ntumpai joo bola, te'da natigesu' jio ngenanna, nasaba' dipake'dehhi jao pondasi batu.
42006049	Apa ia to tossa'ding kadang-Ku', na te'da napugaukki, iamo dipasusi to tau mpake'deh bola, te'da napajaoi pondasi batu. Wattunna saba' to wai ratu ntumpai, ta'pa ro'pokmi!"
42007001	Ia tonna mangkamo Puang Isa mpau ngasanni joo lako tobuda, malemi tama kota Kapernaum.
42007002	Den kamandang surudadu Roma ntuu jio, na den kaunanna to gaja napakamoja'. Masakii joo kaunanna nalamate mandami.
42007003	Ia tonna sa'dingmi to karebanna Puang Isa, ssuami ba'tu pira-pira pekaamberan to-Yahudi namale mpeta'dai lako Puang Isa, anna ratu jio bolana mpamalagahhi joo kaunanna.
42007004	Ia tonna sitammumo Puang Isa, memmasei nakuanni, "Ee Puang, sipato' tatulung joo kamandang,
42007005	nasaba' nakamaseiki' to kita' to-Yahudi, nakabuatankan bola passambajangan."
42007006	Malemi Puang Isa sola joo tau. Ia tonna mandoppi'mo bolana joo kamandang, ssuami solana mpauanni nakua, "Oo, Puang! Danggi'mo tabojo'i bang kale-Ta' male lako bolaku'. Te'da kusipato' la ntarimaki' jio bolaku'.
42007007	Iamo joo na te'da too kusipato' ssitammuanki'. Jaji, mangkada bangmiki', napumalagahhi to kaunanku'.
42007008	Nasaba' ia tee aku' tonturu'na' parentana tomparentana', na den toda surudadu kuparenta to nturu' parentaku'. Ia angkusuai to surudadu kumua, 'Maleko!', nang la malei, na ia angkukua lako to laenna, 'Maleko mai!' nang la ratui. Na ia angkusuai to kaunanku' kumua, 'Pugaukki tee!' nang la napugaukki ia."
42007009	Jangngah Puang Isa ssa'dingngi joo kadanna. Messailemi anna mangkada lako tobuda to undi nturu'i nakua, "La miingaran! Liwa' matappa' tee tau! Te'dapa tau kuampa' kamatapparan susi tee, moi lan tangnga-tangngana to-Israel."
42007010	Ia tonna polemo lako bolana kamandang joo todisua, malagahmi joo kaunanna.
42007011	Tangmasai mangkanna joo, malemi Puang Isa sola anak gurun-Na lako kota Nain, na buda too tau undi nturu'i.
42007012	Ia tonna mandoppi'mo lako babangan kota, denmi tau mbulle tomate messun lan mai kota. Ia joo tomate, mesa' pea muane, anak tungga'na mesa' baine to matemo muanena. Buda pangtondokan ssolanni to indona joo pea.
42007013	Ia tonna kitami Puang Isa joo baine, massemi penawan-Na nakuanni, "Ee indo', danggi' takumarrak!"
42007014	Nakandoppi'mi Puang Isa joo bullean nakaka'i. Kenden ngasanmi to tomamulle. Mangkadami nakua, "Ee, mane, mi'cikko!"
42007015	Mi'cikmi na cumadokko joo pea muane tuo pole'mo anna mangkada-kada. Nasolanmi Puang Isa lako indona.
42007016	Malaja' ngasanmi tuu lako tau na mpakala'bih Puang Allataala nakua, "Denmo mesa' nabi tonggo lan tangnga-tangngata'. Ratumi Puang Allataala mpasalama' umma'-Na!"
42007017	Kaissenanmi to karebanna Puang Isa jio lili'na tana Yudea na mengguririkkina.
42007018	Napauanni anak gurunna Nabi Yahya sininna to apa mangka jaji. Mangkai joo natambaimi Nabi Yahya to dua anak gurunna,
42007019	anna suai male ngkutanai Puang Isa kumua, "Kita'moraka Raja Mangpasalama' to kitajan, ba'tu la ntajanpakan tau laen?"
42007020	Malemi sola dua lako Puang Isa nakua, "Nasuakan gurungki' mekutana lako kita', 'Kita'moraka Raja Mangpasalama' to kitajan, ba'tu la ntajanpakan tau laen?' "
42007021	Ia joo wattu napamalagah Puang Isa to mangrupa-rupa sakinna tau, nnula'i buda setang na mpapakita buda tobuta.
42007022	Iamo joo napebalii nakua, "Polemo kamu' mipauanni gurummi apa to mikita sola misa'ding: pakitamo to tobuta, lumingkamo to tokupi', dipamalagahmo to tomasolak, pasa'dingmo to tomataru, dipatuo pole'mo to tomate, na Kareba Kasalamatan dipangpeissenanmo lako tomakario-rio.
42007023	Masannang tongan to tau tangmenassan ntarimana'."
42007024	Ia tonna polemo to pesuanna Nabi Yahya, napamulami Puang Isa mpaui lako tobuda to Nabi Yahya nakua, "Apara male mikita jio padang pallawangan? Te'da mimale ngkita sanglambah reu nairi' angin.
42007025	Apara male mikita? Tomangpakean balloraka? Te'da too, sanga ia to tau mangpakean susi joo na kala'bian, torro lanri ia salassa'!
42007026	Jaji, apara male mikita? La ngkitara kamu'ka nabi? Tongan. La miingaran kumua, la'bipa ia na nabi.
42007027	Nasaba' Nabi Yahyamo to mpasadia tau la ntarimana'. Susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala mpau Nabi Yahya kumua, Mangkadai Puang Allataala, 'Iamo tee pesuang-Ku', to kusua la njoloanko, anna pemakassingngii to lalan la muola!' "
42007028	Nakuapa Puang Isa, "Ingaranni, lan tee lino te'da tau la'bi mala'bih na Nabi Yahya, apa moi nasusi joo, ia to tokaminang majiong jio mai umma'-Na Puang Allataala, la'bi mala'bihpa ia na Nabi Yahya."
42007029	Sininna tobuda mpesa'dingngi kadan-Na Puang Isa, susi toomi to passassung, napada nnakui kumua tongan to Puang Allataala. Iamo joo napangpejioran kalena lako Nabi Yahya.
42007030	Apa ia to to-Farisi na guru agama cia'i ntarima akkatta-Na Puang Allataala to mpatu kalena, nacia'i najio' Nabi Yahya.
42007031	Mangkada pole' omi Puang Isa kumua, "Apara la kupasusianni tee tau too allo? Apara dipapadanni?
42007032	Susi to pea sicadokkoan jio pasa' mpetambanni to solana, 'Kipassulinganmo kamu', apa cia' kamu' menari'! Mpakkelonganmokan kelong kamasussan na te'da mimbating!'
42007033	Battuananna: ratumo to Nabi Yahya, napuasa na te'da naiso' anggoro', mikua ora kumua, 'Natamaii setang!'
42007034	Na ratu omo' Aku', Anak Mentolino, kukumande sola mangngiso', mikua omo kua, 'Kitai joo tomaullak, pangngiso', soba'na passassung sola togaja' sipa'na.'
42007035	Apa moi nasusi joo, mandalan tangngah to Puang Allataala, na ia to kamandalanan tangngah-Na napapajan sininna tonturu'i."
42007036	Den mesa' to-Farisi disanga Simon ntambai Puang Isa ratu kumande jio bolana. Malemi Puang Isa lako, nacumadokko kumande sola.
42007037	Den mesa' baine lan joo kota mpugauk bang panggaukan gaja'. Ia tonna sa'dingngi kumua ia to Puang Isa kumandei jio bolana Simon to-Farisi, malemi lako mbawa minynya'-minynya' lan bittolo' pualam.
42007038	Ia tonna ratumo lako, malemi ke'deh jio boko'-Na Puang Isa nakumarrak jio to' aje-Na, anna bosokkii wai matanna. Napa'dii beluakkana joo aje-Na Puang Isa, anna udungngi, namane' ntua'i minynya'-minynya'.
42007039	Ia tonna kitami Simon to-Farisi to apa napugauk joo baine, mangkadai lan penawanna, "Ia kenna la nabi tee tau, la naissen ia kumua tomatumbara joo baine ssapuii. Tantu la naissen kumua tomadosa!"
42007040	Nakuamo Puang Isa lako Simon to-Farisi, "Ee, Simon! Den la kupauanko." Napebalimi nakua, "Ie', tapauanmo' Guru."
42007041	Nakuamo Puang Isa, "Den mesa' tau mpangpeindanan doi'na lako dua tau. Mesa' to napaindanni lima ratuh dinar, na ia to mesa' limang pulora.
42007042	Ia joo tokaindanan sola dua pada tangnakullemo mbajah indanna. Melo penawanna joo to mpaindannii anna puttai bangmi to indanna. Jaji, indannara joo tau sola duai to la'bi la mpakamoja'i joo tompaindannii?"
42007043	Mebalimi Simon to-Farisi nakua, "Kusanga ia to budanna indanna diputtai!" Nakuamo Puang Isa, "Tongan tuu pebalimmu."
42007044	Mengkitami Puang Isa lako joo baine namangkada lako Simon to-Farisi nakua, "Kitari tee baine! Ratuna' inde' bolamu, te'da mupasadianna' wai la kubasean aje-Ku', apa ia tee baine nabasei to aje-Ku' wai matanna, namane' mpa'dii beluakkana.
42007045	Ia tongkumentama bolamu, te'da muudungna', apa ia tee baine nena'pa te'da bang natorroii nnudung aje-Ku'.
42007046	Te'da muminynyakkii to ulung-Ku', apa ia tee baine natua'i minynya'-minynya' to aje-Ku'.
42007047	La miingaran kumua, liwa' pangpakamoja'na, nasaba' didampanganmo ia, moi nabuda dosa napugauk! Ia to toci'di'ra dosana didampangan, la ci'di' toora pangpakamoja'na."
42007048	Nakuamo Puang Isa lako joo baine, "Didampanganmoko."
42007049	Ia tuu lako tonasolan Puang Isa kumande sipangkada-kadai nakua, "Indara ia tee tau nawa'ding ndampangan tomadosa?"
42007050	Apa nakua Puang Isa lako joo baine, "Dipasalama'moko, nasaba' mukatappa'ina'. Paela'-ela' bangmoko lako lalan!"
42008001	Mangkai joo, malemi Puang Isa llelei buda kota sola kampong mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan kumua la ratumi Puang Allataala mangparenta susi Raja. Ia to sangpulo dua anak gurun-Na undi nturu'i.
42008002	Den ba'tu pira-pira baine undi too nturu'i. Den to mangka naula'i Puang Isa to setang lan mai kalena sola napamalagah jio mai sakinna. Susinna Maryam Magdalena to pitu setang napissenni naula'i lan mai kalena.
42008003	Susi too Yohana, bainena Khuza. (Ia to Khuza nnurusu' doi'na Raja Herodes.) Den tooi Susanna na ba'tu pira-pirapa baine laenna. Ia tuu lako baine pada mpasadia kaparalluanna Puang Isa sola anak gurun-Na mpake kasugiranna.
42008004	Te'da ka'tunna to tau male lako Puang Isa jio mai kota laen. Ia tonna budamo tau sirempun, mangngajahhimi Puang Isa mpake pangpasusian nakua,
42008005	"Den mesa' pangdusung male nnamboh banne. Ia tonna ambohmi, den to ta'pah do' lalan nasilesei tau, anna cappu'ii manuk-manuk.
42008006	Den too to ta'pah do' batu-batu to ci'di'ra litakkana. Ia tonna cumucukmo, madoi' bang malaju, nasaba' makase to litak nanii tuo.
42008007	Den too to ta'pah lan tangnga duri. Natuo sola, apa saloboh-lobohnami joo duri, nasirimpihhii joo tananan arannai mate.
42008008	Apa den too to ta'pah do' litak malompo. Maloboranmi, namembua manglokkon pessaratuh." Ia tonna mangkamo Puang Isa mangngajahhi naandongngimi gamaran-Na nakua, "Ingaranni to apa mangka misa'ding, sanga ketalinga kamu'!"
42008009	Napekutananmi anak gurun-Na Puang Isa apara battuananna joo pangpasusian.
42008010	Nakuamo Puang Isa mebali, "Dibenmo kamu' barakka' la nnissenni to apa tangnaissen tau kumua la ratui Puang Allataala mangparenta susi Raja. Apa ia to tau laen diajahhi mpake pangpasusian, dikua moi napemakitaii, apa te'da nakitai. Moi nada'tan bang mpesa'dingngii, apa te'da napahangngi."
42008011	Napauanmi Puang Isa battuananna joo pangpasusian nakua, "Ia to banne iamo to kadan-Na Puang Allataala.
42008012	Ia to banne ta'pah do' lalan dipasangrapangngi to tossa'ding kadan-Na Puang Allataala. Apa ratui to Ballisi' rrampai joo kada mangkamo nasa'ding, dikua anna danggi' namatappa' na te'da nadipasalama'.
42008013	Ia to banne ta'pah do' batu-batu dipasangrapangngi to tossa'ding kadan-Na Puang Allataala anna masannang ntarimai. Apa te'da natorro tongan lan penawanna. Te'da namasai matappa', nasaba' ianna den pecoba rratui, ta'pa balik pole'mi.
42008014	Ia to banne ta'pah lan tangnga duri dipasangrapangngi to tossa'ding kadan-Na Puang Allataala, apa mpuselangngi katuoanna. Madoang bangri la sugih mpusannang katuoan lan lino, to nni'pinni joo kada lan penawanna, anna te'da namembua melo.
42008015	Ia to banne tuo jio litak malompo dipasangrapangngi to tossa'ding kadan-Na Puang Allataala, napallan penawa meloi na maruruh penawanna, namatappa' tarruh sanggenna membua."
42008016	Mangngajahhimi Puang Isa nakua, "Te'da tau mpadukku palita nasamboii busu, ba'tu napajiongngi sulluk katindoan, apa napajaori ngenan palita, dikua naarrangngi to tau ke mentamai bola.
42008017	Te'da to membuninna tangladipangpekitan undinna, na te'da to tangdipaunna tangladipau anna kaissenan undinna.
42008018	Iamo joo ingaran meloi tee apa misa'ding. Nasaba' ia to tonnampuimo buda apa la dirangngannipa la'bi buda. Apa ia to totangnnampui apa, ia to apa ci'di'mora naampui, la dialai pissen."
42008019	Ia tonna mangkamo joo, ratumi indo-Na sola sile'to-Na Puang Isa, apa te'da nakullei sikita, nasaba' gaja buda tau ntalimbungngi to Puang Isa.
42008020	Denmi mesa' tau mpauanni nakua, "Oo Puang, jioi salean to indo-Ta' sola sile'to-Ta'. Madoangngi ssikitanki'."
42008021	Apa mebalii Puang Isa nakua, "Sininna to tau ssa'ding kadan-Na Puang Allataala napugaukki, iamo indo-Ku' sola sile'to-Ku'."
42008022	Den pissen naendek de' lopi to Puang Isa sola anak gurun-Na. Nakuanni, "Melo ke talamban lian sambali'na tasik." Malemi manglopi.
42008023	Ia tonna malemo manglopi lian, mamma'i to Puang Isa. Te'da namasai, ratumi to kalimpuru. Ia to lopinna natamaimi wai na la tallanmi.
42008024	Malemi to anak gurun-Na ntundanni nakua, "Oo, Guru, la tallanmiki'!" Mi'cokmi to Puang Isa nagarra'i to kalimpuru sola bombang. Radanmi to kalimpuru narapa' to tasik.
42008025	Nakuamo lako anak gurun-Na, "Ciapari na te'dara mikatappa'ina'!" Jangngah ngasanmi sola silajatanni nasipangkada-kada sikutana, "Indara ia sitonganna tee tau na moi angin sola bombang nturu' tooi to parenta-Na!"
42008026	Lambanmi Puang Isa sola anak gurun-Na lian tana Gerasa sambali'na Tasik Galilea.
42008027	-
42008029	Ntuu jio den mesa' tau jio mai kota to natamai buda setang. Masaimo tangmebaju na te'damo namadoang torro jio bola. Torro lan bangmira lo'ko' tomate. Pembudai nakuasai setang, anna moi dipumpung rante bassi to limanna sola ajena nadiampai bang, apa naka'tu-ka'tupa to pumpungna, na male ngkinjarasanni setang lako padang pallawangan. Ia tonna mellaomo Puang Isa jao mai lopi, ia joo tonatamai setang male mpessitammuii. Ia tonna kitami to Puang Isa, nakandoppi'mi nasuju' jio olo-Na, nnandongngi mangkada nakua, "Oo, Puang Isa, Anak Allataala to kaminang makuasa! La tapatumbamora' tee? Meta'dana', danggi' dikka' tacallana'!" Mangkadai susi joo, nasaba' nasuai Puang Isa joo setang messun lan mai kalena.
42008030	Nakutanaimi Puang Isa nakua, "Indara sangammu?" Mebalimi nakua, "Disangana' Legiun", nasaba' buda setang lan kalena.
42008031	Meta'dami tuu lako setang lako Puang Isa kumua, danggi' naula'i tamai posi' tana to gaja dalan.
42008032	Te'da namambela jio mai ntuu joo, den buda bai massumben jio sare buntu. Ia joo setang meta'da lako Puang Isa nakua, "Eloranmokan mentama ntuu lako bai." Natarimai Puang Isa joo peta'danna.
42008033	Messunmi joo setang lan mai joo tau, namentama bai. Sikinjarasanmi tuu lako bai jao mai awa', nampentujoan kalena do' tasik, anna makkan ngasan.
42008034	Ia tonna kitami tomangrewa bai joo apa jaji sikinjarasanmi male mpaui tama kota na kampong mengguririkkina.
42008035	Simessunanmi to tau ngkitai to apa mangka jaji. Ia tonna ratumo lako to nanii Puang Isa, nakitami joo todiula'i to setang lan mai kalena cumadokko jiong to' aje-Na Puang Isa mangpakeanmo, na melomo pangngingaranna. Malaja' ngasanmi tuu lako tau.
42008036	Ia joo tomangrewa ngkitai to apa jaji, ncuritanni umbo nakua joo setang messun lan mai joo tau.
42008037	Napeta'dami to-Gerasa lako Puang Isa kumua nasalaii joo tondok, nasaba' gaja laja'i. Endekmi de' lopi to Puang Isa nalamban pole' lian.
42008038	Ia joo todiula'i to setang lan mai kalena meta'dai lako Puang Isa la undi nturu'i. Apa nasuari Puang Isa pole nakua,
42008039	"Polemoko mupangpeissenanni to apa mangka napugauk Puang Allataala lako kalemu." Polemi joo tau, namale llingkai joo kota mpangpeissenanni to apa mangka napugauk Puang Isa lako kalena.
42008040	Ia tonna lamban pole' omo Puang Isa lian sambali'na tasik, marioi to tobuda ntammuii, nasaba' natajan tarruhhi.
42008041	Ratumi Yairus mesa' kapala bola passambajangan jio ntuu joo kota. Suju'mi jio olo-Na Puang Isa namengkamalah-malah tongan kumua namale lako bolana,
42008042	nasaba' la mate mandamo to mesa-mesanna anakkana baine umuru' sangpulo duamo taunna. Malemi Puang Isa lako bolana Yairus na gaja buda tau nturu'i ssisi'pin-si'pinnii.
42008043	Den mesa' baine to sangpulo duamo taunna maparri' tongan nasa'ding, nasaba' macarepa tarruh bangngi. Puramo to ewananna nabaluk napake male mangpejampi lako dottoro', apa te'da nakullei mpamalagahhi.
42008044	Malemi mpendete'i Puang Isa jio mai boko'-Na, anna kaka'i to tampak baju lando-Na, nata'pa te'damo rara messun.
42008045	Mekutanami Puang Isa nakua, "Indara to ngkaka' baju lando-Ku'?" Te'da bang tau mangngaku, anna mangkada Petrus, "Oo, Puang! Liwa' buda tau ntalimbungki' nasisi'pin-si'pinniki'!"
42008046	Apa nakua Puang Isa, "Den tau ngkaka'na'. Kuissenni joo, sanga den kuasa messun lan mai kale-Ku'."
42008047	Ia joo baine mbe'behmi na malaja', nasaba' kaissenanni to apa mangka napugauk, anna suju' jio olo-Na Puang Isa. Napaui jio olona tobuda ciapari nakaka'i to tampak baju lando-Na Puang Isa, napau too kumua ta'pa te'damo rara messun joo wattu.
42008048	Nakuamo Puang Isa lako joo baine, "Ee, anak-Ku'! Malagahmoko, nasaba' mukatappa'ina'. Paela'-ela' bangmoko lako lalan."
42008049	Ia tonna mangkada unapa Puang Isa susi joo, ratumi mesa' todisua jio mai bolana Yairus. Nakua lako Yairus, "Danggi' omo tasussai tuu Guru male lako bola. Matemi to becce'ta'."
42008050	Ia tonna sa'dingngi Puang Isa joo kareba, nakuamo lako Yairus, "Danggi' mumalaja', matappa' bangmoko lako Aku', nang la salama' to becce'mu."
42008051	Ia tonna ratumo lako bolana Yairus, te'da tau laen naeloran mentama, saliwanna Petrus, Yahya, Yakub sola tomatuanna joo pea.
42008052	Sikarrakan to tau mbatingngii. Apa nakua Puang Isa ngkuanni, "Danggi' mikumarrak! Te'da ia namate, apa mamma'ri!"
42008053	Napetawa-tawaimi tau to Puang Isa, nasaba' naissen kumua matemi ia.
42008054	Natoemi Puang Isa to limanna joo pea namangkada nakua, "Ee becce', mi'cokko!"
42008055	Polemi sunga'na joo pea, nata'pa mi'cik. Nasuami Puang Isa to tau mbenni kande.
42008056	Jangngah to tomatuanna ngkitai joo kajajian. Apa naanggai Puang Isa kumua danggi' naden tau napauan.
42009001	Natambaimi Puang Isa to sangpulo dua anak gurun-Na sirempun, nabenni kuasa nnula'i setang, na mpamalagah tomasaki.
42009002	Nasuami sola ngasan male mpangpeissenanni kumua la ratumi Puang Allataala mangparenta susi Raja, nasua tooi male mpamalagah tomasaki.
42009003	Napasanni kumua, "Ia ammimale, danggi' mibawa apa-apa, susinna tekken, ba'tu sepu', ba'tu kande, ba'tu doi', ba'tu baju duang lambah.
42009004	Ia to bola dinii ntarima melo kamu', jiomo kamu' torro sanggenna male pole' kamu' mpatarruh kalingkanmi.
42009005	Apa ia ammiratu lako mesa' kota, na te'da miditarima, salai joo kota, mipentambakanni to carepa jio ajemi, la mpangngingaranni tuu lako tau to kasalanna!"
42009006	Ia tonna mangkamo Puang Isa mbenni pepasan, malemi to anak gurun-Na mpasitarruh-tarruh kampong mpangpeissenanni to Kareba Kasalamatan. Na mpamalagah too tomasaki.
42009007	Ia tonna sa'dingngi Raja Herodes Antipas, to mparenta tana Galilea, to apa napugauk Puang Isa, tangrapa' penawanna nnawa-nawai. Nasaba' den to mpaui kumua tuo pole'mi to Nabi Yahya.
42009008	Den too tau kumua Nabi Eliara to mpangpekitan omo kalena. Den omo tau laen kumua den mesa' nabi tonna anu' tuo pole'mo.
42009009	Nakuamo Raja Herodes, "Ianna Nabi Yahya, mangkamo kupangpele'toan ulunna. Apa ia to Puang Isa, indara ia sitonganna? Gaja budamo kusa'ding to apa napugauk." Iamo joo napengkulle-kullei la mpessitammuii to Puang Isa.
42009010	Ia tonna polemo joo rasulu' jio mai kalingkanna, pada nacuritami lako Puang Isa to apa napugauk. Mangkai joo, napessalaii Puang Isa to tobuda, namale mesa sola to rasulu' lako kota Betsaida.
42009011	Apa naissen tobuda kumua malemi, naundi nturu'i. Napessitammuimi, namangngajahhi umbo nakua to tau menjaji taun-Na Puang Allataala lan kaparentan-Na. Napamalagah ngasan tooi to tomasaki.
42009012	Ia tonna la bongimo, malemi to anak gurun-Na ngkandoppi' Puang Isa nakuanni, "Oo Puang! La'bi melo ke tasuami tee mai tobuda namale nnangah ngenan pangbongian sola kande ntuu lako kampong sola tomangbara'bah mengguririkkita', nasaba' pallawangan tee tanii."
42009013	Apa napebalii nakua, "Kamu' ia to la mpakandei." Nakuamo to anak gurun-Na, "Limamora roti na duapa bale kiampui! La malerakanka nnallianni kande tee mai tau?"
42009014	Ia joo wattu den agi-agi limang sa'bu tau ke muane manda dibilang. Nakuamo Puang Isa lako anak gurun-Na, "Suami tee mai tau cumadokko silimangpulo tau sangtorroan."
42009015	Napugaukmi anak gurun-Na susi to disuanni. Ia tonna cumadokko ngasanmo joo tau sola ngasan,
42009016	naalami Puang Isa joo lima roti na dua bale, anna mentingngara de' langi', mangkurru sumanga' lako Puang Allataala. Namane' nti'pek-ti'pekki joo roti sola bale, nabenni anak gurun-Na anna tawa-tawanni to tobuda.
42009017	Kumandemi sola ngasan sabarahna. Ia tonna mangkamo kumande, napasirempunmi to torrona, ponnopa sangpulo dua baku'.
42009018	Den pissen namale Puang Isa torro mesa massambajang, anna ratu to anak gurun-Na lako joo nanii. Mekutanami Puang Isa nakua, "Ia ke pahangna tobuda, indara nasanganna'?"
42009019	Mebalimi nakua, "Den tau kumua Nabi Yahya, den too tau kumua Nabi Elia, na ia to laenna kumua sala mesa'na nabi tonna anu' to tuo pole'."
42009020	Mekutana pole' omi nakua, "Apa ia ke pahangmi, indara' tee?" Mebalimi Petrus nakua, "Kita'mo Raja Mangpasalama' to pura nabasse Puang Allataala."
42009021	Napakainga'mi Puang Isa to anak gurun-Na kumua danggi' naden tau napauan kumua Iamo Raja Mangpasalama'.
42009022	Nakuapa Puang Isa, "Ia tee Aku' Anak Mentolino, la gaja parri'na'. La naewana' pekaamberan to-Yahudi, kapala imang sola guru agama. La dibunona', apa ia ke allo mangpentallun, la dipatuo pole'na' jio mai kamatean."
42009023	Nakua omo Puang Isa lako tobuda, "Ia to tolanturu'na', te'da nalanturu'i bang pakkaeloran penawanna, apa allo-allo la mpassanni kaju sitambenna, naturu' tarruhna'.
42009024	Nasaba' ia to tonturu' bang pakkaeloran penawanna, te'da nalannampa' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na. Apa ia to tonturu' tarruhna' moi la dibuno, iamo la nnampa' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na.
42009025	Apara bua'na lako tau ke naassang ngasanni tee lino, apa te'da naampa' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na?
42009026	Ia to tongkasirisanna' na te'da naakui to pangngajaran-Ku', la kukasirisan todai tee Aku', Anak Mentolino, ke ratuna' mpupangngarrang kamala'biran-Ku' to susi una kamala'biran-Na Ambe'-Ku' na kamala'biranna malaeka'-Ku'.
42009027	La miingaran! Sitonganna den kamu' to ntee, te'dapa namate ke te'dapi nakitai to Puang Allataala mangparenta susi Raja."
42009028	Agi-agi sangminggu mangkanna joo, nasolanmi Puang Isa to Petrus, Yahya na Yakub, namale de' buntu la massambajang.
42009029	Ia tonna massambajang unapa Puang Isa membalikmi rupan-Na, na ia to pakean-Na memmabuccang cumbia'-bia'.
42009030	-
42009031	Nata'pa den dua tau, iamo to Nabi Musa sola Nabi Elia, dikita lan arrang kamala'biran pole jao mai suruga. Nasipangkadaimi Puang Isa sola Nabi Musa na Nabi Elia to kamatean-Na Puang Isa to la jaji jao kota Yerusalem situru' akkatta-Na Puang Allataala.
42009032	Mamma'i Petrus, Yahya na Yakub, apa ia joo wattu ta'pa mi'cikmi nakitai to kamala'biran-Na Puang Isa na ia joo tau dua nasolan ke'deh.
42009033	Ia tonna la malemo joo tau sola duai ssalai Puang Isa, nakuamo Petrus lako Puang Isa, "Oo Guru, masannangki' ntee. Melo ke ngkabua'kan tallu bola-bola, mesa' tanii, mesa' nanii Nabi Musa, na mesa' nanii Nabi Elia." (Ia joo kada napau punala bangri Petrus, te'da naissenni patunna.)
42009034	Ia tonna mangkada unapa Petrus ratumi to saleu' mbombonnii sola ngasan. Na ia tonna samboimi saleu', silajatanmi to anak gurun-Na.
42009035	Denmi gamara nasa'ding lan mai saleu' nakua, "Iamo tee to Anak kupilei. Pesa'dingngii!"
42009036	Ia tonna te'damo disa'ding joo gamara, nakitami mesa-mesamira Puang Isa ntuu jio. Ia tuu lako anak gurun-Na pada kamma' bangngi joo wattu, na te'da naden tau napauan to apa mangka nakita.
42009037	Masawanna, tonna solohmo Puang Isa jao mai buntu sola joo tallu anak gurun-Na, siratuan omi to tau buda lako kale-Na.
42009038	Denmi mesa' muane nnandongngi mangkada lan tangnga-tangngana tobuda nakua, "Oo Guru, takamaseina' dikka'! Takitapi joo anak tungga'ku'!
