45005001	Napupenjaji tomeloki' Puang Allataala, nasaba' kamatapparanta'. Iamo joo tasikalino pole'mo Puang Allataala. Sininna tee jaji, nasaba' Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
45005002	Iamo nneloranki' mperasai kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala to taperasai tee too, nasaba' kamatapparanta'. Jaji la marioki' sanga den kaparannuanta' mputawa kamala'biran-Na Puang Allataala jao suruga.
45005003	Te'da na ia manda joo, apa mario tooki', moi nakannaki' kamaparrisan, nasaba' taissen kumua kamaparrisan mpamawatangki',
45005004	na ia ke mawatangki' te'da tapugauk kasalan ke nakannaki' pecoba antaparannu.
45005005	Na ia joo kaparannuanta' te'da natangmpamasannangki', nasaba' ia to Roh Allataala nabenki' Puang Allataala, la mperasai pangpakamoja'-Na.
45005006	Ia tontatangpakullepa, matemi Almaseh la mpasalama'ki' tee kita' tomadosa. Ia joo wattu napattantu Puang Allataala.
45005007	Liwa' sussa diampa' to tau madoang mate mpangngewan tomaruruh. Mbai den tau madoang mate ke mpangngewanni tomelo penawanna.
45005008	Apa napakitanmiki' Puang Allataala to pangpakamoja'-Na, nasaba' ia tonna taloi unapiki' kuasa dosa, matei to Almaseh mpangngewanki'.
45005009	Dipupenjaji tomeloki', nasaba' kamatean-Na Almaseh. Iamo joo buttinna kumua la napasalama'miki' Almaseh jio mai pangcalla-Na Puang Allataala ke Kiama'mi lino.
45005010	Ia tonna jolona siewaliki' Puang Allataala. Moi nasusi joo, dipasikalino pole'miki' Puang Allataala, sanga kamatean-Na Anak. Apa pole'raka tee too, ke sikalino pole'miki' Puang Allataala, tantumo la dipasalamami'ki', nasaba' katuoan-Na Almaseh.
45005011	Na te'da na ia manda joo, apa mario tooki', nasaba' mangkami Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh mpasipemeloanki' Puang Allataala.
45005012	Ia to dosa mentama lino, nasaba' mesa' tau mpugaukki, iamo to Nabi Adam. Na ia to Nabi Adam mate, nasaba' madosai. Iamo joo nalamate to sininna tolino, nasaba' te'da tolino tangmadosa.
45005013	Ia tonna te'dapa nadipaden to atoranna Nabi Musa, denmo dosa lan lino. Apa te'dapa nadireken dosa, tonna te'dapa atoran.
45005014	Moi nasusi joo, sipammula jio mai Nabi Adam ratu lako Nabi Musa, nang matemo to tolino. Matei to tau susi Nabi Adam, moi na ia to dosana te'da nasusi dosana Nabi Adam ntengkai parenta-Na Puang Allataala. Ia to Nabi Adam wa'ding dipasusi joo to la undi ratu, iamo to Puang Isa Almaseh.
45005015	Apa ia joo barakka' napangben Puang Allataala te'da napada to dosa napugauk Nabi Adam. Tongan kumua napumate ngasan tolino, sanga dosana Nabi Adam. Apa la'bi keangga' to kasalamatan napangben Puang Allataala lako tobuda nasaba' mesa' tau, iamo to Puang Isa Almaseh.
45005016	Te'da napada to barakka'-Na Puang Allataala na ia to dosa napugauk Nabi Adam. Nasaba' ia tonna madosamo Nabi Adam, nara'tahmi Puang Allataala nakua, "Tokasalan." Apa ia tonna madosamo to sininna tolino, nabenmiki' barakka'-Na Puang Allataala, nara'tahhi to tolino nakua, "Tote'da salana."
45005017	Mattantumo kumua nang la matei to sininna tolino, nasaba' dosana Nabi Adam. Apa ia to napugauk Puang Isa Almaseh la'bi mattantupa ia. La'bi mattantu kumua ia to tomangka dipakitan kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala na mangka dipupenjaji tomelo, la tuo te'da cappa'na nasaba' kamatean-Na Almaseh.
45005018	Jaji, nang la dicallai to sininna tolino, nasaba' panggaukan gaja'na mesa' tau, iamo to Nabi Adam. Susi unai joo la dila'paran to tolino jio mai pangcalla na diben katuoan, nasaba' panggaukan melo-Na mesa' tau, iamo to Almaseh.
45005019	Memmadosai to tolino, nasaba' mesa' tau te'da nanturu' pakkeloran-Na Puang Allataala, iamo to Nabi Adam. Susi toomi ia to tolino dipupenjaji tomeloi, nasaba' mesa' tau nturu' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, iamo to Almaseh.
45005020	Ia to atoranna Nabi Musa nabenni Puang Allataala, dikua namanassa kumua madosa to tolino. Sanapengkulleinna tolino nturu'i to atoran, sabuda-budanna to dosa napugauk. Apa moi sabuda-budanna dosana to tolino, samelo-melona penawan-Na Puang Allataala lako tolino.
45005021	Sipato'ki' mate, nasaba' dosata'. Apa napakamoja'ki' Puang Allataala, napupenjajiki' tomelo. Iamo joo nabenmiki' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na, nasaba' Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
45006001	Ia ke susimi joo, apara la takua? La da'tan bangpiriki'ka mpugauk dosa, dikua anna samelo-melona penawan-Na Puang Allataala lako kaleta'?
45006002	Tantu te'da! Te'damo nasipato' ke mpugauk unapiki' dosa, nasaba' mangkamiki' mate sola Almaseh antadila'paran jio mai kuasa dosa.
45006003	-
45006004	Te'daraka miissenni kumua, ia tontadijio'mo, memmesa'miki' sola Puang Isa Almaseh. Ia tontadijio', pada matemiki' antapada dilamun sola Almaseh, dikua antatuo baru susi Almaseh tonna patuo pole'i Ambe' mpake kuasan-Na.
45006005	Na ia ke memmesa'miki' sola Almaseh, sanga matemiki' sola, dipatuo todamiki' susi Almaseh.
45006006	-
45006007	Taissenmo kumua ia to sipa' gaja'ta' mangkami dita'dei tontadipampang sola Almaseh jao kaju sitamben. Na ia ke susii joo, te'damo napukaunanki' kuasa dosa, nasaba' ia to tomatemo dila'paranmi jio mai kuasa dosa.
45006008	Ia antamatemo sola Almaseh, takatappa'imo kumua tuoki' sola,
45006009	nasaba' taissen kumua mangkami dipatuo to Almaseh jio mai kamatean, na te'damo nalamate pole'. Te'damo nalangkuasaii kuasa kamatean.
45006010	Ia to Almaseh pissenra mate, dikua na ntaloi kuasa dosa. Na ia to katuoan-Na Almaseh tee too dipatuju lako Puang Allataala.
45006011	Susimi joo la misanga too mangkamo kamu' mate lako kuasa dosa, ammituo lako Puang Allataala, nasaba' memmesa'mo kamu' sola Puang Isa Almaseh.
45006012	Iami joo, danggi'mo mieloranni to kuasa dosa mpukaunan kamu' nadanggi' mituru'i bangngi to kamadoangan gaja'mi.
45006013	Danggi' toomo mieloranni to batang kalemi la mpugauk kagajatan. Apa la miben Puang Allataala to batang kalemi, to butung matemo napatuo pole'i Puang tee too. Benni Puang Allataala to batang kalemi, anna pakei situru' pakkaeloran-Na.
45006014	Te'damo miwa'ding napukaunan kuasa dosa, sanga te'damo nakuasai kamu' atoranna Nabi Musa, apa tuomo kamu' situru' kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala.
45006015	Umbomora la takua too? Wa'dingriki'ka mpugauk dosa, nasaba' nakuasaimiki' kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala, na te'damo nakuasaiki' atoran agama? Te'da nalasusi joo!
45006016	Tantu miissen kumua ia ke denni mipupuang mituru'i to napueloh, tantu ia minii mengkaunan. Ia ke mengkaunan lako kamu' kuasa dosa, la mate kamu'. Ia ke mengkaunan lako kamu' Puang Allataala, la dipupenjaji tomelo kamu'.
45006017	Apa kurru sumanga' lako Puang Allataala, nasaba' jolona napukaunan kamu' kuasa dosa, apa ia tee too tatta' kamu' nturu' pangngajaran tongan to mangka diben kamu'.
45006018	Mangkamo kamu' dila'paran jio mai dosami, na ia tee too mengkaunan lakomo kamu' Puang Allataala, ammimenturu' lako pakkaeloran-Na.
45006019	Ia una kupake pangpasusian mengkaunan, dikua ammimadoi' mapahang. Susi tonna jolona mieloran to batang kalemi napukaunan penawa gaja'mi sola mangrupa-rupa kagajatan, susi toomi tee too la mipangben to batang kalemi mimengkaunan lako pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala ammituo susi to sipato'na tau mesan-Na Puang Allataala.
45006020	Ia tonna pukaunanpa kamu' kuasa dosa, te'da mituru' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala.
45006021	Apara bua-buanna miampa' joo wattu? Iamo to apa mipumasiri'mo too, nasaba' katampakanna kamateanra diampa'.
45006022	Apa ia tee too la tuo kamu' susi to sipato'na tau mesan-Na Puang Allataala na la nnampa' kamu' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na, nasaba' mangkamo kamu' dila'paran jio mai kuasa dosa, mimengkaunan lako Puang Allataala.
45006023	Kamateanra to buanna dosa, apa katuoan melo te'da cappa'na nabenki' Puang Allataala, nasaba' memmesa'miki' sola Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
45007001	Ee, todipusile'to! La mipahangmo tee kupau, sanga miissen to atoran agama, kumua ianna tuopa to tau la nakuasaipa ia atoran agama.
45007002	Susinna mesa' baine kemuane, ianna tuo unapa to muanena, nakannapa atoran tosibali. Apa ia ke matemi muanena, la'pahmi jio mai joo atoran.
45007003	Ianna den baine male sola muane laen, disangai manggauk sala, ke tuo unapi to muanena. Apa ia ke matemi to muanena, la'pahmi jio mai muanena situru' atoran tosibali. Na ianna kemuane pole' sola muane laen, te'da nadisanga manggauk sala.
45007004	Susi too kamu' to todipusile'to. Ia tonna jolona napukaunan kamu' atoran agama. Apa ia tee too dilaparanmo kamu' jio mai atoran agama, nasaba' mangkamo kamu' mate sola Almaseh. Jaji ia tee too taun-Namo kamu' Almaseh to dipatuo pole' jio mai kamatean, anna ia to katuoanmi makkeguna lako Puang Allataala.
45007005	Ia tonna jolona tuo bangpiki' situru' penawa gaja'ta', sanga nakuasaiki' kamadoangan mpugauk kagajatan to napaden atoran agama. Iamo pole' joo tapugauk bang tangmelo, to mpaden kamatean.
45007006	Apa ia tee too mangkamiki' mate tadila'paran jio mai atoran agama. Te'damo tasusi jolona mengkaunan lako atoran to diuki', apa mengkaunanmiki' lako Puang Allataala situru' cara baru to napakitanki' Roh Allataala.
45007007	Na ia ke susii joo apara la takua? Takuaraka kumua gaja' to atoranna Nabi Musa? Te'da ia! Apa nnissenmo' dosa, nasaba' kuissen to atoranna Nabi Musa. Ia kenna te'da nadiuki' lan atoranna Nabi Musa kumua, "Danggi' ngkadoangngi apanna padammu rupa tau!", te'da kuissenni to madoang.
45007008	Ia to kuasa dosa mpaden mangrupa-rupa kamadoangan gaja' lan penawangku', nasaba' atoran. Apa te'da namakuasa to kuasa dosa, ke te'da atoran agama.
45007009	Ia tonna jolona te'da kuissen atoran agama. Apa ia tongkuissenmi, napamulamo' napukaunan kuasa dosa,
45007010	na iamo joo kupumate. Ia to atoran agama to kusanga la mpatuona', na kannori la kupumate.
45007011	Ia to kuasa dosa mpaden mangrupa-rupa kamadoangan gaja' lan penawangku', nasaba' atoran. Susimi joo ia to kuasa dosa ngkalasiina' anna bunona'.
45007012	Maruruh na melo to sininna atoranna Nabi Musa, sanga ia to sura'na Nabi Musa na atoran lan joo sura', pole jio mai Puang Allataala.
45007013	Ia ke susii joo, la kupumateraka to apa melo, iamo to atoranna Nabi Musa? Te'da nasusi joo! Kuasa dosara ia mpaden kamatean. Na ia to kuasa dosa mpakei to apa melo mbunona', anna pajan kumua liwa' gaja' to dosa.
45007014	Taissen kumua ia to atoranna Nabi Musa pole jio mai Roh Allataala. Apa aku' tee tolino malammana', nasaba' susimo' todibaluk napukaunanmo' kuasa dosa.
45007015	Te'da kupahangngi to panggaukanku'. Ia to sipato'na la kupugauk, te'da na ia kupugauk. Apa ia to kukaba'cinna, ia ora kupugauk.
45007016	Apa ia ke mpugaukna' to tangkukabudainna, battuananna kukatonganni kumua melo to atoran agama.
45007017	Jaji, sitonganna tangngia aku' mpugaukki joo, apa kuasa dosara to ngkuasai kaleku'.
45007018	Kuissen kumua tangmelo to penawangku', nasaba' moi madoangna' mpugaukki to melona, te'da kukullei mpugaukki.
45007019	Ia to kameloan kukadoangngi la kupugauk, te'da na ia kupugauk, apa ia to kagajatan to te'da kumadoang mpugaukki, ia pole' ora kupugauk.
45007020	Ia ke kupugaukki to tangkukabudainna, tangngia aku' mpugaukki, apa kuasa dosara to ngkusai kaleku'.
45007021	Jaji iamo tee to jaji lako kaleku': madoangna' mpugaukki to melona, apa ia ora to tangmelona kupugauk.
45007022	Ia to penawangku' nakabudai to atoran-Na Puang Allataala,
45007023	apa te'da kukullei nturu'i, nasaba' den kuasa laen rrarii penawangku' nataloina'. Na iamo joo kuasa dosa to ngkuasaina'.
45007024	Aku'mo tau macilakanna! Indara ngkullei lla'paranna' jio mai kuasa dosa to la mbunona'?
45007025	Kurru sumanga' lako Puang Allataala! Iamo lla'paranna', nasaba' Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh! Jaji ia to penawangku' menturu' lako atoran-Na Puang Allataala, na ia to kamadoangan gaja' lan penawangku' menturu' lako kuasa dosa.
45008001	Ia tee too te'damo nakannai pangcalla to tomemmesa'mo sola Puang Isa Almaseh,
45008002	nasaba' kuasan-Na Roh Allataala mangka lla'paranki' jio mai kuasa dosa sola kuasa kamatean. Ia to Roh Allataala mangka mbenki' katuoan baru sola Puang Isa Almaseh.
45008003	Ia to atoran agama te'da nakullei lla'paranki' jio mai kuasa dosa, nasaba' tangtakulle nturu' atoran agama. Apa ia to tangnakulle atoran agama mpugaukki, mangkami napugauk Puang Allataala. Nasuai to Anak mentolino. Na ia to batang kale-Na susi bang batang kale tolino biasa. Na ia tee Anak matei dikua anna ia to dosana tolino dipabalahhi lakoi batang kale-Na Anak.
45008004	Napugaukki Puang Allataala susi joo, dikua anna ia to pakkaeloran-Na, to pajan lan atoran agama, wa'ding tapugauk, nasaba' te'damo tatuo situru' kamadoangan penawanta', apa situru' Roh Allataala.
45008005	Ia to totuo situru' kamadoangan penawanna, nnawa-nawa bang pangkabudaianna. Apa ia to totuo situru' Roh Allataala, nnawa-nawa pangkabudaian-Na Roh Allataala.
45008006	Ia ke nakuasaiki' kamadoangan penawanta', manassa la dipumate. Apa ia ke nakuasaiki' Roh Allataala, la nnampa'ki' kamasannangan sola katuoan melo te'da cappa'na jio mai Puang Allataala.
45008007	Ia to tonakuasai kamadoangan penawanna, iamo tosiewali Puang Allataala, sanga te'da naturu' atoran-Na Puang Allataala, nasaba' tangnakullei.
45008008	Na te'da too nakullei mpamasannang Puang Allataala.
45008009	Ia to kamu' te'damo mituru' kamadoangan penawammi, sanga nakuasaimo kamu' Roh Allataala, to tuo lan kalemi. Ia to te'da Roh Almaseh lan kalena, tangngia taun-Na Almaseh.
45008010	Apa ianna den Almaseh lan kalemi, la naben kamu' katuoan Roh Allataala, nasaba' napupenjaji tomelomo kamu' Puang Allataala, moi nalamate to batang kalemi nasaba' dosa.
45008011	Ia to Roh Allataala mangka mpatuo Almaseh jio mai kamatean. Ia ke Roh Allataala tuo lan kalemi, Ia toomo la mpatuo kamu'.
45008012	Ee, todipusile'to! Iamo joo na te'damo tawa'ding nturu' bang kamadoangan penawanta'.
45008013	Ia ke taturu'i to kamadoangan penawanta', la mateki'. Apa ia ke taeloranni to Roh Allataala ntulungki' nca'beanni to panggaukan gaja'ta', la tuo meloki' te'da cappa'na.
45008014	Ia to tonakuasai Roh Allataala, iamo disanga anak Allataala.
45008015	Ia to Roh Allataala, to nabenki' Puang, te'da napukaunanki', anna te'da takalaja'i. Sibalikanna ia to Roh Allataala mpupenjajiki' anak Allataala, antawa'ding kumua lako Puang: "Ambe', ie' Ambe'ku'!"
45008016	Roh Allataala sola penawanta' mpamanassai kumua anak Allataalaki'.
45008017	Ia ke anak Allataalamiki', wa'dingmiki' la ntarima barakka'-Na Puang Allataala sola Almaseh. Na ia ke mperasaiki' parri' tee too susi Almaseh tonna tee, la dipakala'bih todaki' sola Almaseh.
45008018	Ia ke aku', mabanda' to kamaparrisan taperasai tee too, apa la manglokkon pembuda to kamala'biran la taampa' keanu'.
45008019	Sininna olok-olok na apa laen to napaden Puang liwa' mamali' ngasan ntajanni kumua piranpara napapajan ngasanni Puang Allataala to anakkana.
45008020	Ia to napaden Puang mangka ditampakki ropu. Tangngia elohna nasusi joo, apa elohnara Puang Allataala. Moi nasusi joo den unapa rannunna,
45008021	kumua den wattunna naladila'paran jio mai kamasolanganna, anna dipamala'bih sola sininna anak Allataala.
45008022	Taissen kumua sininna to napaden Puang sanggenna tee too sumarro na maparri' tarruh too susi to tolakeanak.
45008023	Na te'da na ia manda to napaden Puang, apa moi kita' sumarro na maparri' tooki'. Moiraka tamangkamo ntarima Roh Allataala, to bungah barakka', apa ntajan unapiki' la naganna'i Puang Allataala to kadila'bakanta' jio mai kuasa dosa napupenjajiki' anak.
45008024	Mangkamiki' dipasalama', iamo rannunta'. Apa ia ke taampa'mi to tarannuan, te'damo nadisanga apa dirannuan. Te'da tau mparannuanpi ke naampa'mi to apa narannuan!
45008025	Apa ia ke te'dapi taampa'i to apa tarannuan, la sabbara'ki' ntajanni.
45008026	Na Ia to Roh Allataala ntulungki' ke tangtakullei. Susinna ke te'da taissenni umbo dikua sitonganna massambajang, Ia mangngolo lako Puang Allataala mpeta'danki', mpau sarrota' to tangdiissen la mpaui.
45008027	Puang Allataala, to nnissenni apa to lan penawanna tolino, naissen too apa to natungkanan joo Roh Allataala, sanga Ia mpeta'dai lako Puang Allataala apa to naparallui umma'-Na situru' pakkaeloran-Na.
45008028	Taissen kumua Puang Allataala Ia nnatoro'i to sininna apa, anna benni kameloan lako to tompakamoja'i, to napileimo situru' eloh-Na.
45008029	Na ia to tonaissenmo, pura napattantumo la menjaji sangrupa Puang Isa Almaseh, Anak Allataala, dikua na Almaseh menjaji pamungah jio mai sininna sile'to tomatappa'.
45008030	Susimi joo to pura jolomo napattantu Puang Allataala napilei. Na ia tee mai to tonapileimo, napupenjaji tomelo. Na ia to napupenjaji tomelo, nabenmi kamala'biran-Na Puang Allataala.
45008031	Apara la takua tee too to sininna joo? Ia ke napangngewaiki' Puang Allataala indara la nnewaki'?
45008032	Na ia to Puang Allataala te'da napangnganggai to Anak mperasai parri', kannori napangben menjaji karoba lako kita' sola ngasan. Umbora nakua tanglambenki' to laenna?
45008033	Te'da ia tau ngkullei la mparapa'ki' to tonapileimo Puang Allataala, sanga Puang Allataala ngkuanki' kumua tote'da salata'.
45008034	Te'da ia tau ngkullei ncallaki', sanga Puang Isa Almaseh la mpangkadananki'. Iamo to mangka mate, natuo pole' na cumadokkomo sola Puang Allataala.
45008035	Te'da ia apa ngkullei hhalangngi Almaseh mpakamoja'ki'. Moi kamasussan, kamaparrisan ba'tu kadipakario-rioan, katangbarasan, kakaasi-asian, kamacilakan, ba'tu kamatean te'da nakullei mpupessarakki' jio mai pangpakamoja'-Na Almaseh.
45008036	Susi to diuki' jolomo lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "La nabunokan tau, dipasusikan bembala' la digere', nasaba' kituru'miki'."
45008037	Apa sapatalo-talota', sanga naampaiki' to tompakamoja'ki'.
45008038	Kuissen kumua, la kamatean, la katuoan, la malaeka', kuasa ba'tu kamawatangan laenna, pegarra' to dennamo too ba'tu mane' la ratunna,
45008039	ba'tu apa jao langi', ba'tu apa lan kuli'na padang, ba'tu laennapa, te'da nakullei mpupessarakki' jio mai pangpakamoja'-Na Puang Allataala, susi to napapajan Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
45009001	Ia tee aku', taun-Nana' Almaseh na ia to penawangku' nakuasai Roh Allataala. Jaji ia tee kupau te'da kumangnguraga, apa tonganna kumua,
45009002	masse na liwa' parri' penawangku',
45009003	nasaba' sile'to sangbangsaku' to-Israel to te'da namatappa'. Kueloranni to kaleku' nakanna tampak ropu sola napasisarakna' Almaseh anna ia to sangbangsaku' sirapu Almaseh.
45009004	Iamo to to-Israel napilei Puang Allataala anna pupenjajii anak, napakitanni kamala'biran-Na. Mangkami dipadenan basse nadiben atoran agama, umbo nakua ssompa Puang Allataala.
45009005	Ia to to-Israel bati'nai Nabi Ibrahim, Ishak na Yakub. Na ia to Almaseh, to mentolino, bati'na todai. Apa Iamo Allataala to te'da apa njaonannii, to sipato' dipakala'bih te'da cappa'na. Amin.
45009006	Tangjajiraka basse-Na Puang Allataala, nasaba' buda to-Israel te'da namatappa'? Te'da, nasaba' te'da na sininna to-Israel to napilei Puang Allataala.
45009007	Te'da na ia ngasan to bati'na Nabi Ibrahim menjaji umma'-Na Puang Allataala, nasaba' nakua Puang Allataala lako Nabi Ibrahim kumua, "Bati'na manda Ishak to disanga bati'mu situru' basse-Ku'."
45009008	Battuananna kumua ia to bati'na Nabi Ibrahim to menjaji anak Allataala, iamo to jaji jio mai basse-Na Puang Allataala, tangngia kumua sininna bati'na.
45009009	Nasaba' nakua to basse-Na Puang Allataala kumua, "Wattu susimo tee la kunii ratu ke taun pole', na ia to Sara la mangkami njajian mesa' pea muane."
45009010	Na te'da na ia manda joo. La'bi manassa kumua te'da na ia ngasan bati'na Nabi Ibrahim menjaji anak Allataala, tonna keanak Ribka njajian pea rendu muane dua disanga Esau na Yakub, nasibalii Ishak tojolota'.
45009011	-
45009012	Nakua Puang Allataala lako Ribka kumua, "Ia to pamungah la mengkaunan lako adinna." Ia joo wattu te'dapa najaji joo pea dua, na te'dapa napugauk melo iarika gaja', apa pura napattantumo Puang Allataala to tonapilei. Jaji pajan kumua ia to tonapilei-Na Puang Allataala, te'da nasituru' to apa napugauk tolino, apa situru' eloh-Na Puang.
45009013	Den too diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Kupakamoja' to Yakub na kukaba'ci to Esau."
45009014	Ia ke susii joo, la takuaraka kumua te'da namaruruh to Puang Allataala? Te'da nasusi joo! Maruruh Ia to Puang Allataala!
45009015	Nasaba' nakua Puang Allataala lako Nabi Musa kumua, "La kupakitanni kameloan penawang-Ku' to tokupueloh, na la kukamasei too to tokupueloh."
45009016	Jaji ia to barakka' sola pangkamasean-Na Puang Allataala tangngia elohna ba'tu kapakulleanna tolino mpattantui, apa kameloan penawan-Na Ia Puang Allataala.
45009017	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Mangkadami Puang Allataala lako Firaun, Raja Mesir nakua, 'Kuangka'ko jaji raja la kunii mpangpekitan kuasang-Ku', na kaissenan to sangang-Ku' lako sininna tolino.' "
45009018	Jaji Puang Allataala mpakitanni kameloan penawan-Na to mesa' tau ke napuelohhi, apa mpupembattuk too tau laen ke napuelohhi.
45009019	Mbai la mangkadako lako Aku' kumua, "Ciapai namangcacca bangpa Puang Allataala, na te'da tau wa'ding nnewai to pakkaeloran-Na?"
45009020	Ee, todipusile'to, tolino biasaki'! Na danggi' mubali-bali Puang Allataala! Te'da nawa'ding to kurin la mangkada lako tontampai kumua, "Ciapari mutampa susina' tee?"
45009021	Tantu ia to tomangtampa kurin elohna ia ntampai to kurin. Ia to sanglemong litak wa'ding ia natampa duang rupa kurin, mesa' liwa' ballo, na ia to laenna kassara'.
45009022	Susi toomi to wa'ding napugauk Puang Allataala lako kita' tolino. Madoang Ia mpapajan kamagallian-Na sola kuasan-Na lako to sipato' dipabalahhi. Apa sabbara'i,
45009023	dikua anna mpangpepajanan kamala'biran-Na to napatuju lako kita' tonakamasei. Na mangkamiki' napasadia la ntarimai joo kamala'biran.
45009024	Kita'mo to mangka napilei jio mai to-Yahudi sola bangsa laen.
45009025	Susi to mangka napau Puang Allataala lan sura'na Nabi Hosea nakua, "Ia to totangngia taung-Ku' la kusangai taung-Ku'. Na ia to tangkupakamoja' la kusangai 'Pangpakamoja'-Ku'.'
45009026	Ia to nanii Puang Allataala mangka mangkada kumua, 'Kamu' tee tangngia umma'-Ku'', ia toomo la dinii ssangaii kumua menjajimo anak lako Puang Allataala to tuo."
45009027	Gaja karrah Nabi Yesaya mangkada lako to-Israel nakua, "Moi na ia to bati'na to-Israel susi bungin budanna jiong tasik, apa ci'dikra la salama'.
45009028	Nasaba' sangkappidian matara ke naparatui Puang Allataala to pangcalla lako tolino, na mangkanna joo mangkami ia."
45009029	Susi to mangka napau Nabi Yesaya tonna anu', "Ia kenna te'da napatorroi Puang Allataala to makuasa ci'di' to bati'ta', wa'dingmiki' lanynya' susi to-Sodom na to-Gomora."
45009030	Apa omo la takua? Susii tee: Ia to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi te'da napengkullei dipupenjaji tomelo, apa napupenjaji tomelo Puang Allataala, nasaba' kamatapparanna.
45009031	Sibalikanna, ia to to-Yahudi napengkullei tongan nturu' atoranna Nabi Musa dikua nadipupenjaji tomelo, apa te'da nakullei.
45009032	Ciapari na te'da nakullei? Nasaba' te'da namatappa' lako Puang Allataala. Nasangari kumua wa'ding ia ke mpugaukki atoran agama. Jaji titodomi lako "Batu Katitodoan",
45009033	susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Pesa'dingngii tee, 'Den mesa' tau kupajio kota Sion to dipasangrapang batu katitodoan. Ia joo batu nanii titodo tau na buda tau nalolinan. Apa ia to tongkatappa'i, te'da naladipakasiri'.' "
45010001	Ee, todipusile'to! Gaja doangna' kumua nadipasalama' to bangsaku'. Iamo joo kupassambajangan bangngi.
45010002	La mikatappa'i kumua masumanga' tongan ia ssompa Puang Allataala. Apa ia joo masumanga'na te'da nasituru' kapaissenan jio mai Puang Allataala.
45010003	Te'da napahangngi na te'da natarimai umbo nakua Puang Allataala mpupenjaji tomeloi to tolino. Apa napengkullei mpupenjaji tomelo kalena.
45010004	Mangkami naganna'i Almaseh to atoranna nabi Musa. Iamo joo ia to tomatappa' lako Almaseh, napupenjaji tomeloi Puang Allataala.
45010005	Den nauki' Nabi Musa matumba carana dipupenjaji tomelo to tolino, ke nturu'i atoran agama. Nauki' Nabi Musa kumua, "Ia to tompugauk atoran agama la naputuoi."
45010006	Na nauki' unapa Nabi Musa matumba carana dipupenjaji tomelo to tolino, ke matappa' lakoi Puang. Nauki'i kumua, "Danggi' mukua lan penawammu, 'Indara to la endek de' suruga?' (battuananna to la mpupellao Almaseh jao mai suruga),
45010007	ba'tu, 'Indara to la male do' lino tomate?' (battuananna to la mpatuoi to Almaseh jiong mai kamatean.)"
45010008	Nauki' omi Nabi Musa kumua, "Ia joo kadan-Na Puang Allataala mandoppi'ra jio mai kalemu, jioi timummu sola lanni penawammu." Iamo to kareba kipangpeissenan kumua sininna tau parallu la matappa' lako Puang.
45010009	Nasaba' ia ke miakui jio olona tobuda kumua Puangngi to Isa, ammikatappa'ii lan penawammi kumua mangkamo to Puang Isa Almaseh napatuo Puang Allataala jio mai kamatean, la salama' kamu'.
45010010	Nasaba' penawara namatappa' to tau, napupenjaji tomeloi Puang Allataala. Na pangngakuan timunna to tau anna dipasalama'.
45010011	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to tomatappa' te'da naladipakasiri'."
45010012	Na ia joo dipatuju lako ngasan sininna tau, la to-Yahudi, la lako bangsa laenna. Mesa'ra Puang Allataala lako sininna tau, Iamo mben barakka' lako sininna to meta'da tulung lako kale-Na.
45010013	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Inda-inda to meta'da tulung lako Puang, la dipasalama'i."
45010014	Na umbo la nakua meta'da tulung lako Puang ke te'dapi namatappa'? Na umbo la nakua matappa' lako Puang ke te'dapi naissenni inda to la nakatappa'i? Na umbo la nakua to tau nnissenni to Puang, ke te'dapi tau mpangpeissenanni?
45010015	Na umbo la nakua tau mpangpeissenanni to Puang ke te'da nadisua mpangpeissenanni? Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Liwa' melona karatuanna to tomale mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan jio mai Puang Allataala."
45010016	Apa te'da na ia ngasan tau ntarimai joo Kareba Kasalamatan. Nakua Nabi Yesaya, "Oo Puang! Ci'di'ra tau ngkatappa'ii to kareba kipangpeissenan!"
45010017	Jaji, ia ke denni tau mpangpeissenanni to karebanna Almaseh, mane'ri disa'ding. Na ia ke denmi tau ssa'dingngi, mane'ri wa'ding nakatappa'i.
45010018	Apa mekutanana': Te'daparaka ia nasa'dingngi to-Israel joo kareba? Tantu nasa'dingmo, nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Nasa'dingmo sininna tolino to gamaranna. Ia to karebanna ratumi lako randan langi'."
45010019	La mekutana pole'pa': Te'daparaka ia naissenni to-Israel? Ia joo pekutana, bungahna napebalii Nabi Musa to kada napasan Puang Allataala lako to-Israel, nakua, "La kupamasere ati kamu' lako bangsa tangngia taung-Ku', na la kupamagalli kamu' lako bangsa te'da apa naissen."
45010020	La'bi barani pole' opa Nabi Yesaya mpaui to kada napasan Puang Allataala lako to-Israel nakua, "Ia to totangnnangahna', naampa'mo'. Kupangpeissenanmo to kale-Ku' lako totangmpekutananna'."
45010021	Apa nakua Nabi Yesaya mpaui to kada napasan Puang Allataala lako to-Israel nakua, "Da'tan bangna' mpupengkorongan limang-Ku' lako kamu', bangsa to tangmenturu' naewa toona'."
45011001	Mekutanana': Te'damoraka napuumma'i Puang Allataala to to-Israel? Umma'-Na unapa! Aku' una tee na to-Israelna' jio mai bati'na Nabi Ibrahim, pangrapuanna Benyamin.
45011002	Te'da natangmpuumma'i Puang Allataala to umma'-Na to napilei jolomo. Miissen curitanna Nabi Elia to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala, tonna pangpeasanni to to-Israel lako Puang Allataala. Nakua Nabi Elia,
45011003	"Oo Puang, nabunoi to-Israel to nabi, na nagaja'-gaja' tooi to ngenan pangkaroban. Aku' mandamo to tuo na la nabuno todana'."
45011004	Apara nakua Puang Allataala mebali? Nakua, "Kupatorro unapa pitung sa'bu to taung-Ku', to te'dapa naden nassompa dewata Baal."
45011005	Susi toomi tee too, nasaba' den unapa ci'di' tau to napilei Puang Allataala situru' kameloan penawan-Na,
45011006	na tangngia nasaba' panggaukan melona. Ia kenna la situru'ra panggaukan melona nadipilei, tangngiamo ia kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala.
45011007	Jaji umbo nakua? Ia to to-Israel mpengkullei la dipupenjaji tomelo, apa te'da naampa'i. Ci'di'ra to nnampa'i, iamo to tonapileimo Puang Allataala. Na ia to laenna napupembattukki penawanna, na te'da namatappa'.
45011008	Susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Napupembattukki Puang Allataala to penawanna tee tau, namembuta to mata penawanna, namemmataru too to talinganna, ratu lako too allo."
45011009	Nakua too Raja Daud mangkada, "Ake'mo na ia to pangrameanna mpojai, namenjaji susi garuang nanii melolin nnampa' balahna.
45011010	Ake'mo namaraun to matanna danggi' napakita, na ake'mo na mperasai tarruh bang kamaparrisan."
45011011	Mekutana pole'na': Melolinraka to to-Yahudi dikua nate'damo napuumma'i Puang Allataala? Te'da nasusi joo! Ia to bangsa laen dipasalama', nasaba' dosana to to-Yahudi, dikua anna masere ati to to-Yahudi lako joo bangsa laen.
45011012	Ia ke nnampa'i barakka' to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi jio mai Puang Allataala, nasaba' kasalanna na katangmenturusanna to to-Yahudi, manglokkon to barakka' naampa' bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, ke mengkatoba'i na dipasalama' too to to-Yahudi!
45011013	Ia to kamu' to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, ia tee aku' rasulu' napilei Puang Isa mpaissenni kamu' Kareba Kasalamatan. Kukua mangkada mati', kupakala'bihhi tee jamanku', dikua anna
45011014	masere ati to bangsaku' to-Yahudi, anna katampakanna nnampa' kasalamatan jio mai Puang Allataala.
45011015	Ia ke sikalino pole'i Puang Allataala sola to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, nasaba' mangka mboko'i Puang Allataala to to-Yahudi, apa pole'raka ke ditarima pole'i, butung to tomate tuo pole'!
45011016	Ia ke ia to bungah pangti'pekan roti diben Puang Allataala, tantu ia to torrona tawa-Na tooi Puang Allataala. Na ia ke ia to waka' kaju apan-Na Puang Allataala, tantu ia to tangkena apan-Na tooi Puang Allataala.
45011017	Ia to to-Yahudi dipasusi kaju zaitun dipiara. Na ia to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi dipasusi kaju zaitun lampung. Den tangke kaju zaitun pira' dipiara na disembangngi dinii mpencangkoran tangke kaju zaitun lampung, iamo to kamu' to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi. Ia tee jaji, dikua ammiperasai toda barakka' jio mai Puang Allataala to dipatuju lako to-Yahudi.
45011018	Iami joo nadanggi' mipamajao penawammi lako to susi tangke kaju dile'toimo. La miingaran kumua tangke bangra kamu', sanga tangngia tangke kaju to mpangben kande lako waka', apa waka'ra to mpangben kande lako tangke kaju.
45011019	Mbai la mangkada kamu' kumua, "Ie', disembangngii joo tangkena angkiwa'ding dipencangkoran jio."
45011020	Tongan tuu mipaunna. Apa iara nadisembangngi nasaba' te'da namatappa', na ditarima kamu' nasaba' matappa' kamu'. Iamo joo danggi' mimajao penawa, apa la malaja' kamu' lako Puang Allataala.
45011021	Nasaba' ia ke te'da nakasajangngii Puang Allataala to to-Yahudi to dipasusi tangke kaju dipiara nasembangngii, ia pissenraka to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi te'da nalangkasajangngi nasembangngii.
45011022	Iamo joo nanii butti kumua liwa' buda kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala, apa liwa' buda too makarrahna. Makarrah lako to nasembangngi, totangmatappa', apa melo penawan-Na lako kamu', assalan da'tan bang kamu' matappa' lako Puang Allataala. Ia ke te'da mituru' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, la nasembangngi toda kamu'.
45011023	Na ia to to-Yahudi ke matappa'mi, la natarima ia Puang Allataala, napencangkoran pole'i.
45011024	Kamu' to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi dipasusi kaju zaitun lampung. Na ia ke kamu' to tangsiolanan sipa'mi dipencangkoranmo lako kaju zaitun to tangngia garonto'mi, la'bi marawa ia to to-Yahudi la dipencangkoran pole' lako garonto'na unamo ia.
45011025	Ee todipusile'to! Denpa kareba to parallu miissen to te'dapa napangpeissenanni Puang Allataala lako tau tonna anu'. Madoangna' ammiissenni, anna danggi' mimajao penawa. Ia joo kareba iamo to kumua buda to to-Yahudi dipupembattuk penawanna. Na la susi bangngi joo to sipa'na, saganna'na to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi dipasalama'.
45011026	Mangkai joo dipasalama' ngasanmi to to-Yahudi. Nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala, nakua Puang Allataala kumua, "Ia to Tomangpasalama' ratu jio mai kota Sion. Iamo la mpamambela kagajatan jio mai bati'na Nabi Yakub.
45011027	Iamo tee to la kusibassei ke kudampanganni."
45011028	Nabarakka'i kamu' Puang Allataala, to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, nasaba' ia to to-Yahudi te'da natarimai to Kareba Kasalamatan anna ewai to Puang. Apa moi nasusi joo, ia to to-Yahudi napakamoja' unai Puang Allataala, nasaba' mangka napilei to tojolona to-Yahudi.
45011029	Ia ke napileimi Puang Allataala to tau, nabenni barakka', te'damo napenassannii.
45011030	Ia tonna jolona tangmangpesa'ding kamu' lako Puang Allataala. Apa ia tee too didampanganmo kamu', sanga katangmangpesa'dinganna to-Yahudi.
45011031	Susi toomi joo to to-Yahudi, tangmangpesa'dingngi tee too lako Puang Allataala, anna den wattunna na la didampangan, susi kamu' didampangan.
45011032	Napupangngelohnai Puang Allataala tangmangpesa'ding to sininna tolino, dikua la nanii mpangpekitan kameloan penawan-Na.
45011033	Tangnadete' akkalanna tolino to kamala'biran-Na, kamaccan-Na sola kapaissenan-Na Puang Allataala! Te'da ia tau wa'ding nnissenni to pura napattantu. Te'da too ia tau wa'ding mpahangngi to napugaukkuna.
45011034	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Te'da tau nnissenni to lan penawan-Na Puang. Te'da tau wa'ding la mpakainga'i.
45011035	Te'da tau mangka mpangben apa lako Puang Allataala, na la mpapole pole'i."
45011036	Sininna issinna lino panggaragan-Na ngasan Puang Allataala na apan-Na ngasan too, nadipatuju ngasan lako kale-Na. Iamo joo, sipato'ki' mpakala'bih tarruhhi to Puang Allataala te'da cappa'na! Amin.
45012001	Ee, todipusile'to! Gaja napakamoja'ki' Puang Allataala, susi to kupaissenanmo kamu'. Iamo joo kupakainga' kamu' kumua la mipangben tongan to katuoanmi lako Puang Allataala susi karoba tuo to sipato' dipangben lako Puang. La susiri joo to passompami to nakabudai Puang Allataala.
45012002	Danggi' mikaturu'-turu' bang lako tote'da naissen Puang Allataala. Ake'mo ia na Puang pemeloii to penawammi, ammiwa'ding nnissenni to pakkaeloran-Na, apa to melo na sukku', na apa to nakabudai Puang Allataala.
45012003	Kupakainga' kamu', nasaba' mangkamo' diben barakka' jio mai Puang Allataala menjaji rasulu': Danggi' misanga kalemi la'bi majao na ia to sitonganna. La miangga' to kalemi situru' pakullemi to napabarakkanan kamu' Puang Allataala, nasaba' kamatapparanmi lako Puang Isa Almaseh.
45012004	Ia to batang kale buda lesoanna. Na pada den patunna to simesa'-mesa' lesoan kale.
45012005	Susi toomi kita' sola ngasan. Moi budaki', apa butung to sangkalemiriki' na pada siparalluanki', nasaba' memmesa' penawamiki' sola Almaseh.
45012006	Pada nabenmiki' Puang Allataala mangrupa-rupa barakka' situru' kameloan penawan-Na. Iamo joo la tapake meloi to barakka' dibenki'. Ia ke barakka' mpau pepasan jio mai Puang Allataala dipatujuanki', la tapugauk situru' kamatapparanta'.
45012007	Ia to diben barakka' mangtulung, la napugauk tongan. Ia to diben barakka' mangngajahhi, la mangngajahhi tongan.
45012008	Ia to diben barakka' mangpamasumanga', la napugauk tongan. Ia to diben barakka' mangpangben, pasituru'i kamabassan. Ia to diben barakka' mangngamberan, la mangngamberan tongan. Na ia to diben barakka' kamamasean, la masannang mpugaukki.
45012009	La sipakamoja' tongan kamu'! Kaba'cii to kagajatan, mipengkulleii to kameloan.
45012010	Sipakamoja' kamu' susi to tosile'to, misitaratte' too.
45012011	Danggi' makuttu njamai to jaman-Na Puang Allataala situru' pangpatujun-Na Roh Allataala.
45012012	Pesannangngii penawammi nasaba' tomangrannuan kamu' lako Puang Allataala. Sabbara' kamu', ke nakanna kamu' kamasussan, ammimassambajang tarruh bang.
45012013	Parallu kamu' ntulungngi ke denni kaparalluanna padammi tomatappa', mitarima meloi lan bolami, moi na te'dapa misiissen.
45012014	Passambajanganni ke denni tau ssessa kamu', nabarakka'ii Puang Allataala, danggi' natampakkii ropu.
45012015	La pada parannu kamu' sola to toparannu, pada kamu' kumarrak ke denni to tokumarrak.
45012016	La mesa' penawa kamu'. Danggi' na den ssanga kalena tomajao, apa la siama' kamu' tomajiong. Danggi' misanga kalemi tomacca.
45012017	Danggi' mipasibalahhi kagajatan na kagajatan, pugaukki to nasanga tau melo.
45012018	Pengkulleii, ke wa'dingngi, misikalino ngasan tau.
45012019	Ee, todipusile'to! Danggi' lalo mimangpabalahhi. Ma'namo ia na Puang Allataala mpabalahhii. Nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Nakua Puang Allataala, 'Aku' mpuissenni to mangpabalahhi, Aku'ra to wa'ding mpattantu pangpabalah.' "
45012020	Sibalikanna, ia ke tangbarahhi to ewalimmi, benni kande. Ia ke mawakkei, benni wai. Nasaba' ia ke mipugaukki susi joo, napumasiri'.
45012021	Danggi' nataloi kamu' kagajatan, apa mpugauk kamu' kameloan ntaloi kagajatan.
45013001	Parallu kamu' nturu' atoran tomangparenta, nasaba' te'da ia to tomangparenta tangnapattantu na te'da too to tangnaben kuasa Puang Allataala.
45013002	Iamo joo na ia to tonnewa tomangparenta, pada una ke nnewai to pura napattantumo Puang Allataala, na la dipabalahhi to tosusi joo.
45013003	Te'da ia tomanggauk melo la malaja' lako tomangparenta, apa tosalara. Iamo joo, ia ke manggauk melo kamu', te'da miparallu malaja' lako tomangparenta, apa napakala'bih kamu' tomangparenta.
45013004	Kaunan-Nai Puang Allataala to tomangparenta la mpaden kameloanmi. Na ia ke gaja'i to panggaukanmi, la mikalaja'i, nasaba' kaunan-Nai Puang Allataala la mpabalahhi to tompugauk kagajatan.
45013005	Jaji, parallu mituru' to tomangparenta nasaba' miissen lan penawammi kumua melo joo, tangngia manda nasaba' malaja'ra kamu' la dipabalahhi.
45013006	Ia toomo joo mimamajah sima, sanga ia to tomangparenta la nnurusu'i jamanna mpangjaman Puang Allataala.
45013007	Jaji, bajahhi to sipato'na mibajah. Susinna sima la mibajah lako to tontarima sima, sassung la mibajah lako tomassassung. Kasiri'i to tosipato' dikasiri', pekatabe'ii to tosipato'na mipekatabe'i.
45013008	Danggi' mikaindanan lako padammi rupa tau, apa sipakamoja' kamu'. Ia to tompakamoja' padanna rupa tau, padai to nturu' ngasan atoranna Nabi Musa.
45013009	Ia to atoranna Nabi Musa, iamo to: Danggi' manggauk sala, danggi' pabuno, danggi' boko, danggi' ngkadoangngi apanna padammu rupa tau, na denpa to laenna, dipangmesa na menjaji mesa'mora atoran, "Pakamoja'i to padammu rupa tau susi iko mpakamoja' kalemu."
45013010	Ia to tompakamoja' padanna rupa tau, te'da napugauk kagajatan lako tau laen. Iami joo na ia to tompakamoja' padanna rupa tau, padami to nturu' ngasan sininna atoran agama.
45013011	La mipugauk susi joo, nasaba' miissen wattu apara tee too. Miissen kumua wattunnamo kamu' la mi'cik, nasaba' la'bi mandoppi'mi to wattu nanii Puang Allataala la mpasalama'ki', na ia tontamane' matappa'.
45013012	Cingga'tu'mora naratu to kasalamatan. Iamo joo tapajaimi mpugauk kagajatan. Taparewaimo kaleta' panggaukan melo.
45013013	La maruruhki' susi kumua ratumi to kasalamatan. Danggi' mitakkajulu' gaja mangmaroah-roah, ammimalango. Danggi' manggauk sala, danggi' mipugaukki to tangsipato'na, danggi' massibobo' ba'tu masere ati.
45013014	Ake'mo na Puang Isa Almaseh mpatuju kamu' to sipato'na mipugauk. Danggi' mituru'i bang kamadoangan gaja'mi.
45014001	Tarima meloi to padammi tomatappa', moi to malamma kamatapparanna. Danggi' misite'gehhi to pahangna toda ia.
45014002	Den to matappa' kumua sininna kande wa'ding ngasan dikande, apa den to tomalamma kamatapparanna, na utan-utan bangra nakande.
45014003	Ia to sininna kande wa'ding nakande, danggi' nakita majiongngi to tomattantu bang nakande. Na ia to tomattantu bang nakande, danggi' napasalai to padanna tomatappa' to sininna kande wa'ding nakande, nasaba' natarima toomi Puang Allataala.
45014004	Tangsipato' kamu' la mpasala padammi tomatappa', nasaba' kaunanna tau laen. Na den ia Puangna nnissenni, la ke'dehrika ba'tu melolinrika. Apa la mawatangngi ke'deh, nasaba' Puang Allataala mpamawatangngi.
45014005	Den tau mpahangngi kumua den allo la'bi melo na ia to allo laenna. Den too to mpahangngi kumua pada ngasan to allo. Ma'namo ia napugaukki to nasanga tongan situru' pahangna.
45014006	Nasaba' ia to mpahangngi kumua den allo la'bi melo na ia to allo laenna, napugaukki susi joo anna pakala'bih Puang Allataala. Na ia to tote'da apa tangnakande, napugaukki susi joo anna pakala'bih Puang, nasaba' mangkurru sumanga' lakoi Puang Allataala. Ia to tomattantu kandena napugauk too susi joo.
45014007	Te'daki' la ntuoan mesa kaleta' ba'tu la mmatean mesa kaleta'.
45014008	Ia antatuo, tuo lakoki' Puang Allataala. Ia antamate, mate lako tooki' Puang Allataala. Jaji, tuoki' ba'tu mateki', nang taun-Naki' Puang.
45014009	Mangkamo mate to Almaseh, natuo pole'. Iamo pole' joo, Iamo Puangna to tuo, na Puangna to mangkamo mate.
45014010	Jaji, danggi' mipasala padammi tomatappa'. Te'da too miwa'ding la ngkita majiongngi. Nasaba' pada la mangngolo lako ngasanki' Puang Allataala tadiben to assele' panggaukanta'.
45014011	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Nakua Puang Allataala, 'Massapahna' kumua sininna tolino la messuju' jio olo-Ku'. Na sininna tolino la mangngaku kumua Aku'mo Puang Allataala.' "
45014012	Jaji, pada la mpebalianki' kaleta' to panggaukanta' lako Puang Allataala.
45014013	Iamo joo, danggi' tasipasala melako. La'bi melo ia ke tapengkullei anna danggi' tapugauk dosa to napusaba' na padanta' tomatappa' mpugauk toda dosa.
45014014	Kukanassai, nasaba' memmesa' penawamo' sola Puang Isa, kumua sitonganna te'da ia kande harang, apa ia takua kita' lan penawanta' harang, tantu harang lako kaleta'.
45014015	Apa ia ke ia to mikandena napupa'dik penawanna padammi tomatappa', sala to mipugaukkuna, sanga te'da mipakamoja'i. Danggi' na kandemi napugaja'i padammi tomatappa' to tomangkamo napumate Almaseh.
45014016	Iamo joo, moi misangai kumua melo to mipugauk, danggi' mipugaukki, ke nacaccai tau laen kumua sala.
45014017	Ia ke Puang Allataala ngkuasai to katuoanna tau, tangngia dikandena ba'tu diiso'na to parallu, apa iara to kasikalinoan pole' Puang Allataala, mpugauk pakkaeloran-Na, na kamasannangan to nabenni Roh Allataala.
45014018	Ia to tonturu' Almaseh susi joo, napusannang Puang Allataala, nakasiri' tooi tau laen.
45014019	Iamo joo tapengkulleimi mpaden kasikalinoan, sola to apa den bua'na lako kamatapparanna padanta' tomatappa'.
45014020	Danggi' migaja'-gaja'i to mangkamo napugauk Puang Allataala lako padammi tomatappa', sanga kande. Sininna kande hallala' ngasan dikande, apa mipusala, ke mikandei na pumadosai tau laen.
45014021	La'biran danggi' mikandei to juku' ba'tu nniso' anggoro', ba'tu apa bangmo mipugauk, ke la napumadosari padammi tomatappa'.
45014022	Ia to mikatappa'i jiona kande, ake'mo na Puang Allataala manda nnissenni sola iko. Masannang to totangssassan kalena ke napugaukki to nasanga tongan.
45014023	Apa ia to tobata ngkandei to kande, napasala Puang Allataala, nasaba' te'da napasituru'i kamatapparanna. Ia to panggaukan susi joo napumadosa.
45015001	Ia to kita', to mawatang una kamatapparanta', la sabbara'ki' ntulung padanta' tomatappa' to malamma kamatapparanna, ke denni tangnaala penawanna. Danggi' tapemasannangngi mesa kaleta'.
45015002	Sibalikanna la tapemasannangngi joo padanta' tomatappa' to la napumelona, napumawatangngi kamatapparanna.
45015003	Almaseh una nate'da nakamasannangan-Na manda napikkiri', susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala mpaui kumua, "Sininna kada pangcapa' lako Puang Allataala, mangkamo kuperasai."
45015004	Sininna to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala nnajahhiki', dikua antasabbara' ke nakannaki' kamaparrisan, nasamawatang-watangna to rannunta' lako Puang Allataala.
45015005	Dennaa upa' na Puang Allataala, to mangpasabbara' sola mangpakatana, la ntulung kamu' ammituo mesa' penawa situru' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Isa Almaseh.
45015006	Ia ke susii joo, mpamesa' kamu' penawa sola ngasan mpakala'bih Puang Allataala, Ambe'na Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
45015007	La sitarima melo kamu' mesa' sola mesa', susi Almaseh mangkamo ntarima kamu', anna dipakala'bih to Puang Allataala.
45015008	La miingaran ia kumua mangkami Almaseh mentama lino ntulung to-Yahudi, la nanii Puang Allataala mpugauk basse-Na lako tojoloki', anna manassa kumua tongan to kadan-Na Puang.
45015009	Na ia to bangsa laen wa'ding mpakala'bih Puang Allataala, nasaba' kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala. Susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Iamo joo kupakala'bihki' lan tangnga-tangngana bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi. La kupakkelonganki' pangpujian mpau sangan-Ta'."
45015010	Denpa diuki' susi tee, "Ee, parannu kamu' sininna bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi sola umma'-Na Puang Allataala."
45015011	Na iapa tee, "Ee, kamu' sininna bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, la mpakala'bih kamu' Puang. Ee, sininna tolino pakala'bihhi."
45015012	Susi toda tee to napau Nabi Yesaya, "Jio mai bati'na Isai la jaji mesa' tau, to la mparenta sininna bangsa na lako kale-Na nanii sininna bangsa mangrannuan."
45015013	Puang Allataala Iamo rannummi. Dennaa upa' naben kamu' kamarioan sola kamasannangan, nasaba' mikatappa'i, na ia to Roh Allataala mpamawatang kaparannuanmi lako Puang Allataala.
45015014	Ee, tokupusile'to! Kukanassai kumua buda kameloanmi, na miissen melo to pangngajaran-Na Puang ammiwa'ding nnajahhi tau laen.
45015015	Apa lan tee sura' kuuki', kupamanassa to kupangngingaranan kamu', nasaba' napabarakkannimo' Puang Allataala tee jamanku'.
45015016	Napupenjajimo' kaunan-Na Puang Isa Almaseh to disua male lako bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi. Na menjajimo' susi imang to mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan jio mai Puang Allataala. Dennaa upa' na Roh Allataala mpupenjajii to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi susi karoba to napumasannang penawan-Na Puang Allataala.
45015017	Masannang penawangku' ncuritai lako kamu' to jamanku' lako Puang Allataala, nasaba' memmesa' penawana' sola Puang Isa Almaseh.
45015018	Baranina' mpaui umbo nakua Almaseh ntulungna' mangkada sola mangjama, anna ia to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi menturu' lako Puang Allataala.
45015019	Nabenna' Almaseh kuasan-Na Roh Allataala mpugauk panggaukan mejangngaran to tangnadete' akkalan. Susimi joo kupangpeissenanmi to Kareba Kasalamatan, karebanna Almaseh, lako sininna tau, mammula jio mai kota Yerusalem ratu lako tana Ilirikum.
45015020	Na mangngattamo' mpangpeissenanni tee Kareba Kasalamatan lako tote'dapa nasa'dingngi to karebanna Almaseh. Te'da kumadoang mpake'deh bola jao pangrantena tolaen.
45015021	Apa madoangna' mpugaukki susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to tote'dapa nadipauan to karebanna la naissen indari Ia, na ia to tote'dapa nasa'dingngi to karebanna, la napahang."
45015022	Tuli tangjajina' male mati', nasaba' jamanku'.
45015023	Apa ia tee too ia to jamanku' inde' mangka unamo na mangtaun-taunmo' madoang ssitammuan kamu'.
45015024	Jaji, ia ke malena' lako tana Spanyol nnola kota Roma, madoangna' la leppang mati' jolo'. Ia ke mangkamiki' mpaliu mali'ta', melo ke mitulungna' mpatarruh kalingkanku' lako tana Spanyol.
45015025	Apa la malena' jolo' lako kota Yerusalem mbawanni kaparalluanna to umma'-Na Puang jio.
45015026	Sanga situjumi to jamaa jio tana Makedonia sola Akhaya rrempunanni doi' to tokaasi-asi jio kota Yerusalem to matappa'mo.
45015027	Canning atinna sola ngasan ssituru'ii mpugaukki joo. Sipato'nami la ntulung tokaasi-asi jio kota Yerusalem, nasaba' ia to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi ntarimamo barakka'na to-Yahudi. Iamo joo nasipato' ntulung to-Yahudi mpake barakka' ewanan.
45015028	Ia ke mangkami kujama tee mpangbenni joo doi', mane'ra' male lako tana Spanyol nnola mati' kota Roma, kuleppang jolo' ssitammuan kamu'.
45015029	Na kuissen kumua ia ke malena' mati', la kubawan kamu' barakka' jio mai Almaseh.
45015030	Ee, tokupusile'to! Meta'dana' mitongan-tongannii massambajang lako Puang Allataala mpassambajanganna', susi to kupassambajangan. Meta'dana' susi tee, nasaba' memmesa' penawamiki' sola Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh na sipakamoja' toomiki', nasaba' Roh Allataala.
45015031	Massambajang kamu' angkudila'paran jio mai totangmatappa' lako Puang Isa Almaseh jio tana Yudea. Massambajang too kamu' anna tarima meloi umma'-Na Puang Allataala tokaasi-asi jio kota Yerusalem tee pangtulungan.
45015032	Ia ke susimi joo, ianna puelohhi Puang Allataala, la male masannangna' mati', anna matana to penawangku'.
45015033	Dennaa upa' na Puang Allataala, to mpangben kamasannangan, nnampai kamu' sola ngasan. Amin.
45016001	La kupangpetandan to todipusile'to baine disanga Febe, mesa' tontulung jamaa jio kota Kengkrea.
45016002	Tarima meloi susi mesa' umma'-Na Puang, sola susi to sipato'na natarima umma'-Na Puang Allataala. La miben ke denni kaparalluanna, nasaba' budamo pangtulungna lako aku' sola tau laen.
45016003	Sallangku' lako Priskila na Akwila, sangpangjamanku' lan jaman-Na Puang Isa Almaseh.
45016004	Ci'di'mora namate sola dua mpessangkaina'. Te'da na aku' manda to mangkurru sumanga' lako kalena sola dua, apa sininna too jamaa bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi inde'.
45016005	Sallangku' lako jamaa to sirempun jio bolana. Sallangku' lako tomatappa' Epenetus, to kupakamoja'. Iamo jolona to-Asia matappa' lako Almaseh.
45016006	Sallangku' lako Maryam to mbalii tarruh kamu'.
45016007	Sallangku' lako Andronikus na Yunias, sangtondokku' to mangka kusolan ditarungku. Jolo ia menturu' lako Almaseh na aku', na to katandan lan tangnga-tangngana rasulu'.
45016008	Sallangku' lako tomatappa' Ampliatus, to kupakamoja'.
45016009	Sallangku' lako Urbanus sangpangjamanta' lan jaman-Na Almaseh. Sallangku' too lako Stakhis, to kupakamoja'.
45016010	Sallangku' lako Apeles. Mangbuttimo to kamatapparanna lako Almaseh. Sallangku' lako rapunna Aristobulus,
45016011	sola lako Herodion, to sangtondokku'. Sallangku' too lako rapunna Narkisus to matappa'.
45016012	Sallangku' lako Trifena sola Trifosa to tangmekabo'jo' mpangjaman Puang. Sallangku' lako Persis to kupakamoja', to tangmekabo'jo' too mpangjaman Puang.
45016013	Sallangku' lako Rufus to napilei Puang Allataala, sola indona, to butung kupuindo' toomo.
45016014	Sallangku' lako Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas sola tomatappa' laenna to nasolan jio.
45016015	Sallangku' lako Filologus na Yulia, na Nereus sola sile'tona baine, na Olimpas na lako to tomatappa' to nasolan.
45016016	Pada sisalama' melo kamu'. Sininna jamaa to matappa' lako Almaseh massallang mati' sola ngasan.
45016017	Ee, tokupusile'to! Kupakainga' kamu', majaga kamu' lako to mpaden bang kasisakkan, na mpaputta kamatapparan lako Puang Allataala. Ia to pangngajaranna sisala to pura diajaran kamu'. Danggi' misiama'.
45016018	Ia to tosusi joo te'da namengkaunan lako Almaseh Puangta', apa naniiri ia mpemasannangngi penawanna. Melo bang to kadanna to la nanii nnuraga tomaruruh kaju dalle.
45016019	Na naissen ngasan tau kumua mangka kamu' nturu' pangngajaran-Na Puang Allataala. Na liwa' napusannang penawangku' joo. Dennaa upa' mimacca mpugauk kameloan, na tangmiissen mpugaukki to kagajatan.
45016020	Puang Allataalamora, to mben kamasannangan lako tolino, la rro'pokanni to kuasa Ballisi'. Dennaa upa' nabarakka'i kamu' Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
45016021	Sallangna sangpangjamanku' Timotius mati'. Sallangna sangtondokku' Lukius, Yason na Sosipater mati'.
45016022	Aku', Tertius, padammi tomatappa' lako Puang to nnuki'i tee sura', massallang todana' mati'.
45016023	Sallangna Gayus mati' to mpupangbongina' jio bolana to nanii too sirempun jamaa massompa. Sallangna Erastus to nnanna doi' kota. Sallangna too tomatappa' Kwartus. [
45016024	Dennaa upa' nabarakka'i kamu' Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh! Amin.]
45016025	Pakala'bihhi to Puang Allataala! Iamo to kuasan-Na mpamawatang kamatapparanmi situru' Kareba Kasalamatan jio mai Puang Isa Almaseh to kupangpeissenan. Ia tee Kareba te'da naissenni tau tempon jio mai dipadenna lino,
45016026	apa ia tee too dipangpeissenanmi lan sura'na nabi lako sininna bangsa, situru' parenta-Na Puang Allataala to tuo te'da cappa'na, dikua namatappa' ngasan na menturu' lako Puang Allataala.
45016027	Iamo Puang to mandalan tangngah, te'da ia Puang laen. Iamo joo la tapakala'bih tarruhhi te'da cappa'na, nasaba' ia to mangka napugauk Puang Isa Almaseh. Amin. Sallangki' mati' Paulus.
46001001	-
46001002	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan, tomatappa' lako Puang Allataala jio kota Korintus, to napilei Puang Allataala menjaji umma'-Na, to napatorro leko' Puang Isa Almaseh jio mai to totangnturu' Puang, sola sininna to tossompa Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh umbo-umbo nanii! Iamo Puangta' sola ngasan. Aku' Paulus sola padanta' tomatappa' Sostenes ngkiringan kamu' tee sura'. Napileina' Puang Allataala situru' pakkaeloran-Na menjaji rasulu'-Na Puang Isa Almaseh.
46001003	Dennaa upa' nabarakka'i kamu' Ambe'ta' Puang Allataala sola Puang Isa Almaseh naben kamu' kamasannangan.
46001004	Tuli mangkurru sumanga'na' lako Puangku' Puang Allataala, sanga nabenmo kamu' barakka'-Na nasaba' Puang Isa Almaseh.
46001005	Iamo joo miampui buda apa. Susinna mipahang to apa masussa dipahang, na macca kamu' mpangpangngajaranni lako tau.
46001006	Iamo mpamanassai kumua ia to pangngajaran jio mai Almaseh mikatappa'i tonganmo,
46001007	anna te'da barakka' tangmiampui jio mai Puang Allataala, ammida'tan ntajanni to karatuan-Na pole' Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
46001008	Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh Ia la mpamawatang kamu' mida'tan matappa' ratu lako cappa'na anna moi ci'di' te'da kasalanmi, ke ratu pole'mi.
46001009	Ia to Puang Allataala sipato' dikatappa'i. Iamo mpilei kamu' ammimesa' penawa sola Anak Allataala, Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh.
46001010	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Kuasan-Na Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh kumeta'da kumua mimesa' pangtangngaran. Danggi' misipekka, apa la memmesa' penawara kamu'.
46001011	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Napauanna' rapunna Kloe kumua sipekka-pekka kamu'.
46001012	Susi tee to kusanga, pada mipau kumua, "Nturu'na' Paulus," "Nturu'na' Apolos," "Nturu'na' Petrus," ba'tu "Nturu'na' Almaseh."
46001013	Te'da namentama akkalan ke titawa-tawai to umma'-Na Almaseh. Tangngia Paulus dipampang jao kaju sitamben ammididampangan. Te'da too midijio' mpake sanganna Paulus.
46001014	Mangkurru sumanga'na', nasaba' te'da tau kujio' iti', sangadinna Krispus manda sola Gayus.
46001015	Jaji, te'da milamangkada kumua, "Dijio'na' mpake sanganna Paulus."
46001016	Oo, aku' too pale' njio'i Stefanus sola rapunna. Ia to kuingaranna te'damo tolaen kujio'.
46001017	Nasuara' Almaseh male mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan, te'da nasuana' male njio' tau. Tangngia kamaccanku' ba'tu kapaissenanku' kupake mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan. Sanga ia ke susii joo, te'da naissenni tau to kuasa kamatean-Na Almaseh jao kaju sitamben.
46001018	Ia to tolannampa' kamaparrisan keanu' nasangari curita tangtongan to kareba kumua matemi Puang Isa jao kaju sitamben la mpasalama' tolino. Apa ia to kita' to dipasalama'mo taissen kumua, ia joo kareba iamo carana Puang Allataala mpapajan kuasan-Na.
46001019	Nakua Puang Allataala lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to kapaissenanna tomacca la kupasiputtakki na ia to pahangna to buda paissenna la kulanynya'i."
46001020	Ia ke susii joo, te'damo bua'na to tomacca, guru agama sola to buda paissenna lan tee lino. Napangpekitanmo Puang Allataala kumua ia to kapaissenanna tolino te'da lalo angga'na.
46001021	Sanga moi samatumbanna macca to tolino, te'da nakullei nnissen Puang Allataala mpake kamacanna. Apa macca to Puang Allataala. Iamo joo naeloranni dipangpeissenan to Kareba Kasalamatan, to nasanga tolino curita tangtongan, anna pasalama'i to tongkatappa'ii.
46001022	Meta'dai to to-Yahudi tanda mejangngaran menjaji butti, na ia to to-Yunani gaja mpattuanni kapaissenan linona.
46001023	Ia to kita' mpangpeissenan mandaki' Almaseh to mate dipampang jao kaju sitamben. Cia' lalo to to-Yahudi ntarimai joo kareba na ia to bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi nasangari curita tangtongan.
46001024	Apa ia to tonapileimo Puang Allataala, la to-Yahudi, ba'tu bangsa tangngia to-Yahudi, napahang kumua, iamo carana Puang Allataala mpapajan kuasan-Na sola kapaissenan-Na.
46001025	Ia to nasanga tolino tangpakulle-Na Puang Allataala, la'bipa ia pakulle-Na na ia to pakullena tolino. Na ia to nasanga tolino tangpaissen-Na Puang Allataala, la'bipa ia paissenna na ia to kapaissenanna tolino.
46001026	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Ingaranni torroanmi tonna pilei kamu' Puang Allataala. Nasanga tolino ci'di'ra kamu' to tomacca, topakulle ba'tu todikasiri'.
46001027	Napilei Puang Allataala to nasanga tolino tangpaissen anna masiri' to tossanga kalena macca. Napilei too Puang Allataala to nasanga tolino tangpakulle anna masiri' to tossanga kalena topakulle.
46001028	Napilei Puang Allataala to nasanga tolino tomajiong torroanna ba'tu tote'da bua'na iarika totangdikasiri', anna lanynyasan ngasanni Puang Allataala to nasanga tolino parallu.
46001029	Iamo napugaukki susi joo dikua anna moi mesa' tau te'da wa'ding mpikkiri'i kumua, "Napileina' Puang nasaba' kamaccanku'."
46001030	Menjajimo kamu' umma'-Na Puang Isa Almaseh, nasaba' Puang Allataalara. Iamo ssua Puang Isa la mpasalama' kamu', napupenjaji kamu' tomacca, tomelo, napatorro leko' kamu' jio mai to totangnturu' Puang, nala'bak kamu' jio mai kuasa dosa.
46001031	Iamo joo naden diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to tomangpuji, iara la napuji to apa napugauk Puang."
46002001	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Ia tongkuratu iti' mpaissenni kamu' to apa napamanassa Puang Allataala to te'dapa naissenni to totangnturu' Puang, ia joo wattu te'da kupake kapaissenan tolinoku' ba'tu kada mala'bih.
46002002	Nasaba' kuakkattai kumua la padana' too masainna iti' misolan, te'da apa laenna la kupau, ia mandara joo Puang Isa Almaseh matemo dipampang jao kaju sitamben.
46002003	Ia tongkuiti', tangpakullena' kumbe'beh malaja'.
46002004	Ia tongkupangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan lako kamu', te'da kupake kada massede to la nnala penawammi susi kada tomacca. Apa ia to kuasan-Na Roh Allataala pajan lan kadangku'.
46002005	Iamo kupugaukki susi joo, kukua anna danggi' mimatappa' lako kapaissenan tolino, apa matappa' lakora kamu' kuasan-Na Puang Allataala.
46002006	Moi nasusi joo, mpakekan kapaissenanki' ke sipangkadamokan to masaranianmo. Na ia joo kapaissenanki' tangngia kapaissenan naajarankan tolino ba'tu kapaissenan to naampui to tongkuasaii tee lino, sanga la lanynya' joo tongkuasaii.
46002007	Apa ia joo kipau, kapaissenan pole jio mai Puang Allataala. Ia joo kapaissenan te'da naissenni tolino, apa napasadiamo Puang Allataala joo kapaissenan tonna te'dapa nadipaden tee lino, antapumala'bihhi.
46002008	Moi mesa' to tongkuasaii tee lino te'da nnissenni. Sanga ia ke la naissenni, tantu te'damo anna la mpampangngi joo Puang mala'bih jao kaju sitamben.
46002009	Kipangpeissenanni to apa diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Napasadiamo Puang Allataala to la naben lako to tompakamoja'i to te'da lalopa nakitai tolino, to te'da lalopa nasa'dingngi, ba'tu to te'da lalopa nakalannaii."
46002010	Apa lako kita' mangkamiki' napamanassan Roh Allataala, to nabenki' Puang, joo kapaissenan to te'da naissenni tolino. Roh Allataala nnissen sininna apa, moi akkatta-Na Puang Allataala to kaminang mandalan.
46002011	Na ia to issi penawanta', kita' mandara nnissenni, te'da naissenni tau laen. Susi toomi Roh Allataala mandara nnissenni to issi penawan-Na Puang Allataala.
46002012	Te'da nabenki' Puang Allataala cara mangpikkiri' susi tolino, apa Roh Allataalara nabenki', dikua antaissen ngasanni to apa mangka nabenki'.
46002013	Iamo joo, ia ke kipangpeissenanni to kadan-Na Puang Allataala lako tonnampuimo Roh Allataala, te'da kipake kapaissenan tolinoki', apa iara kipake to kada naajarankan Roh Allataala.
46002014	Ia to tote'da naampui Roh Allataala, te'da natarimai to apa naajaranni Roh Allataala, nasaba' nasangari ia curita tangtongan. Te'da nakullei mpahangngi apa to naajaranni Roh Allataala, sanga iapi napahangngi ke denni Roh Allataala lan kalena joo tau mpapahangngii.
46002015	Ia to tonnampui Roh Allataala wa'ding mpahangngi to sininna apa, apa ia to te'da naampui Roh Allataala te'da nakullei mpahang issi penawanna to tonnampui Roh Allataala.
46002016	Te'da nakullei, sanga den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Te'da tau nnissenni to lan penawan-Na Puang anna wa'ding mpakainga'i." Apa ia to lan penawanta' susi to lan penawan-Na Almaseh.
46003001	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Ia tongkuiti' unapa, te'da naden kupangkadai kamu' susi tosipangkada tonnampuimo Roh Allataala. Apa susira' tossipangkadan tonturu'pa kamadoangan penawanna, ba'tu butung pea'-pea'pa to kamatapparanna lako Almaseh.
46003002	Iamo joo, ia to kuajaran kamu' iamo to pangngajah madoi' mentama akkalanmi, tangngiapa to pangngajah susi lako tomasaranianmo, sanga te'dapa mikullei ntarimai. Na moi tee too, te'da bang unapa mikullei ntarimai,
46003003	sanga mituru' unapa to kamadoangan penawammi. Sanga ia ke masere ati unapa kamu', mimassite'geh bang unapa, iamo joo mpabuttii kumua massipa' susi bangpa kamu' to totangnturu' Puang.
46003004	Ia ke den kamu' kumua, "Nturu'na' Paulus," nakua o to laenna, "Nturu'na' Apolos," manassa kumua susipa kamu' to totangnturu' Puang Allataala.
46003005	Sitonganna, ia joo Apolos na ia tee aku' Paulus pada tompangjamanrakan Puang Allataala, to mpatuju kamu' mimatappa' lako Almaseh. Pada kipugauk unamira kami' to nasuankan Puang.
46003006	Aku' ntananni na Apolos nco'bohhi, apa Puang Allataala to mpatuoi.
46003007	Jaji, ia to tomantanan sola tomangbolloh te'da na ia kaminang parallu. Apa Puang Allataalara to kaminang parallu, nasaba' Ia mpatuoi.
46003008	Pada torroanna to tomantanan na tomangbolloh. Pada-pada tooi ntarima assele'na situru' jamanna.
46003009	Ia tee kami', tompangjaman Puang Allataala. Na ia to kamu' butung kamu' bara'bah-Na iarika bola-Na Puang Allataala.
46003010	Ia tee aku' napabarakkannina' Puang Allataala bungah mpangpeissenan karebanna Almaseh lako kamu'. Jaji, ia tee aku' wa'ding dipangpasusii pande bola to macca ngkabua' pangrante melo, apa tau leko'ra la mpake'dehhii bola. Na ia to tompangjaman Puang pada la njama melo jamanna, susi pande bola mpemeloii ke mpake'dehhi bola jao pangrante.
46003011	Nasaba' te'da cara laen menjaji umma'-Na Puang Allataala, saliwanna matappa' lako Almaseh. Jaji, Puang Isa Almasehra to pangrante to mangka napasadia Puang Allataala, te'da pangrante laen.
46003012	Den tau mebola bulawan jao joo pangrante, den to mebola salaka, den too tompake batu paramata, apa den too tompake kaju, mpake reu makase ba'tu jarame.
46003013	Ia to jamanna tau pada la pajanni ke ratu pole'mi Almaseh la rra'tah kara-karana tolino, nasaba' ia joo wattu api la pada mpamanassai to jamanna.
46003014	Ia ke denni bola te'da nakandei api, la nnampa' pahalana joo tompake'dehhi.
46003015	Apa ia ke nakandei api, la kata'dean pahalana joo tompake'dehhi. Battuananna la salama' ia, apa susimira to kumua mpella'paranri kalena lan mai api.
46003016	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Manassa miissen kumua kamu'mo bola-Na Puang Allataala, sanga torromi to Roh Allataala lan kalemi.
46003017	Ianna den tau nggaja'-gaja' kasikalinoanna umma'-Na Puang Allataala, la nagaja'-gaja' todai Puang Allataala joo tau. Nasaba' ia to bola-Na Puang Allataala, ia mandara Ia la ntorroii, na kamu'mo joo bola-Na.
46003018	Danggi' lalo naden tau nnuraga kalena. Ianna den tau lan tangnga-tangngami ssanga kalena paissen situru' kapaissenan tolinona, la'biran ke mbangosanni kalena jolo', nawa'ding menjaji topaissen situru' Puang.
46003019	Nasaba' ia to disanga kapaissenan lan tee lino, nasanga kabangosanri ia Puang Allataala. Diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Kadanna to tossanga kalena paissen nanii njokkoi Puang Allataala."
46003020	Diuki' too lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Naissen Puang kumua te'da bua'na to tangngahna topaissen."
46003021	Iamo joo danggi' lalo naden tau misanga mala'bih na ia to tau laen. Sininna joo naben ngasanmo kamu' Puang la mipumelo.
46003022	La Paulus, Apolos na Petrus, la ia tee lino, la katuoan na kamatean, la ia tee too la jiona ahera', la mipumelona ngasan.
46003023	Na ia to kamu', apan-Na kamu' Almaseh, na ia to Almaseh apan-Na Puang Allataala.
46004001	La misangakan kumua tompangjamankan Almaseh, sanga nasuakan Almaseh mpangpeissenanni to akkatta-Na Puang Allataala to te'dapa naissenni to totangnturu' Puang.
46004002	Ia to kaminang parallu lako to todisua, iamo to kumua la tatta'i mpugaukki to apa nasuanni puangna.
46004003	Iamo joo te'da naciapa ke mitongananni ba'tu mipasalai to jamanku'. Te'da naciapa moi inda mpugaukki joo. Moi aku' te'da kutonganan ba'tu mpasala kaleku'.
46004004	Ia ke aku' te'da caccaku' moi ci'di', apa te'da na ia joo la menjaji butti kumua tomelona'. Puangra ia to la mparessana' anna tongananna' ba'tu napasalana'.
46004005	Iamo joo danggi' mimadoi' bang mpasala tau kumua tokasalan, ba'tu ntongananni kumua tomelo, sanga te'dapa nadete'i wattunna. Tajanni karatuan-Na pole' Puang, sanga Ia la nnarrangngi to apa membuni. Ia too la mpapajanni to akkattana tolino to nabunianan lan penawanna. Ia joo wattu mane'ri napuji Puang Allataala to tau, to tosipato' dipuji.
46004006	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ia tee mangka kupau nena' nakannana' sola Apolos. Mpakekan kaleki' la mialai palelean mata to la mipumelona ammipahangngi tee kada to kumua, "Turu'i to atoran denmo". Ia ke mipahangmi joo, te'damo mimatampo na te'da too mipasilaenanni to tompangjaman Puang, battuananna te'da mikita majaoi mesa' mikita majiongngi to laenna.
46004007	Te'da kamu' matande na ia to tolaen. Sininna to apa miampui mitarima jio ngasan mai Puang Allataala. Jaji, ciapari mimatampo susi to misangai kumua sininna to apa miampui te'da napole jio mai Puang Allataala!
46004008	Misangaraka kumua te'damo apa miparallui, sanga sugihmo kamu'! Misangaraka kumua menjajimo kamu' raja na te'da kami'na! Gaja sannangkan ke la tonganna kamu' menjaji raja, antaraja sola!
46004009	Ia to passanganku', ia tee kami' rasulu' napileanmokan Puang Allataala to torroan kaminang majiong, sanga susikan to mangkamo dipapassanni pangsessa kamatean, nasikita-kitaikan sininna apa lan lino, la malaeka', la tolino.
46004010	Ia tee kami' rasulu' nasangakan tau tobango', sanga mpangpeissenankan karebanna Almaseh! Na ia to kamu' misanga kumua tomaccamo kamu', sanga memmesa' penawamo kamu' sola Almaseh! Ia tee kami' totangpakullekan, apa ia to kamu' misanga kumua topakulle kamu'! Ia tee kami' te'da nataratte'kan tau, apa ia to kamu' nataratte' kamu' tau!
46004011	Ratu lako too allo den kitangbarah na mawakke tookan. Ia to pakeanki', ia mandamo to kipakena. Nasessakan tau, na te'da to kinii mari'pih.
46004012	Kipengkullei tongan nnangahhi to la kikandena. Ianna tampakkikan ropu tau, kibarakka'i. Ianna sessakan, sabbara'kan.
46004013	Ianna pau gaja'kan tau, kipangkadai meloi. Te'da silaenanki' to burauk lan tee lino. Ratu lako too allo nasanga unapakan tau to ncarepai lino.
46004014	Ia tee kuukiran kamu', te'dara kukua ammimasiri', apa kupangngingaranra kamu' susi anak jajianku'.
46004015	Nasaba' moi na buda gajamo gurummi nnajahhi kamu' karebanna Almaseh, apa aku'mo mikita ambe'. Sanga aku'mo mpangpeissenan Kareba Kasalamatan lako kamu' ammimemmatappa' lako Puang Isa Almaseh.
46004016	Iamo joo kupangngingaran kamu' dikua anna aku' miala palelean mata.
46004017	Na kusuami mati' to Timotius, to kupakamoja'. Ia to Timotius susi anak tonganku', natatta' mpugauk jaman-Na Puang. Iamo la mpangngingaran kamu' matumba caraku' nturu' Almaseh, susi to kupangpangngajaran lako sininna jamaa la umbo-umbo nanii.
46004018	Den ba'tu pira-pira tau lan tangnga-tangngami memmatampo, nasaba' nasangai te'da kulamale mati'.
46004019	Apa ia ke napuelohhi Puang, la madoi'na' male mati'. Ratupa' mati', kuissenni kuasa pole jioraka mai Roh Allataala ba'tu kadanna bangri merambu-rambu tuu mati' tomatampo!
46004020	Nasaba' ianna kuasaii Puang Allataala to tau, la napabutti lan panggaukanna, tangngia kadanna manda.
46004021	Jaji, umbonnara mikabudai? La kusessara kamu'ka, ba'tu la kupakitanra kamu'ka pangpakamoja'ku' angkupangkadai rampa' kamu'?
46005001	Sitonganna denmo kareba napauanna' tau kumua den kamu' to manggauk sala liwa' gaja'. Den padanta' tomatappa' sibali indo porona. Ia una ia to tote'dapa naissen Puang Allataala, te'da ia napugaukki to susi joo!
46005002	Na moi madosa susi joo, kannora kamu' mpamajao penawammi. Sitonganna la massera kamu' ntangngahhi, ammipasunni lan mai tangnga-tangngami tuu joo tomanggauk susi joo.
46005003	Moi sikambelaki', apa ia to penawangku' sitonganna butung to iti'na' lan tangnga-tangngami sola ngasan. Na mangka kura'tah lan penawangku' to apa la digaukanni lako to tomangka mpugaukki susi joo, butung to iti'na'.
46005004	Jaji, ia tommisirempun, la misanga ia kumua iti'na' misolan, na kuasan-Na Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh nnampai kamu', situru' kuasa to nabenki',
46005005	la mialai lan mai tangnga-tangngami joo tau ammisorongngi lako kuasanna Ballisi' anna masolang to batang kalena, na ia to penawanna dipasalama', ke ratu pole'mi Puang Isa rra'tah kara-karana tolino.
46005006	Te'da lalo misipato' matampo. Tantu miissen battuananna tee pangpasusian kumua, "Ia to ragi ci'di' mpaloboh ta'pung ke mangkami dilama."
46005007	Ca'beanmi joo ragi, iamo to dosa, ammida'tan menjaji tau mesan-Na Puang Allataala, susi panglama baru tangdiragii. Umma'-Namiki' Puang Allataala, nasaba' mangkamo dipangkaroban to bembala' Paskah to lla'bakki' jio mai dosa, iamo to Almaseh.
46005008	Jaji, la mangrame-ramemiriki' mpangramean Allo Paskah ngkande roti tangkeragi, ragi to dipangpasusii dosa ba'tu kagajatan, battuananna ia mandamora la tapugauk to napumasannang Puang Allataala.
46005009	Kupaumo lan to sura' joloku' lako kamu' kumua danggi' misibawanni to tomanggauk sala.
46005010	Ia to kusanga tangngia to sininna tomanggauk sala lan tee lino, ba'tu tongkake'lai ewanan, tokalasi ba'tu tossompa dewata. Te'da na ia tuu lako tosusi joo to kusanga, nasaba' ia ke tosusi joo, la messunmora kamu' lan mai tee lino.
46005011	Apa ia to kusanga, iara to tossangamo kalena matappa', anna manggauk sala unapa, ngkake'lapa ewanan, ssompa unapa dewata, mpau gaja' tau, pangmalangoanpa, kalasi unapa. Moi cumadokko kamu' kumande sola to tosusi joo, danggi' lalo ia.
46005012	-
46005013	Tangngia jamanku' la rra'tah kara-karana to tote'dapa namatappa' lako Puang Allataala. Puangra la rra'tahhi to kara-karana to totangmatappa'. Susi toda kamu', kara-karana ia to tomatappa'mo mira'tah. Susi to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ula'ii to togaja' lan mai tangnga-tangngami."
46006001	Ciapari na denra to barani lan tangnga-tangngami male mangparapa' lako tomangra'tah kara-kara to te'da naissen Puang, ke denni kara-karana sola padanna tomatappa'? Ciapari na te'da namale lako to tomatappa' meta'da na ia mpasipemeloanni?
46006002	Tantu miissenmo kumua umma'-Nara Puang Allataala to la mbicarai to tolino. Na ia ke susii joo, na tantu moi kara-kara biccu' mikulle too rra'tahhi.
46006003	Tantu miissenmo kumua kita'ra la mbicarai tuu mati' malaeka', ke Kiama'mi lino. Apa pole' oraka to kara-kara biasa bangra keallo-keallo!
46006004	Na ia ke denni kara-karami, ciapari mimalera mpangngoloi lako to tote'da namatappa'?
46006005	Liwa' ia mesirisan! Tantu den lan tangnga-tangngami to padammi tomatappa' na paissen, to wa'ding mbicarai joo kara-karami.
46006006	Apa sibalikanna, male ora kamu' mparapa' padammi tomatappa' lako totangmatappa'.
46006007	Ia unapa tuu pada sipekka kamu' na mesa'mo kaditaloanmi. Ia pole' oraka to male kamu' siparapa' lako tomangra'tah to te'da namatappa'. Ciapari na te'da mipada ntaloan bangmo kalemi! La'biran ke dipaolai kamu' tangmaruruhna ba'tu diparugi kamu'!
46006008	Apa kannora kamu' majekkong mpaden karugian lako tau laen. Na ia joo lako pissen o padammi tomatappa'!
46006009	Tantu miissenmo kumua ia to tote'da naturu' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, te'da namenjaji umma'-Na Puang Allataala. Danggi' miuraga kalemi! Ia to tomanggauk sala, tossompa dewata, tosibali padanna muane,
46006010	taboko, tomangkake'la, topangmalangoan, tompau gaja' tau, tokalasi, ia ngasanmo to tosusi joo te'da namenjaji umma'-Na Puang Allataala.
46006011	Ba'tu pira-pira tau lan tangnga-tangngami massipa' susi joo tonna jolona. Apa ia tee too, ia to Puang Isa Almaseh sola Roh Allataala to pole jio mai Puangta' Puang Allataala mangka lla'paran kamu' jio mai kuasa dosa, na mpupenjaji tau mesan-Na kamu' Puang Allataala, sola napupenjaji tomelokamu'.
46006012	Den tau nakua, wa'ding ngasan dipugauk to sininna apa. Apa ianna aku' kukua te'da na ia ngasan bang to panggaukan den bua'na. Jaji, moi na hallala' ngasan to apa lako kaleku', apa cia'na' nneloran kaleku' nakuasai moi apa.
46006013	Den too tomangkada kumua, ia to kinande nandena ba'tang, na ia to ba'tang dipasadian nande. Apa pada la nalanynyasanni Puang Allataala. Ia to batang kale te'da nadipaden la manggauk sala, apa dipadenri la ssompa Puang, na Iamora ngkuasaii to batang kale.
46006014	Mangkamo Puang Allataala mpatuo pole' Puang Isa jio mai kamatean, susi toomi kita' la napatuo pole' tooki' kuasan-Na Puang Allataala.
46006015	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Tantu miissenmo kumua ia to kalemi lesoan kale-Na Almaseh. Nawa'dingraka ke kualaii mesa' to lesoan kale-Na Almaseh kupupenjajii lesoan kalena baine bandarang? Te'da lalo ia nawa'ding!
46006016	Tantu miissen toomo kumua ia to tosigauk sala sola baine bandarang, ia to batang kalena memmesa'mira sola joo baine. Nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Mesa' kalemira sola dua."
46006017	Apa ia to tompangmesa' kalena lako Puang, memmesa' penawa tooi sola Puang.
46006018	Danggi' manggauk sala, sanga sininna dosa laen to napugauk tau, saleanan jio mai kalena joo tau. Apa ia to tomanggauk sala, ia una mpamasolang batang kalena.
46006019	Tantu miissenmo kumua ia to batang kalemi bola-Na Roh Allataala, to naben kamu' Puang Allataala torro lan kalemi. Jaji, ia tee batang kalemi tangngiamo apammi, apa apannamo ia Puang Allataala.
46006020	Mangkamo kamu' naalli putta Puang Allataala. Iamo joo pake meloi to batang kalemi, anna pakala'bihhi tau to Puang Allataala.
46007001	Ia to la kupau tee too, iamo to miuki' lan sura'mi. Melo ke te'dai nakebaine to mesa' muane.
46007002	Apa dikua anna danggi' namanggauk sala to tau, melo ke denni balinna.
46007003	Na ia to muane la napugauk to sipato'na napugauk muane lako bainena, susi toda to baine, la napugauk to sipato'na napugauk baine lako muanena.
46007004	Sanga ia to baine te'da nakuasai batang kalena, apa muanenara to ngkuasaii. Susi toda to muane, te'da nakuasai batang kalena apa nakuasai todai bainena.
46007005	Danggi' micia' mamma' sola balimmi. Wa'ding una ke te'dai nalamasai, assalan misitujuimi sola dua, anna den wattummi massambajang lako Puang Allataala. Ianna dete'mi to wattu misitujui, pole pole'mo kamu' lako balimmi, sanga ia ke te'dai misusi joo, wa'ding kamu' nasede Ballisi' manggauk sala, ke te'da mikullei nta'tan kamadoanganmi.
46007006	Tangngia parenta tee kupau, apa wa'ding mipugauk ke situjumo kamu' to tosibali.
46007007	Sitonganna la'bi kukabudai ke belang ngasanni to tau susi aku'. Apa pada ntarimamo kamu' barakka' mattantu jio mai Puang Allataala. Jaji, silaenan to barakka' pada ditarima.
46007008	Na lako to tote'dapa nakebali sola to tomatemo balinna kukua, la'bi melo ke tangkebali bangmi susi aku'.
46007009	Apa ia ke tangmikullei nta'tan kamadoanganmi, kebali bangmo kamu'. Nasaba' la'biran ke kebali kamu' na ia ke mallua'-lua'i to penawammi.
46007010	Na lako kamu' to denmo balinna kusuai susi tee, sitonganna tangngia aku' massua, apa Puang. Kusuai kumua ia to baine kemuanemo, danggi' nasarak muanena.
46007011	Apa ia ke nasarakki, la da'tan bang tangkemuane, iarika sipole pole'i muanena. Susi toda to muane, danggi' nasarak bainena.
46007012	Na lako tolaen to denmo balinna, kupau too susi tee. Kadangku' aku' tee, tangngia kadan-Na Puang. Kupau kumua ia ke denni muane matappa' na te'dapa namatappa' to bainena, apa madoangngi torro sola joo muanena, danggi' nasarakki joo bainena.
46007013	Susi too, ia ke denni baine matappa' na te'dapa namatappa' to muanena, apa madoangngi torro sola joo bainena, danggi' nasarakki joo muanena.
46007014	Nasaba' ia joo muane tangmatappa' dipasusimo umma'-Na Puang Allataala sanga kamatapparanna joo bainena. Susi too ia to baine tangmatappa' dipasusimo umma'-Na Puang Allataala sanga kamatapparanna joo muanena. Ia ke te'dai nasusi joo, ia to anakkana te'da nadipasusi umma'-Na Puang Allataala, apa ia tee too dipasusimi umma'-Na.
46007015	Apa ia ke meta'dai to totangmatappa' disarak, ake'mo naeloranni tomatappa' namale. Kamu' to tomatappa'mo te'da midiparuku torro tarruh sola balimmi ke susii joo. Apa madoangri Puang Allataala kumua misikalino.
46007016	Na kamu' baine tomatappa'mo, umbo mikua nnissenni kumua ba'tu la mipasalama' unai to muanemi? Susi toda kamu' muane tomatappa'mo, umbo mikua nnissenni kumua ba'tu la mipasalama' unai to bainemi?
46007017	Kupangpangngajaran lako sininna jamaa la umbo-umbo nanii kumua, pada la tuo kamu' susi to mangkamo napabarakkanan kamu' Puang Allataala. Jaji, la tuo kamu' susi tommimane' matappa'.
46007018	Susinna, ia ke denni tau mangkamo disunna' tonna memmatappa', danggi' namadoang nta'deii joo sunna'na. Susi too ke denni tau tangdisunna' tonna memmatappa', danggi' too namadoang la disunna'.
46007019	Naturu'i ba'tu tangnaturu'i joo atoran sunna', pada bang unai pada te'da bua'na. Ia to kaminang parallu, iara to nturu' parenta-Na Puang Allataala.
46007020	La'bi melo ia ke ia to tau pada la da'tan tuo susi tonna mane' matappa'.
46007021	Ia ke kaunan kamu' tommimane' matappa', te'da naciapa. Apa ianna den wattummi dipamaradeka, pakei joo wattu.
46007022	Ia to kaunan namatappa'mo lako Puang, tomaradekan-Namo ia Puang. Na ia to tomaradeka namatappa'mo lako Puang, kaunan-Na ia Almaseh.
46007023	Danggi'mo mieloran kalemi menjaji kaunanna tolino, nasaba' mangkamo kamu' naalli putta Puang Allataala.
46007024	Ee, tomala'bihku'! La da'tan bang kamu' tuo susi tommimane' matappa'.
46007025	Ia to kamu' to te'dapa nakebali la kupau susi tee. Te'da kuampa' parenta jio mai Puang, apa ia tee pangngampa'ku' la kupau, nasaba' mangkana' napabarakkanni Puang kumua ia to kupau wa'ding dikatappa'i.
46007026	Kupau kumua ia ke mipikkiri'i to kamaparrisan to naoloi tomatappa' tee too, kusanga la'biran ia, ke da'tanmo kamu' tuo susi tee too.
46007027	Ianna denmo bainemi, danggi' mimeta'da la ssarakki. Na ia ke te'dapa bainemi, danggi' omo mikebaine.
46007028	Apa tangngia dosa ke kebaine kamu'. Na ia ke den anakdara kemuane, tangngia too ia dosa. Ia mandara ia to kumua, ia to tokebalimo nnoloi buda parri'. Na ia ke elohku', kukua kenna te'da nakanna kamu' kamaparrisan.
46007029	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Susi tee to kusanga. Cingga'tu'mora to wattunta'. Mammula tee too ia to tokebalimo la tuoi susi tote'dapa nakebali.
46007030	Ia to tokumillak la butung tote'da namasse penawanna. Ia to tometawa la butung to te'da namario. Ia to tomangka nnalli buda apa la butung tote'da apa naampui.
46007031	Na ia to tonasarai sara' lan lino la butung to te'da apa ssaraii. Nasaba' ia tee lino, susi to takita tee too, te'damo namasai nalanynya'!
46007032	Madoangna' kumua kenna danggi' miperasai kamasussan. Susinna ia to tobelangpa, Puang manda napikkiri', nasaba' madoangngi mpamasannang Puang.
46007033	Apa ia to tokebainemo, ia to apa lan lino napikkiri', susinna umbo nakua la mpamasannang bainena,
46007034	naarannai sitawa-tawa to penawanna. Ia to baine te'damo muanena sola to anakdara Puang manda napikkiri', nasaba' madoangngi mpassompan kalena lako Puang. Apa ia to baine kemuanemo mpangmesa lakomo apa lan tee lino to penawanna, nasaba' madoangngi mpamasannang muanena.
46007035	Iamo kuuki' ngasanni tee, sanga la mipumelona, te'dara kumua kuanggai kamu' mpugaukki to ianna joo, ba'tu ianna tee. Ia mandara kukadoangngi to kumua, ammipugaukki to tonganna sola sipato'na, ammipangmassang lakoi Puang to penawammi.
46007036	Ia ke den muane mangpikkiri' kumua te'da napugaukki to sipato'na lako sitangka'na ke te'dai nasibali, na ia ke te'da nakullei nta'tan kamadoanganna, namangpikkiri' kumua melo ke sibalii joo sitangka'na, ake'mo nasibali ke napumeloi, sanga te'da namadosa ke sibalii.
46007037	Apa ia ke cia'i la sibali joo tangka'na, na ia joo kara'tasanna te'da naparukui, melo joo, assalan nakullei nta'tan kamadoanganna.
46007038	Iamo joo melo ke sibalii joo sitangka'na, apa la'bi mellong ke te'dai nasibali.
46007039	Ia to baine kemuanemo ia mandara nakannai atoran tosibali, ke tuo unapi to muanena. Ianna matemo to muanena, la'pahmi joo baine, wa'dingmo ia kemuane pole' ke madoangngi, assalan padanna tomatappa' lako Almaseh.
