58003006	Apa Anak to Almaseh to dipabarakkanni jaman ntulung sininna taun-Na Puang Allataala. Na kita'mo tee to taun-Na, ke da'tanki' matappa' sola da'tanki' mangrannuan lako manda Puang Isa.
58003007	Iamo joo susi to napau Roh Allataala lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia tee too, ke misa'dingngi to gamaran-Na Puang Allataala,
58003008	danggi' mimembattuk susi tojolomi to nasolan Nabi Musa jio mai tondok Mesir, tonna mbali-bali Puang Allataala, na nnuji Puang Allataala, jio padang pallawangan.
58003009	Nakua Puang Allataala, 'Ntuumo jio nanii nnujina' tojolomi, moi na patang pulo taun masainna nanii ngkitai to pangtulung-Ku'.'
58003010	Iamo joo namagalli Puang Allataala lako tuu lako tau nakua, 'Da'tanni nnewana', na cia' lalo nturu' parenta-Ku'.
58003011	Angkumagalli kumassapah kukua: Nang la te'damo namentama ntuu joo tondok, to nanii kenden tarruhmo sola Aku'.' "
58003012	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ingaran meloi, danggi' naden to mangpenawa gaja' susi joo, ammicia' matappa' lako Puang Allataala to tuo.
58003013	Jaji, allo-allo kamu' la sipupangngingaran, danggi' naden tau nnuraga kalena mpugauk dosa, mimembattuk. La sipupangngingaran kamu' ke tuo unapa kamu' lan tee wattu to nasanga lan Sura' Allataala, "Ia tee too."
58003014	Sanga kita' ngasanmo nnampa' barakka' jio mai Almaseh, ke matappa' tarruhki' susi tontamane' matappa' ratu lako ssalainta' lino.
58003015	Susi tee to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia tee too ke misa'dingngi to gamaran-Na Puang Allataala, danggi' mimembattuk, susi tojolomi to nasolan Nabi Musa jio mai tondok Mesir, tonna mbali-bali Puang Allataala."
58003016	Indamora to ssa'ding gamaran-Na Puang Allataala nabali-balii? Ia to sininna tau nasolan Nabi Musa messun lan mai tondok Mesir.
58003017	Na indara to nakagalli Puang Allataala patang pulo taun masainna? Ia to tompugauk dosa anna mate jio padang pallawangan.
58003018	Na indara to mangkamo napassaparan Puang Allataala, kumua te'dai la mentama tondok to nanii kenden tarruhmo mangjama sola Ia? Ia to tocia' menturu' lako Puang Allataala.
58003019	Jaji, tapahangmo kumua te'da nadieloran mentama, nasaba' cia'i matappa' lako Puang Allataala.
58004001	Tatta' bang unapa to basse-Na Puang Allataala kumua wa'dingki' mentama tondok to tanii kenden tarruhmo mangjama sola Ia. Iamo joo taingaran meloi danggi' naden tau tanglamentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan to dibasseanki'.
58004002	Mangkamo dipangpeissenan joo Kareba Kasalamatan lako kita' susi bang una lako to-Yahudi tonna anu'. Apa te'da bua'na lako kalena, sanga te'da namatappa' tonna sa'dingngi.
58004003	Kita'mo tomatappa' la mentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan nabasseanki' Puang Allataala. Apa ia to totangmatappa' te'da nalamentama, situru' kadan-Na Puang Allataala kumua, "Magallina' kumassapah kukua, 'Nang la te'damo namentama ntuu joo tondok, to nanii kenden tarruhmo sola Aku'.' " Te'da namentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan sola Puang Allataala moi namangkamo dipasadia mellao jio mai kajajianna tee lino.
58004004	Na ia to allo mangpempitu, den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia tonna allo mangpempitu nakendennii Puang Allataala to sininna jaman-Na."
58004005	Na den toopa diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Te'da nalamentama ntuu joo tondok, to nanii kenden tarruhmo sola Aku'."
58004006	Jaji, ia to bungah ssa'dingngi joo Kareba Kasalamatan te'dai mentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan sanga cia'i matappa'. Ia ke susii joo, manassamo kumua den tolaen wa'ding mentama.
58004007	Iamo joo napattantu pole' omi Puang Allataala to wattu laen nanii wa'ding to tolino mentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan. Na ia joo wattu sitonganna iamo tee too. Buttinna kumua mangtaun-taun mangkanna Nabi Musa, nauki' pole'i Raja Daud kadan-Na Puang Allataala to mangka tasa'ding nena' kumua, "Ia tee too ke misa'dingngi to gamaran-Na Puang Allataala, danggi' mimembattuk!"
58004008	Ia ke la nakullei Yosua ssolanni to to-Yahudi mentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan to nabasse Puang Allataala, la te'damo napau pole'i Puang Allataala to mesa' wattu laen.
58004009	Jaji, tatta' bang unapa to basse-Na Puang Allataala lako umma'-Na, iamo to kakendenan susi kakendenan-Na Puang Allataala ke allo mangpempitui.
58004010	Sanga ia to tomentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan la nakendenni tarruhhi to jamanna susi Puang Allataala.
58004011	Iamo joo melo ke tapengkulle-kullei mentama ntuu joo tondok kakendenan to nabasse Puang Allataala, dikua danggi' naden tau tangmentama, susi to-Yahudi tonna anu', sanga cia'i matappa' lako Puang Allataala.
58004012	Kada tuo na mawatang too to kadan-Na Puang Allataala, na la'bi mataran na ia to pa'dang mataran patomali. Susi pa'dang ntarruh kale ratu lako panglesoan na buku lampa, susi too kadan-Na Puang Allataala ntarruh penawa nnissen pikkirisanna sola akkalanna tolino.
58004013	Moi mesa' to apa kepenawa te'da membuni jio olo-Na Puang Allataala. Sininna apa pajan jio olo-Na Puang Allataala. Na la tapebalii to panggaukanta' lako Puang Allataala.
58004014	Denmo Imang Lompo tomala'bihta' to malemo de' suruga mangngolo lako Puang Allataala, iamo to Puang Isa, Anak Allataala. Iamo joo la matappa' tarruhki' na danggi' tapessakkannii kumua tangngia Puangta' to Puang Isa.
58004015	Ia joo Imang Lompota' naissen to katangpakulleanta', sanga mangkami dipengkulle-kullei disede mpugauk dosa susi kita', apa te'da napugauk dosa.
58004016	Iamo joo tapada mbaranian kaleta' mangngolo lako Puang Allataala to mpakamoja'ki'. Ia ke tapugaukki susi joo, la taperasai to pangkamasean-Na sola kameloan penawan-Na, nasaba' te'da namela' ntulungki' tontaparalluii.
58005001	Sininna Imang Lompo dipilei jio mai tau biasa, nadiangka' la mpangjaman Puang Allataala wwakkele'ii tuu lako tau. Iamo jamanna to mpangngolo passompan sola karoba lako Puang Allataala dikua nadidampangan to tau.
58005002	Tau biasa joo Imang Lompo na buda caccana ba'tu kakuranganna. Iamora joo nawa'ding nnissen apara naperasai to tompugauk dosa nasaba' te'dapa naissenni to pangngajaran tongan.
58005003	Ia ke mpassompanni karoba, tangngia nasaba' dosana mandara tobuda, apa dosana todai ia, sanga buda toda ia kakuranganna.
58005004	Moi mesa' tau te'da nnangka' kalena menjaji Imang Lompo, apa iapi namenjaji Imang Lompo ke napileii Puang Allataala susi to apa jaji lako imang Harun tonna anu'.
58005005	Susi toomi to Almaseh. Te'da na ia nnangka' kalena menjaji Imang Lompo. Apa Puang Allataalara nnangka'i tonna kuanni, "Ikomo Anak-Ku'. Mammula tee too Aku'mo ambe'mu."
58005006	Lan aya' laen nakua toopa Puang Allataala, "Ikomo to imang te'da cappa'na susi imang Melkisedek."
58005007	Ia tonna tuo unapa Puang Isa lan lino, massambajangngi napasibawai wai matanna to sarro-Na lako Puang Allataala to makuasa mpasalama'i jio mai kamatean. Natarima Puang Allataala to peta'dan-Na, nasaba' mpamajiongngi kalena na mangpesa'ding lako Puang Allataala.
58005008	Anak Allataalai to Puang Isa, apa moi nasusi joo napelajahhi todai mengkaturu' tonna maparri'.
58005009	Susimi joo nadipupenjaji Tomangpasalama' te'da caccana ba'tu kakuranganna to mben katuoan melo te'da cappa'na lako tomengkaturu' lako Ia.
58005010	Naangka'i Puang Allataala menjaji Imang Lompo, susi imang Melkisedek.
58005011	Budapa to parallu la kiajaran kamu' to kadiangkasan-Na Puang Isa menjaji Imang Lompo, apa masussa kamu' la diajahhi sanga makuttu kamu' mangpesa'ding.
58005012	Masaimo mituru' to Puang Isa. Sitonganna wattunnamo kamu' mpangpangngajaran kadan-Na Puang Allataala. Apa ianna dikita, parallupa kamu' diajahhi pole' to pangngajaran jio mai kadan-Na Puang Allataala to biasa diben tau mane' matappa' lako Puang Isa. Susipa kamu' pea biccu', tangmitamapangkande kande makarrah, tollo' bang unapa la mikande.
58005013	Ia to tongkandepa tollo', battuananna pea biccu'pa ia, te'dapa naissenni to disanga melo na gaja'.
58005014	Ia to kande makarrah dipasadian tomasaranianmo. Tomasaranianmo battuananna ia joo tau nnissenmo to disanga melo na gaja', naturu'i to melo.
58006001	Iamo joo melo ke mipamulai mpelajahhii to pangngajaran kasaranian to sipato' dipangngajaran lako to masaranianmo, danggi' na ia manda mipelajahhi to bungah pangngajaran. Danggi' omo na ia midadu'-dadu' bang to bungah pangngajaran to kumua la tatorroimi mpugaukki to apa te'da bua'na, na la matappa' lako Puang Allataala,
58006002	ba'tu bungah pangngajaran laen susinna to pangjioran, kapanglullungan pala', katuoan pole' jio mai kamatean, ba'tu pangsessa te'da cappa'na.
58006003	Jaji, ia ke napuelohhi Puang Allataala, la memmasaranianmiki'!
58006004	-
58006006	Ia ke denni tomatappa'mo lako Puang Isa anna cia' pole' omo matappa', te'damo nadikulle mpupengkatoba' pole'i. Naperasaimo to barakka'-Na Puang Allataala, naperasai toomo to kuasan-Na Roh Allataala, naissenmo to kumua melo to kadan-Na Puang Allataala, naperasai toomo to kuasan-Na to la napake jio ahera'. Apa ia ke susii joo, nacia'mo ia matappa' lako Puang Isa, te'damo nadikulle mpupengkatoba' pole'i, sanga padami to mpampang pole' Anak Allataala jao kaju sitamben. Iamo joo napusaba' nate'damo nakasiri'i tobuda to Puang Isa.
58006007	Ia to padang ncuccu' wai uran ke uran oi, na mpaendek assele' tananan makkeguna lako to tonjamai, nabarakka'i Puang Allataala.
58006008	Apa ia to padang ke natuoii dea sola duri, te'da bua'na. La natampakki ropu Puang Allataala na undinna la disumpun.
58006009	Ee, tomala'bihku' to kupakamoja'! Moi angkimangkada susi joo, apa kikatappa'i kumua ia to kamu' susi to padang nabarakka'i Puang Allataala ammimangnguju lako kasalamatan.
58006010	Te'da natangmaruruh to Puang Allataala. Te'da natangnningaranni to apa mipugauk, iamo to pangpakamoja'mi to mipangpekitan lako kale-Na tommitulung padammi tomatappa', la jolona, la ia too allo.
58006011	Gaja kirannuan kumua kemmipada masumanga' tarruh ratu lako cappa'na ammitarimai to apa mirannuan.
58006012	Cia'kan ke memmakuttu kamu'. Apa madoangkan kumua miala palelean matai to tomatappa' lako Puang Allataala, anna sabbara' ntajanni sanaampa'na to apa nabasseanni Puang Allataala.
58006013	Ia tonna pau basse-Na Puang Allataala lako Nabi Ibrahim, namassapah kumua la napugauk to apa pura nabasseanni. Massapah Puang Allataala mpau sangan-Na, nasaba' te'da tau la'bi makuasa na Ia.
58006014	Napassaparanni to kalena kumua, "Danggi' musangana' Puang Allataala, ke te'dai kubarakka'iko, angkupupembudai to bati'mu."
58006015	Sabbara'i to Nabi Ibrahim ntajanni to janjinna, sanggenna naampa' to apa nabasseanni Puang Allataala.
58006016	Ianna massapah to tau, biasa mpau sanganna tau to la'bi makuasa na kalena. Iamo ntongananni joo kadanna anna te'damo tau mpebalii.
58006017	Madoangngi Puang Allataala mpamanassai lako to ntarimai to apa nabasseanni kumua te'da natanglampatarruhhi to akkatta-Na. Iamo joo namassapah tonna pau basse-Na.
58006018	Ia joo dua, iamo to basse-Na sola sapah-Na te'da namembali, sanga te'da nakullei Puang Allataala mangnguraga. Susimi joo napamasumanga'ki' kita' to napasalama'mo Puang Allataala, antarannuan tarruh Puang Allataala kumua la napugaukki to apa nabasseanki'.
58006019	Ia joo rannunta' susi jangkar titanan mandalan antasamatappa'-tappa'na. Ia joo rannunta' ntarruh kaen pesapa' Ngenan Kaminang Macero jio Bola Puang Allataala jao suruga antamangngolo lako Puang Allataala.
58006020	Najoloanmiki' Puang Isa lako ntuu joo, na menjaji Imang Lompota' te'da cappa'na, susi imang Melkisedek.
58007001	Raja joo Melkisedek jio kota Salem tonna anu' na imang tooi to nnurusu' kamassompan lako Puang Allataala to kaminang mala'bih. Ia tonna polemo Nabi Ibrahim mangrari ntalo ba'tu pira-pira raja, malemi imang Melkisedek ntammuii nabarakka'ii.
58007002	Nabenni Nabi Ibrahim tawa sangpulona sininna to apa narampa. (Ia to imang Melkisedek disanga "Raja Kamarurusan", sanga ia to kada melkisedek battuananna raja kamarurusan. Disanga tooi "Raja Kasikalinoan", sanga rajai jio kota Salem, na salem battuananna kasikalinoan.)
58007003	Ia tee imang Melkisedek te'da bang apa diissen to jiona kalena, la tomatuanna ba'tu nunnungan nenena, te'da ia pamulanna, na te'da too cappa'na to katuoanna. Susii Anak Allataala, sanga tatta'i imang te'da cappa'na.
58007004	Jaji, lan ntee tanii nnissenni kumua tomatande tee imang Melkisedek. Ia to Nabi Ibrahim tomatande too, nasaba' iamo to napuambe' sininna to-Israel. Moi nasusi joo naangga' Nabi Ibrahim to imang Melkisedek anna benni tawa sangpulona sininna to apa narampa lan kapararian.
58007005	Situru' atoranna Nabi Musa, ia to imang bati'na Lewi la nnampa' tawa sangpulona assele'na to-Yahudi, moi napada-padai bati'na Nabi Ibrahim.
58007006	Apa ia to imang Melkisedek tangngia bati'na Lewi. Moi nasusi joo nnampa' toda tawa sangpulona to apa narampa Nabi Ibrahim. Puang Allataala mpau basse-Na lako Nabi Ibrahim. Moi nasusi joo ia to Nabi Ibrahim nabarakka'i imang Melkisedek.
58007007	Sininna tau nnissenni kumua matande ia to tomangbarakka'i na ia to todibarakka'i.
58007008	Ia to imang bati'na Lewi, to ntarima passompan tawa sangpulona, la mate sanga tolino biasai. Apa ia to imang Melkisedek, to ntarima toda passompan tawa sangpulona, tuo tarruhhi ia situru' Sura' Allataala.
58007009	Wa'ding dipau kumua, ia tonna mamajah Nabi Ibrahim tawa sangpulona lako imang Melkisedek, meccoe' todami mamajah Lewi sola bati'na, to la nnampa' tawa sangpulona assele'na padanna to-Israel.
58007010	Wa'ding dipau susi joo, sanga ia tonna sitammu imang Melkisedek to Nabi Ibrahim, lanmo batang kalena Nabi Ibrahim to Lewi, moi te'dapa najaji.
58007011	Ia tonna benni Puang Allataala to atoran agama lako to-Yahudi, naangka' tooi to bati'na Lewi menjaji imang nnajahhi tau nturu'i joo atoran. Jaji, den kasiumputanna imang na atoran agama to-Yahudi. Apa te'da nakullei to imang bati'na Lewi mpupenjaji tomelo tau. Iamo joo parallu den imang laen susi imang Melkisedek to te'da napole jio mai bati'na Lewi susi imang Harun.
58007012	Jaji, ia ke ia to imang bati'na Lewi mangka disullei imang laen, ia to atoran agama to-Yahudi la disulle toda ia.
58007013	Na Puangta'mo tee kusanga. Iamo to disanga imang laen, to pole jio mai pangrapuan laen. Na ia joo pangrapuan laen te'da naden bati'na menjaji imang.
58007014	Naissen ngasan tau kumua ia to Puangta' pole jio mai pangrapuanna Yehuda, na te'da naden napaui Nabi Musa kumua la den bati'na Yehuda menjaji imang.
58007015	Manassamo kumua te'da nakullei to imang bati'na Lewi mpupenjaji tomelo tau, sanga naangka'mo Puang Allataala to mesa' imang laen susi imang Melkisedek.
58007016	Te'da nadiangka' situru' atoran tolino, apa diangka'i sanga kuasa katuoan-Na to te'da cappa'na.
58007017	Sanga den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ikomo to imang te'da cappa'na, susi imang Melkisedek."
58007018	Susimi joo natangdipuinawamo to atoran jolo, to tanglakomo na te'damo bua'na,
58007019	sanga ia to atoranna Nabi Musa te'da nakullei mpupenjaji melo tau, moi mesa'. Na ia to tarannuan tee too la'bi melo na ia to dirannuan jolona, antabarani mangngolo lako Puang Allataala.
58007020	Apa pole'pi, den sapah-Na Puang Allataala anna menjaji imang to Puang Isa. Te'da namassapah tonna diangka' to imang laen.
58007021	Apa massapah Puang Allataala anna diangka' Puang Isa menjaji imang. Ia joo wattu nakuanni Puang Allataala, "Aku' Puang massapahmo, na te'da kulassullei kadang-Ku', 'Ikomo to imang te'da cappa'na.' "
58007022	Pajanmo lan joo sapah kumua Puang Isamo mpasijajianni to basse la'bi melo.
58007023	Na sitarruhna, budai joo imang bati'na Lewi, sanga pada matei anna te'da nakullei mpatarruhhi to jamanna.
58007024	Na ia to kaimangan-Na Puang Isa te'da nadiben tau laen, sanga tuoi te'da cappa'na.
58007025	Iamo joo na te'da lalo natorroii mpasalama' tau to mangngolo lako Puang Allataala mpau sangan-Na, sanga tuo tarruhhi la mpangkadananni lako Puang Allataala.
58007026	Jaji, iamo Imang Lompo taparallui to Puang Isa. Tomelo Ia, te'da sala-Na ba'tu kakurangan-Na. Todipatorro leko' jio mai tomadosa, na dipaendek de' la'bi majaona na ia to langi'.
58007027	Te'da nasusi to Imang Lompo laen, to allo-allo mangkaroba jolo' meta'da nadidampangan, namane' mpangkaroban tobuda. Na ia to Puang Isa pissenri mangkaroba lako Puang Allataala, iamo to mpangkaroban batang kale-Na.
58007028	Situru' atoranna Nabi Musa ia to tolino biasa diangka' menjaji Imang Lompo moi naden caccana ba'tu kakuranganna. Apa ia to sapah-Na Puang Allataala, to dipau undi na ia to atoranna Nabi Musa, nnangka'i joo Anak to te'da caccana ba'tu te'da kakuranganna menjaji Imang Lompo. Ia joo Anak mangkamo napupenjaji Tomangpasalama' te'da cappa'na.
58008001	Ia to garonto'na sininna tee kupau: Iamo to Imang Lompota' cumadokko jao suruga jio sa'de kanan-Na Puang Allataala to kaminang makuasa, anna mangparenta sola.
58008002	Njamai jaman Imang Lompo lan bola-Na Puang jao suruga. Ia joo bola iamo Tenda Tongan, to napake'deh Puang, tangngia panggaraga tolino.
58008003	Sininna Imang Lompo diangka' la mpugauk mpassompan sola karoba lako Puang Allataala. Susi toomi Puang Isa to Imang Lompota' parallu den apa napassompan.
58008004	Ia kenna la inde' unapa lino, te'da lalo nalanjama jaman imang, sanga denmo imang mpassompan karoba situru' atoranna Nabi Musa.
58008005	Ia to jaman najama tuu lako imang, sitonganna pangpasusianra ba'tu bajo-bajonara to apa denmo jao suruga. Susi toomi ia to tenda passompan napake'deh Nabi Musa tonna anu', bajo-bajonara to Tenda Tongan. Iamo joo nakuanni Puang Allataala to Musa, "Ingaranni! Padami to la mugaraga, la mupasusi ngasanni to apa mangka dipakitanko jao buntu."
58008006	Apa la'bi melo to jaman dipabarakkananni Puang Isa na ia to jamanna imang bati'na Lewi. Puang Isamo mpasijajianni to basse-Na Puang Allataala sola tolino. Na ia joo basse la'bi melo na ia to basse napasijajian Nabi Musa. La'bi melo joo basse baru, sanga la'bi melo to apa dipau lan.
58008007	Ia kenna la te'da caccana ba'tu kakuranganna to basse jolo, tantu te'damo naparallu dipaden to basse baru.
58008008	Apa kasalanni to umma'-Na Puang Allataala. Iamo joo nakuanni, "Ingaranni, la den wattunna angkulampaden basse baru sola pangrapuanna Israel na Yehuda.
58008009	Te'da nasusi to basse kupaden sola tojolona, tongkusolanni messun lan mai tondok Mesir. Te'da napugaukki joo basse, iamo joo te'da kutarimai.
58008010	Iamo tee basse la kupaden sola to-Israel to wattu la dioloi lako: la kupallan pikkirisanna to atoran-Ku', na kuuki'i lan penawanna. Aku' Puang Allataala to la nasompa, na ia la kupupenjaji umma'-Ku'.
58008011	Na te'damo naparallu siajaran solana, ba'tu la ngkuan sile'tona 'Issenni to Puang Allataala', sanga la tobiasa, la tokaissenan, la naissen ngasanna'.
58008012	La kudampangan ngasanni, na te'damo kulanningaranni to dosana."
58008013	Napaui Puang Allataala kumua la dipadenni to basse baru. Iamo mpamanassai kumua matuami na tangdipuinawamo to basse jolo. Na ia to apa ke memmatuami te'damo nadipake, cingga'tu'mora nalanynya'.
58009001	Ia to basse jolo-Na Puang Allataala, den atoran passompan, na den too tenda passompan panggaraga tolino.
58009002	Ia joo tenda passompan disapa'i. Ia to ngenan jio olo disanga Ngenan Macero. Den ngenan palita jio, na den too meja dipanii roti to dipassompan lako Puang Allataala.
58009003	Ia to lanna liu, to napasisarak kaen pesapa', disanga Ngenan Kaminang Macero.
58009004	Den meja disapu' bulawan jio, to dipade'i pangdupan. Na den too mesa' patti disanga Patti Kasibassean to disapu' ngasan bulawan. Lan joo patti den kurin bulawan to nanii kande disanga manna, tekkenna imang Harun to mentarukmo tonna anu', na dua papan batu to dinii nnuki' sangpulo parenta-Na Puang Allataala.
58009005	Den dua tau-taunna Kerub jao tungu'na joo patti, tanda kumua jioi to Puang Allataala. Mballahhi pani'na joo kerub na ssamboi tutu' patti to dinii ndampangan tau. Apa te'damo naladipau simesa'-mesa' tee too.
58009006	Susimi joo diatoro' joo tenda passompan. Allo-allo tuli mentama Ngenan Macero to imang la njama jamanna.
58009007	Imang Lompo manda to mentama Ngenan Kaminang Macero, na sipissen toori sangtaun napugauk. Ianna mentama, mbawai rara karoba napassompan lako Puang Allataala, meta'da anna didampangan ke den dosa te'da nadianggai'i moi to napugauk imang iarika tobuda.
58009008	Susimi joo napamanassai Roh Allataala kumua ianna den unapa joo Ngenan Macero, te'dapa nawa'ding to tolino mentama Ngenan Kaminang Macero.
58009009	Ia ngasanmo joo pangrapanganna to apa jaji tee too, battuananna kumua ia to karoba to dipassompan unapa lako Puang Allataala te'da nakullei ndampangan tomassompa anna te'damo napasalai penawanna.
58009010	Sanga ia joo atoran passompan, susi una to atoran pemali to dikandena na diiso'na sola mangrupa-rupa atoran mangpemacero, te'da kasiumputanna sunga', apa napangben Puang Allataala dikua naturu'i taun-Na sanggenna dipaden to basse baru.
58009011	Menjajimi Imang Lompo to Almaseh nabenki' kameloan susi to taperasaimo. Mentamami Tenda-Na Puang Allataala jao suruga. Mala'bih na te'da caccana joo Tenda-Na Puang Allataala, sanga tangngia panggaraga tolino, battuananna te'da napole jio mai tee lino.
58009012	Ia tonna mentama Tenda-Na Puang Allataala to Almaseh, tarruhhi tama Ngenan Kaminang Macero mangngolo lako Puang Allataala. Ia joo wattu te'da nambawa rara beke bulolo' ba'tu rara anak sapin la dipassompan, apa rara kale-Na to la napassompan. Pissen bangri joo, te'da naparallu didadu', sanga ia joo rara-Na napake lla'bak tarruhki' te'da cappa'na.
58009013	-
58009014	Ia to rara beke bulolo' ba'tu rara sapin balian ba'tu au anak sapin mangka dipassompan dipake mpi'pikkii to tocarepa situru' atoranna Nabi Musa, anna wa'ding ssompa Puang. Na ia ke ia joo rara ba'tu au wa'ding mpemaceroi tocarepa situru' atoranna Nabi Musa, la'bi pole' opa ia to rara-Na Almaseh wa'ding mpemaceroi apa to lan penawanta' antawa'ding massompa lako Puang Allataala to tuo, sanga te'damo taparallu ssompai mpake atoran passompan to te'da bua'na. Ia to rara-Na Almaseh wa'ding mpugaukki susi joo, nasaba' ia to Almaseh te'da kasalan-Na. Napatujui Roh Allataala to tuo tarruh to Almaseh napassompan kalena lako Puang Allataala susi karoba te'da caccana.
58009015	Napasijajianni Almaseh to basse baru, dikua na ia to kamatean-Na la lla'bak tau jio mai kasalanna to napugauk tonna atoran basse jolo, na ia to tomangkamo napilei Puang Allataala la nnampa' barakka' te'da cappa'na to mangka nabasseanni.
58009016	Ianna den sura' manah, la den too buttinna kumua matemi to tonggaragai,
58009017	sanga te'dapa nadipake joo sura' manah ke tuo unapi to tonggaragai. Iapi nadipake ke matemi joo tau.
58009018	Susi toomi joo denpi olok-olok mate digere' na ia to rarana mpaassahhi to basse jolo.
58009019	Ia tonna mangkamo napangpeissenan ngasan Nabi Musa to atoran-Na Puang Allataala lako to-Yahudi, naalami to rara anak sapin na rara beke bulolo', napasiraui wai, namane' mpi'pikkii joo sura' atoran-Na Puang Allataala sola to-Yahudi, mpake reu hisop dikapu' bulu bembala' malea.
58009020	Ia tonna pugaukki Nabi Musa susi joo mangkadai nakua, "Iamo tee rara mpaassahhi to basse napaden Puang Allataala to la mituru'."
58009021	Mangkai joo, napi'pikki tooi to tenda passompan na sininna parewanan to dipake massompa.
58009022	Sitonganna ianna situru' atoran agama to-Yahudi, ci'di'mora to te'da nadipemaceroi mpake rara. Susi toomi joo, iapi naden kadidampangan ke dipato'doii rara.
58009023	Ia to tenda passompan panggaraga tolino, bajo-bajona bangra joo Tenda-Na Puang Allataala jao suruga. Na ia ke ia joo tenda passompan jio lino dipemaceroi mpake karoba susi joo, la'bi pole' opa ia to Tenda-Na Puang Allataala parallu dipemaceroi mpake karoba la'bi melo.
58009024	Na ia to Almaseh te'da namentama tenda passompan panggaraga tolino to bajo-bajona Tenda-Na Puang Allataala jao suruga. Apa mentamai suruga namangngolo lako Puang Allataala. Jaoi tee too la mpangkadananki'.
58009025	Ia to Imang Lompona to-Yahudi taun-taun mentama Ngenan Kaminang Macero la mpassompan rara to tangngia rara kalena. Apa ia to Almaseh pissenri mentama la mpassompan kalena.
58009026	Sanga ia kenna la susi Imang Lompona to-Yahudi to Almaseh, la nadadu' punalai mperasai parri' kamatean mellao jio mai dipadenna tee lino. Sibalikanna pissenri mangka ratu to Almaseh tee wattu tampakkana lino mpassompan kalena la ndampangan tau.
58009027	Mangka napattantu Puang Allataala, kumua pissenra mate to tolino, namane' Puang Allataala rra'tah kara-karana.
58009028	Susi toomi Almaseh pissenri mpassompan kalena la ndampangan buda tau. Na ia ke ratu pole'mi, te'damo naratu la mpangben sunga'-Na nasaba' dosana tau, apa la mbenmira kasalamatan lako tontajan karatuan-Na pole'.
58010001	Ia joo atoran agama to-Yahudi bajo-bajona bangra joo kasalamatan la ratu, jaji tangngiapa to sitonganna. Te'da nakullei joo atoran mpupenjaji meloi to tompassompan karoba lako Puang Allataala, moi narundun taun tuli ndadu'i massompa susi joo.
58010002	Ia ke la didampangan tonganmi joo tomassompa susi joo, te'damo nalampassompan unapa karoba, nasaba' te'damo nasangai kumua tomadosa.
58010003	Apa ia joo karoba rundun taun dipassompan, kanni ia ora mpangngingaranni tuu lako tau to dosana,
58010004	sanga te'da nakullei to rara sapin balian ba'tu rara beke bulolo' ndampanganni.
58010005	Iamo joo ia tonna mentolinomo Almaseh, nakua mangkada lako Puang Allataala, "Te'da mukadoangngi karoba sola passompan, apa mangkamo' mupadenan batang kale.
58010006	Te'da mupumasannangngi to karoba ditunu pu'puh, ba'tu karoba dipassompan la ndampangan tau.
58010007	Iamo joo kumangkada kumua, 'Oo Puang Allataala, inde'mo'! Ratuna' la mpugauk pakkaeloran-Mu, susi to diuki' mpauna' lan Sura' Allataala.' "
58010008	Pamulanna nena' nakua Almaseh mangkada lako Puang Allataala, "Te'da mukadoangngi karoba sola passompan, te'da mupumasannangngi to karoba ditunu pu'puh ba'tu karoba dipassompan la ndampangan tau." Susimi joo napau Almaseh, moi na ia joo karoba dipassompan ngasanmo situru' atoran agama to-Yahudi.
58010009	Mangkai joo nakuamo Almaseh lako Puang Allataala, "Oo, inde'mo'! Ratuna' la mpugauk pakkaeloran-Mu." Jaji, ia to atoran karoba jolo nasulleimi Puang Allataala mpangkaroban Almaseh.
58010010	Mangkami Puang Isa Almaseh mpugauk pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala. Pissenra mpassompan kalena na te'damo nadadu'i. Susimi joo napupenjajimiki' taun-Na Puang Allataala.
58010011	Allo-allo tuli ke'dehhi to imang to-Yahudi njama jamanna, na sangrupara to karoba tuli napassompan. Apa ia tuu lako karoba te'da lalo nakullei ndampangan tolino.
58010012	Apa ia to Almaseh pissenri mpassompan kalena la ndampangan tolino, na ia joo pangkaroban te'da naparallu didadu'. Mangkai joo cumadokkomi jio sa'de kanan-Na Puang Allataala namangparenta sola.
58010013	Mangtajanmira tee too sanapangbenna Puang Allataala to sininna ewalin-Na nakuasaii.
58010014	Jaji, mesa'ra karoba nanii Almaseh ndampangan tau to dipupenjaji tomelo te'da cappa'na.
58010015	Pissenra napassompan Almaseh to kalena ndampangan tau. Na ia joo napamanassa tooi Roh Allataala tonna pauanki' kumua den nakua Puang,
58010016	"Iamo tee basse la kupaden sola tuu lako tau, to wattu la dioloi lako. La kupallan penawanna to atoran-Ku', na kuuki'i lan pikkirisanna." Susimi joo kadan-Na Puang.
58010017	Nakua unapa, "Te'damo kulanningaranni to dosana ba'tu panggaukan gaja'na."
58010018	Jaji, ianna didampanganmo, te'damo naparallu dipassompan pole' to karoba mangdampangan.
58010019	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Baranimiki' mentama Ngenan Kaminang Macero, sanga kamatean-Na Puang Isa.
58010020	Susimi joo carana Puang Isa ntimbakanki' lalan baru, iamo to lalan mangnguju lako katuoan melo te'da cappa'na. Ia joo lalan nnola kaen pesapa', iamo to batang kale-Na Puang Isa.
58010021	Iamo Imang Lompota' to dipabarakkanni jaman lan Bola Puang Allataala jao suruga.
58010022	Iamo joo la matappa' tonganki' na la lantuk tongan penawanta' mangngolo lako Puang Allataala, nasaba' mangkamiki' dipaccingngi mpake wai malinnong anna la'pahmiki' jio mai kasalanta'.
58010023	La mawatangki' mangrannuan lako to apa mangka diajaranki'. La dikatappa'i to Puang Allataala, sanga tuli napugauk to basse-Na.
58010024	Na melo ke situlungki', antawa'ding sipumasumanga', sipakamoja' antapugauk tooi to apa melo.
58010025	Melo ke tuli sirempunki' ssompa Puang na danggi' taden makuttu sirempun susi to napugauk ba'tu pira-pira tau. Sipupangngingaran tarruhki', sanga taissen kumua cingga'tu'mora naratu Puang.
58010026	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Danggi' micia'mo matappa', nasaba' ia ke taanggai' bang unapi mpugauk tarruh dosa, moi taissenmo to pangngajaran tongan jio mai Puang Allataala, te'damo naden karoba la ndampanganki'.
58010027	Ewalin-Nai Puang Allataala to tosusi joo, na la malaja' ntajanni to wattu la nanii Puang Allataala rra'tah kara-karana tolino. La malaja' tuu lako tau, sanga ia to pangsessa-Na Puang Allataala padai to api manglaka-laka ngkandei.
58010028	Ia tonna jolona ke denni tau cia' nturu' atoranna Nabi Musa, la dibuno na te'da nadidampangan, ke nasa'bimi dua ba'tu tallu tau kumua madosa tonganni.
58010029	Tantu la'bi disessai to tocia'mo matappa' lako Almaseh. Ia tuu lako tau susi to llese-lese Anak Allataala. Te'da toomo naangga'i to rara basse-Na Puang Allataala, iamo to kamatean-Na Almaseh, to mangka mpupenjaji tau, tau mesan-Na Puang Allataala. Te'da too naangga'i to Roh Allataala to nabenki' Puang Allataala, sanga kameloan penawan-Na.
58010030	Taissen kumua mangka nakua Puang kumua, "Aku' mpuissenni to mangpabalahhi, Aku'ra to wa'ding mpattantu pangpabalah." na diuki' toopa kumua, "La nara'tah Puang to kara-karana umma'-Na."
58010031	Liwa' meka'baran bulu ke nasessaki' Puang Allataala to tuo, to rra'tah kara-karata'!
58010032	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ingaranni umbo mikua tommimane' matappa'. Ia joo wattu pembudamo kamu' mperasai pa'dik, apa moi nasusi joo da'tan kamu' mawatang matappa'.
58010033	Den midicapa'-capa' sola dipakario-rio jio olona tobuda, na den too kamu' masse penawammi ngkitai to dipa'dikki susi joo.
58010034	Na turu' kamu' mpumasussai to toditarungku. Ia tonna rampai kamu' tau to apammi, micanninganni ati, sanga miissen kumua den unapa to apa miampui, iamo to nabassean kamu' Puang Allataala. La'bi melo ia joo, sanga te'da nalata'de.
58010035	Danggi' mika'tu rannu, sanga ia ammitatta' matappa', la buda to poleanna.
58010036	Parallu kamu' sabbara', ammikullei mpugaukki to pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala. Ia ke susii joo la mitarimai to apa nabassean kamu'.
58010037	Nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Cingga'tu'mora, naratu joo to la ratu, te'da namangdau-daupa.
58010038	Ia to tau kupupenjaji tomelo sanga matappa'i la nnampa' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na. Apa ianna den to cia' omo matappa', te'da kupumasannangngi."
58010039	Ia tee kita' tangngiamiki' to tolamembalik pole' antamasolang, sibalikanna tomatappa'miki' lako Puang Allataala antadipasalama'.
58011001	Ia to tau matappa' lako Puang Allataala, naissen tongan kumua la naben Puang Allataala to apa narannuan. Moi te'dapa nakitai matanna, nakanassai kumua la jajii.
58011002	Napangpeissenanni Puang Allataala kumua den to tojolo nakabudai, sanga matappa'i.
58011003	Tapahangngi, sanga matappa'ki', kumua ia tee lino napaden Puang Allataala mpake kadan-Na. Jaji, apa to nakita mata dipaden jio mai apa tangdikita.
58011004	Napassompanni Habel lako Puang Allataala to karoba la'bi melo na ia to karobanna Kain, sanga matappa'i. Susi too ia joo Habel napangpeissenan Puang Allataala kumua tomelo, sanga matappa'i. Manassa joo sanga natarimai Puang Allataala to karobanna. Masaimi matena Habel, apa susi kumua mangkada unapi tee too, sanga matappa'i.
58011005	Te'da namate to Henokh, apa diangka'i de' suruga lako Puang Allataala, sanga matappa'i. Jaji, moi mesa' tau te'damo nnampa'i, sanga mangkami naangka' Puang Allataala. Diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, ia tonna te'dapa nadiangka' to Henokh napumasannang Puang Allataala.
58011006	Moi mesa' tau te'da napumasannang Puang Allataala ke tangmatappa'i. Ia ke den tau madoang mangngolo lako Puang Allataala, la nakatappa'i kumua den to Puang Allataala, na la nakatappa'i too kumua melo penawan-Na to Puang Allataala lako to tonnangahhi.
58011007	Napugaukki Nabi Nuh to apa nasuanni Puang Allataala, sanga matappa'i. Napauanni Puang Allataala apa to la jaji to te'dapa nakitai. Mengkaturu'i Nabi Nuh lako Puang Allataala anna kabua' mesa' kappala' dikua napasalama'i sintong repokkona. Susimi joo tonna disessamo to tolino, apa ia to Nabi Nuh napupenjaji tomelo Puang Allataala, sanga matappa'i.
58011008	Naturu'i Nabi Ibrahim to apa nasuanni Puang Allataala, sanga matappa'i. Nasuai Puang Allataala male lako tondok mambela to la nabenni napumanah. Malemi Nabi Ibrahim, moi na te'da naissenni umbo nanii mangnguju.
58011009	Natorro Nabi Ibrahim susi toratu lan tenda jio tondok to nabasseanni Puang Allataala, sanga matappa'i. Susi too Ishak na Yakub to mpumanahhi joo basse jio mai Puang Allataala.
58011010	Natorro Nabi Ibrahim jio susi toratu lan tenda, sanga ntajanni anna torro lan kota tangmasolang to mangka napake'deh Puang Allataala situru' akkatta-Na.
58011011	Nawa'ding unapa Nabi Ibrahim sola Sara njajian bati' moi naliwa' tuamo na tamanang too to Sara, sanga matappa'i. Nakatappa'i Nabi Ibrahim kumua la napugauk Puang Allataala to basse-Na.
58011012	Moi na susimo tomate to Nabi Ibrahim joo wattu, apa nnampa' unapa buda bati' tangdikembah dibilang budanna, susi budanna bintuin jao langi' na kassi' jio randan tasik.
58011013	Matappa' ngasan tuu lako tau ratu lako matena. Ia tonna tuo unapa, te'dapa naampa'i to apa nabasseanni Puang Allataala, apa masannangngi sanga butung nakitami to apa dibasseanni. Namangngaku kumua toratu bangri ba'tu toleppang bangri lan tee lino.
58011014	Ia to tomangkada susi joo mpamanassai kumua nnangngahhi tondok to la nanii mari'pih.
58011015	Tangngiamora joo tondok pura nasalai to tuli nakamali', sanga ianna susi joo buda wattunna wa'ding pole lako.
58011016	Apa ngkamali'ri mesa' tondok to la'bi melo, iamo joo tondok jao suruga. Na te'da namasiri' Puang Allataala ke nasangai Puangna, sanga denmo mesa' kota mangka napasadianni.
58011017	-
58011018	Napassompanni Nabi Ibrahim to Ishak lako Puang Allataala susi karoba sanga matappa'i, tonna ujii Puang Allataala kumua matappa' tonganrika ia. Mangkamo Nabi Ibrahim nabassean Puang Allataala, "Bati'na manda Ishak to disanga bati'mu situru' basse-Ku'." Moi nasusi joo, apa canning atinna Nabi Ibrahim napassompanni joo anak tungga'na.
58011019	Nakatappa'i Nabi Ibrahim kumua makuasa to Puang Allataala mpatuo pole'i to Ishak jio mai kamatean. Jaji, wa'ding dikua, mangkami natarima pole' Nabi Ibrahim to Ishak jio mai kamatean.
58011020	Nameta'da Ishak lako Puang Allataala dikua nabarakka'i to Yakub sola Esau, sanga matappa'i. Matappa'i kumua la napugauk Puang Allataala to apa napeta'da lan wattu la dioloi lako.
58011021	Ia tonna la matemo Yakub ssundemme'imi ulu tekkenna namassambajang lako Puang Allataala nabarakka'i duai to anakkana Yusuf, sanga matappa'i.
58011022	Ia tonna la matemo Yusuf, napau jolomo to la kamessunanna to-Israel jio mai tondok Mesir, anna pasanni to apa la digaukanni joo bukunna, sanga matappa'i.
58011023	Ia tonna jajimo Nabi Musa nakitai tomatuanna gaja lolo, nabuniananmi tallung bulan masainna, sanga matappa'i. Jaji, te'da namalaja' nnewa parentana Firaun, Raja Mesir.
58011024	Ia tonna matonggomo Nabi Musa, cia'i ke disangai anak jio mai anakkana baine Firaun, sanga matappa'i.
58011025	La'bi nakabudai maparri' sola umma'-Na Puang Allataala na ia to mperasai kamasannangan cingga'tu'ra to napaden dosa.
58011026	Nasangai Nabi Musa kumua la'bi keangga' ke dikita majiongngi sanga matappa'i lako Raja Mangpasalama' to nabasse Puang Allataala la ratu na ia ke namesaii to sininna ewanan jio tondok Mesir, sanga rrannuanni pahalana jio ahera'.
58011027	Nasalaii Nabi Musa to tondok Mesir tangmalaja' nakabirih Raja Mesir, sanga matappa'i. Sabbara'i maparri', sanga susi to nakitamo to Puang Allataala to tangkakitanan.
58011028	Napugaukki Nabi Musa to Paskah, sanga matappa'i. Napangpesuanni nadisapui rara to ba'ba bolana to-Israel, dikua danggi' nabunoi Kalamau' to anak pamungahna.
58011029	Lambanmi to to-Israel jio Tasik Malea, susi to kumua gantanan nanii lumingka, sanga matappa'i. Apa ia to to-Mesir tallanni lan tasik, tonna lamban toda.
58011030	Naguririkkii to-Israel to kota Yerikho pitung allo masainna nasiro'pokan to bettengna, sanga matappa'i.
58011031	Na ia joo mesa' baine bandarang disanga Rahab, te'da nadibuno susi to padanna to-Yerikho to nnewa Puang Allataala, sanga matappa'i. Nasaba' ia tonna ratu ba'tu pira-pira to to-Israel mmata-matai kota Yerikho, masannangngi ntarimai jio bolana.
58011032	Kusangai te'damo naparallu kupatarruh. Te'da wattungku' la mpaui to Gideon, Barak, Simson, Yefta, Raja Daud, Nabi Samuel na sininna nabi.
58011033	Ia to tau susi joo budamo raja natalo, sanga matappa'i. Napugaukki to pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, anna tulungngi Puang Allataala susi to napauanni. Napasitutu'i to kasongo singa,
58011034	nabosianni to api manglaka-laka, te'da nasi'da digajang pa'dang. Malamma, apa memmawatang, nabarani mangrari, anna buda surudadu bangsa laen natalo.
58011035	Den ba'tu pira-pira indo nnampa' pole' rapunna to matemo nadipatuo pole', sanga matappa'i. Den too tonneloran bang kalena disessa ratu lako matena. Cia'i dila'paran ke membalik pole'i kamatapparanna, sanga madoangngi dipatuo pole' nannampa' katuoan la'bi melo.
58011036	Den to dicapa'-capa' na dipekaju. Den too to dirante bassi na dipatama pangtarungkuan.
58011037	Den to dirura batu samatena, den digaragaji, na den too dibuno pa'dang. Liu lako liu jio bang mai mangpakean balulang bembala' ba'tu beke, kaasi-asii, dipakario-rioi nadisessa.
58011038	Liu lako liu jio bang mai jio padang pallawangan na jao buntu, anna torro lan lo'ko' na posi' tana. Apa sitonganna liwa' melona joo tau na tangsipato'na tee lino nanii torro.
58011039	Mangka napangpeissenan Puang Allataala kumua sininna to tau susi joo napumasannang, sanga matappa'i. Apa moi nasusi joo, te'dapa natarimai to apa nabasseanni Puang Allataala,
58011040	sanga naakkattai Puang Allataala kumua kita'ra to ntarimai. Iamo joo solapiki' to tau susi joo, namane' nnampa'i to barakka' te'da kakuranganna.
58012001	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Wa'ding dikua kumua, sininna joo tomatappa' tonna anu' susi saleu' mbombonniki'. Na ia joo kasa'bianna mpamawatang penawanta'. Iamo joo melo ke tapatorro ngasanni to apa mabanda', la'bi-la'bi dosa to tuli ssedeki'. Ia ke tapatorro ngasanmi, wa'dingmiki' mpugaukki to pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala ratu lako cappa'na.
58012002	La tapugaukmi tapatuju lakoi Puang Isa to penawanta', to mpadenni to kamatapparanta', napupenjajiki' masaranian. Gaja mesirisan joo kamatean jao kaju sitamben. Apa moi nasusi joo te'da nasipattekanni, sanga ia manda naingaran to kamasannangan la naperasai undinna. Na ia tee too cumadokkomi jio kananna cadokkoan mala'bih-Na Puang Allataala namangparenta sola.
58012003	Pikkiri'i maka matumba pa'dikki-Na Puang Isa nnoloi tomadosa to gaja parrang nnewai anna danggi' mika'tu rannu ba'tu cia'mo matappa'.
58012004	Te'dapa kamu' mate nnewa dosa.
58012005	Na danggi' mitangnningaranni to kadan-Na Puang Allataala to mpangkadai kamu' susi ambe' lako anakkana, "Ee, anak-Ku'! Tarima meloi ke napabalahhiko Puang situru' dosamu, na danggi' muka'tu rannu ke napangngingaranko.
58012006	Sanga napabalahhi Puang to tonapakamoja', napekajui to tonareken anakka-Na."
58012007	Sabbara' kamu' ke napabalahhi kamu' Puang Allataala, sanga napasusi kamu' anakka-Na. Na te'da naden anak tangnapabalahhi ambe'na.
58012008	Ianna te'da midipabalahhi susi to anak laen-Na, battuananna tangngia kamu' anak tongan, apa anak dialara.
58012009	Takasiri' to ambe'ta' lan lino to mpabalahhiki'. Ia pole' oraka ke Ambe'ta' jao suruga antatanglanturu'i, tawa'ding ntarima katuoan melo te'da cappa'na.
58012010	Ia to ambe'ta' lan lino cingga'tu'ra nanii mpabalahhiki', situru' to apa nasanga melo. Apa la tapumelona kita' to pangpabalah-Na Puang Allataala, dikua antawa'ding messipa' melo takaba'ci too kagajatan susi to nakaba'ci Puang Allataala.
58012011	Ia ke dipabalahhiki', te'da tapumasannangngi joo pangcalla na mepa'dikan penawa. Apa undinna joo, ia to kita' mangkamo dipabalahhi, nturu'miki' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, na mperasaimiki' kamasannangan.
58012012	Iamo joo danggi' mimakuttu. Pemawatangngii to kamatapparanmi.
58012013	Maruruh kamu' nturu' Puang, anna te'da naden tau cia'mo matappa', apa mawatangngi matappa'.
58012014	Mipengkulle-kullei sikalino ngasan tau. Mipengkulle-kullei tooi mpupengkaunan kalemi lako Puang Allataala, sanga ia ke te'da nasusi joo to sipa'mi, te'da mikullei ngkita Puang.
58012015	Ingaranni danggi' naden moi mesa' tau cia'mo ntarimai to barakka'-Na Puang Allataala. Ingaranni danggi' naden tau susi to waka' mapai' mpaden kamaba'cian lako padanna rupa tau anna situmang-tumang.
58012016	Ingaranni danggi' naden tau manggauk sala ba'tu te'da naangga'i to barakka'-Na Puang Allataala susi to napugauk Esau. Ia joo barakka' lako mesa' anak pamungah nabaluk lako adinna sangpiring nande.
58012017	Miissen kumua, undinna tonna madoangmo Esau ntarimai joo barakka' jio mai ambe'na, te'da nadiben. Moi na gaja ssassanni joo panggaukanna, apa te'damo lalan dinii benni joo barakka', moi namangwai mata mpeta'dai.
58012018	Te'da miratu lako garonto' buntu to mikulle ngkaka'i susi bangsa Israel tonna anu'. Ia joo to-Israel ratu lako garonto' Buntu Sinai to nanii api dukku manglaka-laka. Jio tooi to kamalillinan, kamalotonganna langi' na angin bara'.
58012019	Nasa'ding to oni tarompe', na oni gamara lumbun. Ia tonna sa'dingngi to-Israel joo gamara, napeta'da lalo danggi'mo nadipasa'dingngi pole' o.
58012020	Sanga te'da naattai ssa'dingngi to parenta napau joo gamara kumua, "Sininna to apa ngkaka'i tee buntu, la olok-olok ba'tu apa bangmo, la dirura batu samatena."
58012021	Liwa' meka'baran bulu joo apa nakita to-Israel, iamo joo nakua Nabi Musa, "Malaja'na' na kumbe'beh!"
58012022	Ee, tomala'bihku', te'da miratu lako buntu susi joo. Sibalikanna ratumo kamu' lako Buntu Sion na kota-Na Puang Allataala to tuo, iamo to kota Yerusalem jao suruga to nanii massa'bu-sa'bu malaeka'-Na.
58012023	Nturu'mo kamu' mesa' pangrempunan maroah, pangrempunanna sininna anak pamungah-Na Puang Allataala, to diuki'mo sanganna lan suruga. Ratumo kamu' mangngolo lako Puang Allataala, Tomangra'tahna sininna tolino. Nnoloimo kamu' tomatappa' to matemo, to mangkamo dipupenjaji tomelo.
58012024	Ratumo kamu' mangngolo lako Puang Isa, tompasijajianni joo basse baru. Nnoloimo kamu' rara-Na Puang Isa to mangka dipi'pikan kamu' ammididampangan. La'bi melo ia joo rara na ia to rarana Habel to mpeta'dai anna dipabalahhi to kakanna.
58012025	Danggi' mitangmpesa'dingngii joo tomangkada jao mai suruga, sanga ia to to-Israel tonna anu' to cia' mpesa'dingngii to kada pole jao mai Buntu Sinai, te'da nakullei la'pah jio mai pangsessa-Na Puang Allataala. Apa pole'raka tee kita' to ssa'dingngi joo tomangkada jao mai suruga ke cia'ki' mpesa'dingngii.
58012026	Ia joo wattu mangpaninoi to gamaran-Na. Apa ia tee too napau kumua, "Pissenpa la kupanino, tangngia lino manda apa moi langi'."
58012027	Ia joo kada "pissenpa" mpamanassai kumua ia ngasan to apa mangka dipaden la diroge nadita'dei, anna ia mandamo torro to tangtirogena.
58012028	Iamo joo la mangkurru sumanga'ki' lako Puang Allataala, sanga tatarimamo jio mai kale-Na to mesa' kaparentan tangtiroge. Takalaja' takasiri'i antamassompa lako Puang Allataala situru' pakkaeloran-Na,
58012029	sanga ia to Puang Allataala tasompa susi api mantunu pu'puh.
58013001	Ia to kita' tomatappa' la tatta'ki' sipakamoja'.
58013002	Mabassa kamu' mpaleppangngi lan bolami to tote'dapa miissenni, sanga te'da miissenni tauraka ba'tu malaeka'raka joo tau. Denmo tau ntoratu malaeka', to nasangari tau biasa bang, apa malaeka' ia.
58013003	Ingaranni to tau lan pangtarungkuan ammipumasussai. Na ia to tau tangngia bang gauk to digaukanni, la miingaran too butung to kamu' dipasusi joo.
58013004	La mikasiri' sola ngasan to kasibalian, na ia to tosibali danggi' naangah tolaen nasolan mamma', sanga ia to tomanggauk sala la nasessai Puang Allataala.
58013005	Danggi' napukaunan kamu' doi', apa pumasannang bangmi to apa miampui, sanga mangkamo napau Puang Allataala kumua, "La kupuinawa tarruhko, te'da kulassalaiko."
58013006	Iamo joo tabarani mangkada kumua, "Puangmo to Pangtulungku', te'damo kumalaja'. Te'da apa wa'ding napugauk tolino lako kaleku'."
58013007	Ingaranni to pekaamberan jamaa to mangkamo mpangpeissenan kadan-Na Puang Allataala lako kamu'. Ingaran tooi matumba to sipa'na ratu lako matena, ammialai palelean mata to kamatapparanna.
58013008	Te'da namembali to Puang Isa Almaseh, la jolona, la ia tee too na te'da cappa'na.
58013009	Danggi' mieloranni to mangrupa-rupa pangngajaran to sisala Kareba Kasalamatan mpatuju sala kamu'. Iara to kameloan penawan-Na Puang Allataala to la mpamawatang penawanta', tangngiara kande. Ia joo atoran kande te'da lalomo bua'na lako tonturu'i.
58013010	Ia to imang mangjama lan tenda passompan panggaraga tolino, te'da nasipato' la ngkandei to apa dipassompan jao ngenan pangkarobanta' lan Tenda-Na Puang.
58013011	Susimi tee battuananna. Ia to rara karoba, to dipassompan menjaji karoba mangdampangan, nabawa Imang Lompo tama Ngenan Kaminang Macero. Apa ia to juku'na ditunu pu'puh jio saleanan kampong.
58013012	Susi todami joo namate saleanan babangan kota to Puang Isa na ia to rara-Na mbasei dosana tolino.
58013013	Iamo joo tamalemo lako Puang Isa jio saleanan kampong antadicapa'-capa' sola.
58013014	Sanga te'da kampong la tanii mari'pih lan tee lino, apa ntajanriki' kampong to la tanii mari'pih keanu'.
58013015	Iamo joo antatuli mpassompan karoba pangpujian lako Puang Allataala, iamo to kadanta' mpujii, sanga Puang Isa.
58013016	Danggi' mitangnningaranni mpugauk kameloan nasitulung, sanga iamo karoba napumasannang Puang Allataala.
58013017	Mengkaturu' kamu' lako pekaamberan jamaami, ammituru'i to parentana. Tuli napuinawa kamu', sanga la napebalian lako Puang Allataala to apa mangka napugauk lako kamu'. Ia ammimengkaturu' lako, masannangngi mangjama, ianna te'da, masussai mangjama, na te'da bua'na lako kamu'.
58013018	Pellao doangankan. Kikatappa'i kumua melo to lan penawangki', sanga tuli madoangkan mpugauk kameloan.
58013019	Kupeta'da tongan ammipellao doanganna' anna madoi' Puang Allataala nneloranna' male mati'.
58013020	Napatuo pole'mi Puang Allataala to Puangta' Puang Isa jio mai kamatean. Na ia tee too menjajimi Tomangrewa Tomala'bihta' rrewaiki' kita' to bembala'-Na, sanga kamatean-Na. Ia toomo joo kamatean-Na mpaassah basse te'da cappa'na to napaden Puang Allataala lako kita'. Iamo joo kumeta'da lako Puang Allataala to mpangben kamasannangan,
58013021	dennaa upa' na Puang Allataalamora mpasadian kamu' sininna to melona, la mpugauk pakkaeloran-Na. Dennaa upa' anna Puang Allataala toomora mpupenjajiki' to napumasannang, sanga Puang Isa Almaseh. La mpakala'bih tarruhki' Almaseh te'da cappa'na. Amin.
58013022	Kupeta'dai misabbara' ntarimai tee pangpakainga'ku', sanga te'da namalando tee sura'ku'.
58013023	La miissen kumua dila'paranmi to Timotius padanta' tomatappa' lan mai pangtarungkuan. Ianna madoi' ratu inde', la kusolan ke malena' mati' ssikitan kamu'.
58013024	Massallangkan lako sininna pekaamberan jamaami na lako sininna umma'-Na Puang Allataala iti'. Tarima tooi to sallangna padanta' tomatappa' jio Italia.
58013025	Dennaa upa' nabarakka'i kamu' Puang sola ngasan. Padamo jolo' too.
59001001	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan, umma'-Na Puang Allataala to titaleh lan lili'na lino. Ia tee sura' pole jio mai aku' Yakub tonasua Puang Allataala sola Puang Isa Almaseh.
59001002	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ianna kanna kamu' mangrupa-rupa pecoba, la misangai kumua tomasannang kamu'.
59001003	Sanga miissen kumua la sabbara' kamu', ke da'tan kamu' matappa' lako Puang moi nakanna kamu' pecoba.
59001004	La sasabbara'-bara'na kamu', anna te'damo caccami ba'tu kakuranganmi.
59001005	Ia ke den kamu' tangpadete' tangngahmi, la meta'da kamu' lako Puang Allataala nabenni kamu', sanga malaboh na masannang penawan-Na mangpabengan lako sininna tau.
59001006	Apa ia ke den kamu' meta'da, la matappa' tongan kamu', danggi' mibata, sanga ia ammibata, susii to bombang jiong tasik male melako nairi' angin.
59001007	-
59001008	Tositawa penawanna to tau susi joo, na te'da namanassa ke denni apa napugauk. Iamo joo danggi' omo natajannii kumua la naben assele' Puang.
59001009	La masannang to tomatappa' makaasi-asi, sanga napamajaomi Puang Allataala.
59001010	Susi too to tomatappa' sugih la masannang tooi sanga napupemmajiongmi Puang Allataala. Nasaba' ia to tosugih cingga'tu'ra nalanynya' susi reu.
59001011	Ianna maka'jamo to allo, malajumi to reu nasilolloran to ca'binna, ta'de toomi to ballona. Susi toomi lako tosugih, ia joo wattu mangngangah bang unai nata'pa mate.
59001012	Masannang to tatta' matappa', nasaba' te'da namadoang dipatuju sala mpugauk dosa. Sanga la ntarima pahalana, iamo to katuoan melo mangka napasadia Puang Allataala lako to tompakamoja'i.
59001013	Ianna den tau dipatuju sala mpugauk dosa, danggi' nakua pole jio mai Puang Allataala joo pangpatuju. Nasaba' te'da nakullei Puang Allataala dipatuju sala la mpugauk kagajatan, te'da too nampatuju sala tau la mpugauk kagajatan.
59001014	Apa ia to tau, kamadoangan gaja'nara to mpatuju salai nampugauk dosa.
59001015	Ianna paula'i bangngi joo kamadoangan gaja'na, iamo joo mpaden dosa arannai mpusaba' kamatean.
59001016	Ee, tomalabihku' to kupakamoja'! Danggi' miuraga kalemi.
59001017	Sininna to apa melo na te'da caccana pole jao mai suruga, nabenki' Puang Allataala, to mpaden allo, bulan sola bintuin jao langi'. Te'da natibalik to sipa'-Na Puang Allataala na tatta' too to akkatta-Na.
59001018	Mangkamiki' napuanak situru' pakkaeloran-Na mpake pangngajaran tongan. Iamo napugaukki susi joo, sanga napamala'bihki' na ia to sininna olok-olok napaden.
59001019	Ee, tomala'bihku' to kupakamoja'! Ingaranni tee! La mangpesa'ding melo to tau, apa danggi' namenjolo-jolo bang mangkada na danggi' too nasalle birih.
59001020	Sanga ia to tau ke mabirihhi te'da nakullei mpugauk kameloan to napumasannang Puang Allataala.
59001021	Iamo joo danggi'mo mipugaukki to kabiasan tangmelomi ba'tu panggaukan gaja'mi, mitarima rampa'i to kada natanan Puang Allataala lan penawammi, sanga ia joo kada makuasa mpasalama' kamu'.
59001022	La mipugauk to apa mangka napau Puang Allataala, nasaba' ia ammisa'ding mandari to kadan-Na apa cia' kamu' mpugaukki, iamo disanga nnuraga kamu' kalemi.
59001023	Ia to tossa'ding kadan-Na Puang Allataala apa cia'i mpugaukki, susi bang tomangcammin ngkita rupanna.
59001024	Silalona bang mangka mangcammin, nata'pa te'da lalomo naingaranni to rupanna to nakita lan cammin.
59001025	Te'da caccana to atoran-Na Puang Allataala na makuasa lla'paranki' jio mai kuasa dosa. Parallu diissen tongan, nadipallan penawa, nadipugauk tongan, te'da nadisa'ding manda arannai tangdiingaran. Jaji paralluki' mpugaukki to atoran-Na, nasaba' sininna tau to mpugaukki susi joo nabarakka'i Puang Allataala.
59001026	Ianna den tau ssanga kalena pangngagama, apa te'da najagai timunna, nnuragai kalena, na te'da bua'na mangngagama.
59001027	Ia to mangngagama tongan situru' pakkaeloran-Na Ambe' Puang Allataala, iamo to ntulung pea biung pu'puhmo, sola baine te'damo muanena nakaasi-asi, na njagai kalena danggi' naturu' panggaukan tangmelona tolino to tangnturu' Puang Allataala.
59002001	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan, tomatappa' lako Puang Isa Almaseh, Puang mala'bih! Danggi' mipasilaenan tau.
59002002	Susinna ia ke den dua tau ratu lako kasirempunanmi, mesa' tosugih mangpakean ballo na mangcincin bulawan, na den too mesa' tokaasi-asi ratu mangcare-care bang.
59002003	La'bi mitaratte'i joo to mangpakean melo ammikuanni, "Cumadokkoki'! Iamo tee kadera ballo tanii cumadokko." Apa ia to tokaasi-asi mikuan, "Ke'deh bangmoko ntuu joo." ba'tu "Cumadokko jiong bangmoko sali."
59002004	Ia ammimangpasusi joo, mpasilaenanmo kamu' padammi rupa tau na ia to panggaukanmi susi panggaukanna tomangra'tah kara-kara majekkong.
59002005	Ee, tomala'bihku' to kupakamoja'! Ingaranni tee, ia to tokaasi-asi lan tee lino, napilei Puang Allataala la menjaji tosugih lan kamatapparan. Napilei too la menjaji umma'-Na lan kaparentan-Na. Susimi joo mangka nabasse lako ia to tompakamoja'i.
59002006	Kannori micapa' to tokaasi-asi. Na sitonganna tosugihra to mpakario-rio kamu' nasolan kamu' lako bola pangra'tasan kara-kara.
59002007	Ia toomo ncapa' Almaseh ba'tu Kristus. Na ia joo sanga, mala'bih dipake ssanga kamu' Kristen ba'tu Tosarani.
59002008	Tongan to mipugauk, ke mipugaukki to atoran kaminang parallu to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Pakamoja'i to padammu rupa tau susi iko mpakamoja' kalemu."
59002009	Apa ia ke mpasilaenan kamu' tau, mpugauk kamu' dosa, battuananna ntengkai kamu' atoran-Na Puang Allataala.
59002010	Moi mesa'ra atoran ditengkai, pada unai to ditengkai ngasanni.
59002011	Den parenta-Na Puang Allataala kumua, "Danggi' manggauk sala." Den too kumua, "Danggi' pabuno." Jaji ia ke te'da mumanggauk sala, apa pabunoko, tontengkai tooko atoran.
59002012	Ia ke mangkada kamu' ba'tu mangpanggaukan kamu', la miingaran kumua ia joo kara-karami la dibicara situru' atoran-Na Puang Allataala to lla'paran tau jio mai kuasa dosa.
59002013	Ianna te'da takamasei padanta' rupa tau, te'da toda nakamaseiki' Puang Allataala ke dibicaraki'. Apa ia antakamasei padanta' rupa tau, te'da nalasessaki' Puang Allataala ke Kiama'mi lino.
59002014	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan! Apara bua'na to tau ssanga kalena tomatappa', ke te'dai napasiolananni panggaukanna? Te'da bua'na, nasaba' kamatapparan susi joo te'da nakulle la mpasalama'i.
59002015	Susinna ianna den mesa' padanta' tomatappa' tangmangtamang kale na tangsirundunan too to la nakande keallo-keallo.
59002016	Te'da bua'na ke den kamu' to ngkuanni, "Paela'-ela' bangmoko, dennaa upa' na melo pakeanmu mukumande sabarahna." Ia ke te'da mibenni to naparalluinna, te'da bua'na joo!
59002017	Susi toomi joo te'da bua'na to kamatapparan, ke te'da nadipasiolanan panggaukan.
59002018	Apa mbai den to mangkada kumua, "Den tau matappa' manda, den too tau mpugauk manda panggaukan melo." La kukua mpebalii, "Pakitanna' umbo nakua to tau matappa' ke te'dai napasiolanan panggaukanna, angkupakitanni panggaukan to mpamanassai kumua den kamatapparanku'."
59002019	Mukatappa'i kumua mesa'ra to Puang Allataala. Tongan tuu! Na moi sininna setang napangngakui too joo. Iamo mbe'beran malaja'.
59002020	Te'da tonganpa mupahangngi. Paralluko dipapahangngi kumua te'da bua'na to kamatapparan ke tangsiolananni panggaukan.
59002021	Kita bangmi Nabi Ibrahim tojolota'. Natarima melo Puang Allataala sanga panggaukanna tonna la mpangkarobanni to anakkana disanga Ishak lako Puang Allataala jao ngenan pangkaroban.
59002022	Jaji manassa kumua iapi natongan to kamatapparan ke dipasiolananni panggaukan.
59002023	Susimi joo najaji to aya' diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to Nabi Ibrahim dipupenjaji tomeloi, sanga matappa'i lako Puang Allataala." Iamo joo nadisanga, "Soba'na Puang Allataala."
59002024	Jaji manassamo lako kamu' kumua natarima Puang Allataala to tau sanga panggaukanna, tangngia sanga kamatapparanna manda.
59002025	Kitai Rahab, mesa' baine bandarang. Ia tuu lako mata-matanna to-Israel tonna anu' natarima melo Rahab, napakitanni lalan laen naolai mpala'pah kalena. Iamo natarima meloi Puang Allataala joo Rahab nasaba' panggaukan melona.
59002026	Mate to batang kale ke te'dai penawa lan, susi toda to kamatapparan to te'da nadipasiolanan panggaukan, mate toda ia, battuananna sitonganna te'da nadisanga kamatapparan.
59003001	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Danggi' mimadoang ngasan bang menjaji guru jamaa. Nasaba' miissen kumua ia to kita' menjaji guru la'bi la dipemaparessaikiq na ia to tangngia guru.
59003002	Kita' sola ngasan biasaki' mpugauk mangrupa-rupa kasalan. Apa ia to tote'da bang nasala lan buangan kadanna, iamo tau to te'da caccana, sanga nakulle ia nta'tan kalena.
59003003	Ia to apa biccu' wa'ding nnatoro' to apa matonggo. Susi to nyarang dikalang mpake bassi biccu', dikua antawa'ding mbelukki naturu'i to pangkabudaianta'.
59003004	Susi too to kappala' moi matumba tonggona nairi' toopi angin bara', apa wa'dingpa dibeluk mpake mesa' kaju biccu' disanga kemudi, dikua anna umbo nakadoangngi tompamalei joo kappala' ia toomo naola.
59003005	Susi toomi to timunta', moi na iamo biccukkuna, apa liwa' ia matonggona to apa napau. Susi to api moi matumba biccukkuna, apa wa'ding ncappu'i pangngala.
59003006	Ia to timunta' wa'ding makkasolang susi api, sanga iamo nanii mangrupa-rupa kagajatan lan kaleta'. Ia to apa napau mpupenjajiki' togaja' na mpamasolangki', susi api pole jio mai naraka.
59003007	Sininna to olok-olok masia', manuk-manuk, olok-olok lumeme' na olok-olok jiong tasik wa'ding dipamanaran, napemanarannimo tolino.
59003008	Apa ianna timu moi mesa' tau te'da ia ngkullei mpemanarannii na te'da too ntaloii, sanga gaja gaja' ia. Ia to apa napau timu wa'ding dipangpasusii ipoh ulah mematean.
59003009	Ia to timu dipake mangkurru sumanga' lako Ambe'ta' Puang Allataala, apa ia toomo dipake ntampakki ropu padanta' rupa tau to napaden Puang Allataala susi Ia.
59003010	Ia to timunta' nanii messun barakka', apa ia bang una nanii messun tampak ropu. Ee, tomala'bihku'! Danggi' misusi joo!
59003011	Denraka to kalimbuah nanii messun duang rupa wai, wai tangmace'la na wai mace'la?
59003012	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Garonto' kaju ara te'da namembua zaitun. Garonto' anggoro' te'da namembua ara. Susi too to kalimbuah mace'la te'da nakullei mpasun wai tangmace'la.
59003013	Denraka tomacca na mandalan tangngah lan tangnga-tangngami? Ia ke denni, la mpamajiong kalena mpugauk panggaukan melo susi to napugauk tomacca. Iamo joo la mpangpekitanni kumua macca tongan ia.
59003014	Apa ia ammipangngimburuan, ba'tu kamu' manda ssanga tau kalemi, danggi' pattuanni joo misanga kamaccan, nasaba' sisalamo to panggaukanmi na pangngajaran tongan.
59003015	Ia to kamaccan susi joo te'da napole jao mai suruga apa pole jiori mai tee lino, jio mai pangkabudaian gaja'na tolino, jio mai setang.
59003016	Sanga umbo-umbo nanii topangngimburuan na tossanga kalena ia manda tau, jio toomo nanii kamaricuan na sininna panggaukan gaja'.
59003017	Apa ia to tonnampa' kamaccan pole jao mai, melo te'da caccana, sitarruhna sikabudan tau, mabassa, mangpasipatu, mangkamase, na tuli mpugauk kameloan, te'da narempe' sangbali na te'da too namajekkong.
59003018	Ia to panggaukanna to tompasikalino tau mpupembua kameloan.
59004001	Ciapari nasipekka nasibobo' to tau lan tangnga-tangngami? Sanga sirarii to kamadoangan lan penawanna.
59004002	Buda mikadoangngi, apa tangpakulle kamu', ammilambuno tau. Ngkadoangngi bang kamu' apanna tau apa te'da miampa'i, arannai sipekka kamu' misibobo'. Te'da apa milolongan, sanga te'da mimeta'da lako Puang Allataala.
59004003	Na moi mipeta'dai lako Puang Allataala, te'da miampa'i, sanga gaja' pattujummi. Ia manda mipeta'da to mipusannangna lan tee lino.
59004004	Ee, kamu' totangnningaranmo pale' Puang! Miissen kumua ia ke mipangbuda-budaii susi to totangnturu' Puang Allataala menjaji kamu' ewalin-Na Puang Allataala. Jaji ia to tolampangbuda-budaii susi joo, iamo mpangpeewalian kalena lako Puang Allataala.
59004005	Danggi' misangai kumua mesa napaunna bangra Sura' Allataala to kada kumua, "Ia to penawanna tolino pole jio mai Puang Allataala na liwa' buda to nakadoangngi."
59004006	Moi nasusi joo, la'bi makuasa ia to pammase-Na Puang Allataala na ia to kamadoangan penawanta'. Iamo joo naden too diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Naewa Puang Allataala to tomatampo, apa nakamasei to tompamajiong kalena."
59004007	Iamo joo mengkaturu' kamu' lako Puang Allataala, miewai to Ballisi', nasorong boko' jio mai kamu'.
59004008	Mandoppi' kamu' lako Puang Allataala, nalamandoppi' too lako kalemi. Ee, kamu' tomadosa! Danggi'mo mipugauk dosa. Na kamu' tomangdua penawa, pemeloi sipa'mi.
59004009	La ssassan kamu' kalemi, mikumarrak sola mbating. La membali karrak to petawammi na membali kamasussan to kamasannanganmi.
59004010	Danggi' mimatampo jio olo-Na Puang, anna pamatande kamu'.
59004011	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Danggi' miden sisaju ba'tu sipasala. Ia to tossaju ba'tu mpasala padanna tomatappa', atoran-Nara Puang Allataala to nasaju sola napasala. Na ia ammupasalai, battuananna te'da muturu'i joo atoran, apa menjajiko tomangra'tahna.
59004012	Apa sitonganna mesa'ra to wa'ding mpangben atoran lako tolino sola rra'tah kara-karana, Puang Allataala mandara to makuasa, mangpasalama' na massabu'i. Jaji tomatumbaroko, ammumadoangra la mpasala padammu rupa tau?
59004013	Pesa'dingngii tee pangpakainga'ku'! Den kamu' to mangkada kumua, "Ia tee allo ba'tu masawa kimangnguju lako mesa' kota, kitorro jio mangdangkang sangtaun masainna nnangah saro."
59004014	Na te'da miissenni to apa la jaji masawa. Tuo unara kamu'ka iarika matemora kamu'ka? Susi bangra kamu' to saleu' cingga'tu'ra dikita na ta'demo.
59004015	La mangkada susira kamu' ia tee, "Ia napuelohhi Puang kituo unapa, ia tee ba'tu ia tuu la kipugauk."
59004016	Sitonganna te'da mipaui susi joo, sanga tomatampo kamu' na tossanga kamu' kalemi. Ia to sipa' susi joo te'da namelo.
59004017	Ia to tonnissen apa to melo la napugauk, apa te'da napugaukki, madosai joo tau.
59005001	Ee, kamu' to tosugih! Pesa'dingngii tee pangpakainga'ku'. La kumarrak kamu', la mbating too kamu', sanga la disessa kamu'.
59005002	Ia to kasugiranmi la cappu' ngasan. Ia to pakeanmi la nakande kaluane.
59005003	Ia to bulawan sola salaka miampui naputu'mi ta'gah. Ia to ta'gahna la menjaji tanda kumua la nakande too kamu' api, nasaba' mipangmesamo ewananmi tonna la Kiama'mo tee lino.
59005004	Te'da mibenni gajinna to tau misua njama bara'bahmi. Ia tee too pesa'dingngii to sarrona! Metamba joo torrempun assele' bara'bahmi meta'da tulung, na ia to petambana nasa'dingmo Puang Allataala, to makuasa.
59005005	Mangkamo kamu' nnolai to disanga kala'bian sola mperasai kamasannangan lan tee lino. Susi kamu' patuoan dipelompoi la digere'.
59005006	Misessa mibuno tooi to tau te'da salana, apa te'da naewa kamu'.
59005007	Ee, tomala'bihku'! La sabbara' kamu' ratu lako nadete' karatuan-Na pole' Puang Isa. Takitai to pangdusung ntajanni assele' bara'bahna. Susi tooi sabbara' ntajanni to wattu peuranan.
59005008	La sabbara' kamu' mida'tan masumanga', nasaba' la ratu pole'mi Puang.
59005009	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Danggi' misipasala, anna te'da midisessa. Ingaranni: Cingga'tu'mora naratu to tomangra'tah.
59005010	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ingaranni to nabi mangkada mpau pepasan-Na Puang. Sabbara'i nnoloi kamaparrisan, jaji alai palelean mata.
59005011	Disanga tomasannang sanga sabbara'i. Misa'dingmo to kasabbarasanna Nabi Ayub, misa'ding toomo kumua undinna nabarakka'i Puang. Sanga melo penawan-Na Puang Allataala na liwa' kamamasean-Na.
59005012	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ia to kaminang parallu danggi' mimassapah la mpau langi', la mpau lino, ba'tu apa toomo. Pau maruruhhi, "Io" ke mipugaukki, na "Te'da" ke te'da mpugaukki, anna danggi' nasessa kamu' Puang Allataala.
59005013	Ia ke masussa kamu', massambajang kamu'. Ia ke masannang kamu', makkelong kamu' mipuji Puang Allataala.
59005014	Ia ke den kamu' masaki, melo ke mitambaii to pekaamberan jamaa napassambajangan kamu', naparussui minynyak mpau sangan-Na Puang.
59005015	Ia ke nakatappa'i kumua natarima Puang to peta'danna, la napumalagah joo tomasaki. La napamalagah Puang, na la nadampangan tooi ke denni dosa napugauk.
59005016	Iamo joo pada la nnakui kamu' kasalanmi ammisipassambajangan midipamalagah. Liwa' makuasa to peta'da doangna to tonturu' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala.
59005017	Ia to Nabi Elia tolino biasara susi kita'. Apa ia tonna tongan-tongannii massambajang nakua danggi' nauran, te'da tongan nauran tallung taun sitangnga masainna.
59005018	Massambajang pole' omi na membanasa to uran jao mai langi' anna endek too to assele' padang.
59005019	-
59005020	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Ingaranni tee kada kumua, ia ke den tau membalik jio mai pangngajaran-Na Puang Allataala, la mipangngingaranni namengkatoba' pole', na ia to tompangngingaranni joo tomadosa namengkatoba', iamo joo tau napusaba' nadipasalama' to sunga'na jio mai kamatean jio ahera', na didampangan, moi buda dosana. Padamo jolo' too. Sallangki' mati', Yakub
60001001	Ee, tomala'bihku' sola ngasan, to napileimo Puang Allataala menjaji umma'-Na! Aku' Petrus rasulu'-Na Puang Isa Almaseh nnuki'i tee sura' lako kamu' to titaleh jio propinsi Pontus, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia na Bitinia, to torro jio susi tomentoratu lan tangnga-tangngana totangnturu' Puang Allataala.
60001002	Napileimo kamu' Ambe' Puang Allataala susi to pura napattantu jolona. Roh Allataalamo mpupenjaji kamu' tau mesan-Na, ammimengkaturu' lako Puang Isa Almaseh to ndampangan kamu' mpake rara-Na. Dennaa upa' naben kamu' Puang Allataala sabuda-budanna barakka' sola kamasannangan.
60001003	Tamangkurru sumanga' lako Puang Allataala, Ambe'-Na Puangta' Puang Isa Almaseh! Liwa' Ia ngkamaseiki', anna patuo pole'i to Puang Isa Almaseh antawa'ding nnampa' katuoan baru. Iamo joo tangbataki' rrannuan Puang.
60001004	Parannuki' la ntarima barakka' tangmasolang, te'da naburuk, na tangmaluse, to napasadianmiki' Puang Allataala jao suruga.
60001005	La naben ngasan kamu' joo, nasaba' matappa' kamu' lako Puang Allataala. Jaji, naampai kamu' kuasan-Na Puang Allataala, ammitarima kasalamatan to sadiamo la naben kamu' ke Kiama'mi lino.
60001006	Iamo joo la mario kamu', moiraka namasse penawammi cingga'tu' tee too sanga mperasai kamu' mangrupa-rupa kamaparrisan.
60001007	Na ia joo kamaparrisan miperasai la menjaji butti kumua matappa' tongan kamu' lako Puang Isa Almaseh. Ia to bulawan disa'poi anna diissen kumua massangraka bulawan iarika tangngia. Susimi joo nadiparessa too to kamatapparanmi. Na ia joo kamatapparanmi la'bi keangga' na ia to bulawan la lanynya'. Na ia ke mangkamo kamu' diparessa, la napuji, la napamatande sola la napakala'bih kamu' Puang Allataala, ke ratu pole'mi Puang Isa Almaseh.
60001008	Moi na te'dapa mikitai to Puang Isa Almaseh tonna anu', apa mipakamoja'i. Na moi tee too te'da too mikitai, apa matappa' kamu' lako kale-Na. Iamo joo ammimario mperasaii to kamasannangan te'da susinna.
60001009	Masannangmo kamu', sanga napasalama'mo kamu' Puang Allataala, nasaba' matappa' kamu' lako Puang Isa Almaseh.
60001010	Ia joo kasalamatan napesa' tongan tuu lako nabi tonna anu', napau joloi joo barakka' to nabenmo kamu' Puang Allataala.
60001011	Roh-Na Almaseh ngkuasai tuu lako nabi anna pau joloi to kamaparrisan la naperasai Almaseh sola kamala'biran to naampa' o undinna. Napesa' tarruhhi sanga madoangngi nnissenni kumua piranra nalajaji joo kasalamatan na umbo nakua carana la jaji.
60001012	Napauanni Puang Allataala tuu lako nabi, kumua ia joo apa napau jolo te'da nadipatuju lako kalena apa lakora kamu'. Na ia joo apa napau jolo tonna anu' mangka misa'ding tee too, sanga den tau mpangpeissenanni lako kamu' mpake kuasan-Na Roh Allataala to pole jao mai suruga. Na moi malaeka' madoang too mpelalanni joo apa dipau jolo.
60001013	Jaji, pasadia meloi to penawammi, sanga ia joo apa mangka napugauk Puang Allataala. Ta'tanni kalemi, miparannuan tonganni joo barakka' la diben kamu' ke ratu pole'mi Puang Isa Almaseh.
60001014	Napuanakmo kamu' Puang Allataala. Iamo joo la da'tan kamu' mengkaturu' lako kale-Na, nadanggi'mo mituru' pole' oi to kamadoangan gaja'mi to ngkuasai kamu' tonna te'dapa miissenni to Puang Allataala.
60001015	Sibalikanna la messipa' melo kamu' mikaba'cii to kagajatan, susi Puang Allataala to mangka mpilei kamu'.
60001016	Nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala, nakua Puang Allataala kumua, "La messipa' melo kamu', sanga tomelona'."
60001017	Ia ke massambajang kamu' lako Puang Allataala mekaambe' kamu'. Iamo joo la mikalaja' mikasiri'i, ke tuo unapa kamu' lan tee lino. Ia toomo Puang to tangmangpasilaenan rra'tah kara-karana tolino situru' panggaukanna.
60001018	Napukaunan kamu' jolo to sipa' te'da bua'na to mimanah jio mai tojolomi. Miissen to apa mangka napake Puang lla'bak kamu' ammikullei mpatorro sipa' jolomi. Ia to pela'bak tangngia ewanan la masolang, susinna pera' ba'tu bulawan,
60001019	apa liwa' keangga'na. Iamo to rara-Na Almaseh dipake butung bembala' te'da caccana ba'tu kakuranganna dipangkaroban lako Puang Allataala.
60001020	Ia tonna te'dapa nadipaden tee lino napattantu jolomo Puang Allataala kumua Puang Isa Almaseh menjaji Tomangpasalama', na ia tee wattu la tampakkanami lino ratumi la mpasalama' kamu'.
60001021	Almasehmora ammimatappa' lako Puang Allataala, to mangka mpatuo pole'i jio mai kamatean, na mpakala'bih tooi. Jaji, Puang Allataalara mikatappa'i, na Ia manda toora miparannuan.
60001022	Mangkamo mipemeloi to sipa'mi, sanga nturu'mo kamu' pangngajaran tongan jio mai Puang Allataala na danggi' mianggai'-gai' bangri mpakamoja' padammi tomatappa'. Iamo joo la sipakamoja' tongan kamu'.
60001023	La sipakamoja' kamu', nasaba' pole jio mai kadan-Na Puang Allataala, ammimenjajimo tobaru susi to dijajian pole', to te'da najaji jio mai tolino to la mate, apa dijajian jiora kamu' mai kada to tuo te'da cappa'na.
60001024	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Sininna tolino susiri reu na sininna kamala'biranna susi bangri ca'bi reu. Malajui to reu, lolloh todami to ca'binna.
60001025	Apa ia to kadan-Na Puang Allataala da'tan bang ia den, te'da cappa'na." Ia joo kada, iamo to Kareba Kasalamatan to dipangpeissenanmo lako kamu'.
60002001	Iamo joo danggi'mo mipugauk bangngi to panggaukan gaja', danggi' mimangnguraga, danggi' mianggai'-gai'ri messipa' melo. Danggi' mimasere ati sola mpau gaja' tau.
60002002	Apa la susira kamu' topea'-pea' mane' jaji to tuli mawakke bang madoang nniso' dadik massang, iamo to kadan-Na Puang Allataala. Na ia ke mipesa' tonganni to kadan-Na Puang Allataala, la masaranianmo kamu' ammisalama'.
60002003	Sanga den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Miperasaimo matumba to kameloan-Na Puang."
60002004	Ia to Puang Isa dipasirapang batu ariri petuo. Ia joo batu naca'beanmo tolino, nasaba' nasangai te'da bua'na. Apa ia ke Puang Allataala, nasanga kaminang makeangga'. Memmesa' penawa kamu' sola Puang,
60002005	ammimenjaji toda susi batu to napake Roh Allataala mpake'deh Bola Puang Allataala. Menjaji toomo kamu' susi imang to mpangjaman mandamo Puang Allataala. Na susi imang mangkaroba, la susi toda kamu' la mpangkaroban kalemi lako Puang Allataala susi to napatujuan kamu' Roh Allataala. Na ia joo karoba napumasannang Puang Allataala nasaba' Puang Isa Almaseh.
60002006	Nasaba' den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala, nakua Puang kumua, "Mangkamo' mpilei mesa' batu ariri keangga' to kupajio kota Sion menjaji batu ariri petuo. Na ia to tongkatappa'ii, te'da naladipakasiri'."
60002007	Gaja keangga' joo batu lako kamu' to tomatappa'. Apa ia to totangmatappa' napatu to diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to batu naca'bean pande bola, menjajimo batu ariri petuo."
60002008	Na "Iamo joo batu nanii titodo tau na buda tau nalolinan." Titodoi tuu lako tau, nasaba' cia'i ngkatappa'ii to kadan-Na Puang Allataala. Susimi joo to pura napattantu Puang Allataala lako kalena.
60002009	Apa kamu'mo to bangsa napileimo Puang Allataala, ammimenjaji imangna Raja to mipangjaman. Napupenjaji kamu' bangsa to disarakki jio mai bangsa laen ammimenjaji tau mesan-Na. Napileimo kamu' la mpangpeissenan panggaukan-Na to te'da susinna. Iamo ntambai kamu' messun lan mai kamasolangan, ammimentama kamasannangan to liwa' mejangngaran.
60002010	Ia tonna jolona tangngiapa kamu' umma'-Na Puang Allataala, apa ia tee too menjaji umma'-Namo kamu'. Ia tonna jolona te'da miperasaii to kamamasean-Na Puang Allataala, apa miperasaimo tee too.
60002011	Ee, tomala'bihku' to kupakamoja'! Susi kamu' tomambela ratu sompa' lan tee lino natorro susi toratu lan tangnga-tangngana totangnturu' Puang Allataala. Iamo joo meta'da tonganna' lako kamu' kumua, danggi' mituru' bangngi to kamadoangan gaja'mi to tuli hhalangngi kamu' manggauk melo.
60002012	Mbai den tau to tangnturu' Puang to mpau gaja' kamu'. Iamo joo la melo to sipa'mi nakitai tau kumua melo to apa mipugauk. Na undinna naakui kumua melo to sipa'mi anna mpakala'bih Puang Allataala ke ratui rra'tah kara-karana tolino.
60002013	La mituru' parentana sininna tomangparenta lan lino, nasaba' iamo nakadoangngi Puang. Mengkaturu' kamu' lako Tomaraja, nasaba' iara kaminang makuasa.
60002014	Mengkaturu' too kamu' lako gubernur to naangka' Tomaraja la ssessa tomanggauk gaja', apa la mpakala'bih tomanggauk melo.
60002015	Nasaba' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, na ia to panggaukan melomi la ntampun timunna to totangnnissenpa Puang mpau gaja' kamu'.
60002016	Mangkamo kamu' nala'paran Puang Allataala jio mai kuasa dosa. Iamo joo, danggi' mipakei to kadila'paranmi mpugauk buni kagajatan. Sibalikanna la nturu' kamu' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, nasaba' umma'-Namo kamu'.
60002017	Kasiri'i to sininna tau, pakamoja'i to padammi tomatappa', kalaja' kasiri'i to Puang Allataala, ammikasiri'i to Tomaraja.
60002018	Ee, kamu' to kaunan! Mangpesa'ding kamu' lako puangmi na la mikasiri'i, te'da na lako manda tomelo penawanna na mabassa, apa lako too tomaparrang.
60002019	Ia ke denni kaunan napa'dikkii puangna, moi nate'da nakasalan, la naingaran kumua la nabarakka'i Puang Allataala, ke sabbara'i, sanga naissen kumua nakabudai Puang Allataala ke sabbara'ki'.
60002020	Te'da miladipuji ke sabbara' kamu' mperasaii to pangsessa to sipato' la mitarima sanga sala kamu'. Apa ia ke sabbara' kamu' mperasaii to pa'dik ngkanna kamu' nasaba' mpugauk kamu' kameloan, la nabarakka'i kamu' Puang Allataala.
60002021	Napileimo kamu' Puang Allataala mpugaukki susi joo. Moi Almaseh mperasai pa'dik ssulle kamu', anna menjaji palelean mata lako kamu' ammituru'i.
60002022	Te'da lalo napugauk dosa, te'da too naden tau ssa'dingngi kumua mangnguragai.
60002023	Ia tonna kada-kadaii tau, te'da too napebalii. Ia tonna pa'dikkii tau, te'da too nagarra'i kumua la napabalahhii, apa sande' lako bangngi Puang Allataala, Tomangra'tah maruruh.
60002024	Almasehra Ia mperasai kamaparrisan jao kaju sitamben nasaba' dosata', antala'pah jio mai kuasa dosa, antaturu' too pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala. Napamalagahki' nasaba' kamaparrisan-Na Almaseh jao kaju sitamben.
60002025	Ia tonna jolona susi kamu' to bembala' lewa', apa ia tee too dipapolemo kamu' lako Tomangrewa to mpuinawa kamu'.
60003001	Ee, kamu' to baine kebalimo! Susi todami, la mengkaturu' lako kamu' balimmi. Na ia ke denni balimmi to te'dapa nakatappa'i kadan-Na Puang Allataala, ia to sipa' melomi la nakita, namenjaji matappa'. Te'damo miparallu mpauanni apa,
60003002	nasaba' iamo nakita to sipa' melomi, maruruh sola macanning atimmi nturu'i.
60003003	Danggi' na ia bang mialan wattu to mpemaloloi kalemi, susinna mpemellongngi beluakkami, mpake pakean bulawan iarika pakean masuli'.
60003004	Apa sibalikanna, la miangahri to kamaloloan to napapajan sipa' melomi, susinna te'da mikassara' apa massikalino kamu'. Ia to kamaloloan susi joo nakabudai Puang Allataala.
60003005	Susimi joo napugauk mpemaloloi kalena to baine matappa' tonna anu', to rrannuan Puang Allataala, na mengkaturu' lako balinna.
60003006	Moi Sara susi todai joo, nturu' bang parentana Nabi Ibrahim napekapuangngii. Na moi kamu' tee too, susi toomo kamu' Sara, ke mipugaukki to kameloan, na te'da apa mikalaja'.
60003007	Ee, kamu' to muane kebainemo! Susi todami, la sikalino kamu' balimmi. La mitulungngi, sanga miissen kumua ia to kamawatanganna te'da napada kamawatanganna muane. La mitaratte'i, sanga miissen kumua pada la ntarima kamu' barakka' to naben kamu' Puang Allataala, iamo to katuoan melo te'da cappa'na. La mipugauk susi tee, na te'da apa hhalangngii to passambajangmi lako Puang Allataala.
60003008	Ee, tomala'bihku'! Katampakanna, la mesa' kada sola mesa' penawa kamu'. La sipakamoja' kamu' padammi tomatappa', la sikamasean too kamu', nadanggi' mimatampo.
60003009	Ia ke denni tau mpugauk kagajatan lako kamu', danggi' mipabalahhii. Na ia ke denni tau ngkada-kadai kamu', danggi' too mipabalahhii. La'bi melo ke mipassambajanganni lako Puang Allataala nabarakka'ii joo tompugauk kagajatan. Napilei kamu' Puang Allataala menjaji umma'-Na ammipeta'danni barakka' to padammi rupa tau. Ia ke mipugaukmi susi joo, la nabarakka'i toda kamu' Puang Allataala.
60003010	Den diuki' lan Sura' Allataala kumua, "Ia to tongkabudai katuoan melo te'da cappa'na la najagai to timunna, nadanggi' napaui to apa gaja'. Na ia to madoang masannang, danggi' namangnguraga.
60003011	La natorroi mpugauk kagajatan, napugaukki to kameloan. La napengkulle-kullei sikalino padanna rupa tau,
60003012	nasaba' tuli nakita Puang to tonturu' pakkaeloran-Na, na tuli ntarimai to passambajangna. Apa naewai Puang to tompugauk kagajatan."
60003013	Te'da tau la mpugauk kagajatan lako kamu' ke masannang bang kamu' mpugauk kameloan.
60003014	Moi ammiperasai kamaparrisan sanga nturu' kamu' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, apa sitonganna masannang kamu'! Danggi' mikalaja'i to tompakario-rio kamu', danggi' too mipuselangngi.
60003015	Apa la miingaran, kumua Almaseh mandara to Puang mikasiri' misompai, mituli sadia too mpebalii to tau ke nakutanai kamu' kumua, "Inda tonganra mirannuan?"
60003016	Apa mebali melo bang kamu', danggi' mimatampo. La tuli manggauk melo kamu', anna ia to tompau gaja' kamu' la masiri', nasaba' melo bang to sipa'mi situru' pakkaeloran-Na Almaseh.
60003017	La'biran ke maparri' kamu' sanga mpugauk kamu' kameloan ke iamo napueloh Puang, na ia ke maparri' kamu' sanga mpugauk kagajatan.
60003018	Nasaba' pissenra mate to Almaseh la ndampangan tolino. Ia to Almaseh, to te'da namadosa, namate ssulle tomadosa, dikua misikalino pole' Puang Allataala. Batang kale-Na nabuno tau, apa napatuo pole'i Roh Allataala.
60003019	Na ia to roh-Na male mpangpeissenan kapataloan-Na lako bombo to ditarungku ntajan wattu la dinii rra'tah kara-karana.
60003020	Ditarungkui sanga cia'i matappa' lako Puang Allataala tonna tuo unapa Nabi Nuh tonna anu'. Sabbara'i Puang Allataala ntajanni to kamengkatobaranna, samangkanna Nabi Nuh nggaraga kappala'. Ia mandara napasalama' Puang Allataala to tau karua lan joo kappala' tonna wai saba' tonggo.
60003021	Na ia joo kajajian dipasangrapangngi pangjioran to mipusalama' tee too. Ia joo pangjioran tangngia mesa' cara mbasei batang kale danggi' nacarepa, apa ia to pangjioran mesa' peta'da lako Puang Allataala na la'paran kamu' jio mai kasalan. Napasalama' kamu', sanga mangkami tuo pole' Puang Isa Almaseh jio mai kamatean.
60003022	Na endekmi de' suruga, nacumadokko jio sa'de kanan-Na Puang Allataala namangparenta sola, mparenta sininna malaeka', sininna tomakuasa na tomangparenta to wa'ding ngkuasai tolino.
60004001	Mangkami Almaseh mperasai kamapa'dikan jao kaju sitamben. Iamo joo moi kamu' la sadia toda kamu' mperasaii susi to naperasai Almaseh. Sanga ia to tomangkamo mperasai kamapa'dikan susi joo cia'mo mpugauk dosa.
60004002	Jaji, ia mituo unapa lan tee lino la nturu' kamu' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, danggi' mituru' pakkaeloran penawammi.
60004003	Gaja sainmo kamu' mpugaukki to panggaukanna totangnturu' Puang. Susinna manggauk sala, nturu' kamadoangan gaja', pangmalangoan, kumande-mande, mangngiso'-iso', na passompan mesirisan lako dewata.
60004004	Na ia tee too jangngahhi joo totangnturu' Puang, sanga te'damo mituru'i panggaukanna tau to liwa' gaja', to da'tan bang mpugauk dosa. Jaji, iamo napau gaja' kamu'.
60004005	Apa la napebalii to panggaukan gaja'na lako Puang Allataala keanu'. Sadiamo Puang Allataala la rra'tah kara-karana la totuo, la tomate.
60004006	Iamo joo namangka toomo dipangpeissenan to Kareba Kasalamatan lako joo tomatemo, dikua nannampa' katuoan melo te'da cappa'na situru' pakkaeloran-Na Puang Allataala, moi namangka mate susi to biasa jaji lako tolino.
60004007	La ndete'mi tampakkana tee lino na sininna apa. Iamo joo la mita'tan to kalemi, na majaga too kamu' ammitatta' massambajang susi to sipato'na.
60004008	Na ia to kaminang parallu, la mattongan-tongan kamu' sipakamoja', ammisisulle sidampangan.
60004009	Tarima meloi to padammi tomatappa' jio bolami, danggi' mimangnuku-nuku.
60004010	Pada nabenmo kamu' Puang Allataala to mangrupa-rupa barakka'. Iamo joo pada la mipake meloi joo barakka' situlung.
